## <a name="gx_button_deselect"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1633">gx_button_deselect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1633">gx_button_deselect</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-1634">Przycisk Usuń zaznaczenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1634">Deselect button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1635">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1635">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_button_deselect(
    GX_BUTTON *button, 
    GX_BOOL gen_event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1636">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1636">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-1637">Ta usługa usuwa zaznaczenie określonego przycisku i generuje zdarzenie sygnału w zależności od stylów przycisku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1637">This service deselects the specified button and generate a signal event depending on button styles.</span></span>


| <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1638">Styl przycisku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1638">Button Style</span></span>              | <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1639">Sygnału</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1639">Signal</span></span>                     |
|---------------------------|----------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1640">Brak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1640">None</span></span>                      | <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1641">GX_EVENT_CLICKED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1641">GX_EVENT_CLICKED</span></span>         |
| <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1642">GX_STYLE_BUTTON_RADIO</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1642">GX_STYLE_BUTTON_RADIO</span></span>  | <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1643">GX_EVENT_RADIO_DESELECT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1643">GX_EVENT_RADIO_DESELECT</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1644">GX_STYLE_BUTTON_TOGGLE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1644">GX_STYLE_BUTTON_TOGGLE</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1645">GX_EVENT_TOGGLE_OFF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1645">GX_EVENT_TOGGLE_OFF</span></span>     |



### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1646">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1646">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1647">**przycisk** Wskaźnik do bloku sterowania przycisku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1647">**button** Pointer to button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1648">**gen_event** Jeśli GX_TRUE, przycisk wygeneruje zdarzenie GX_EVENT_CLICKED, GX_EVENT_DESELECT lub GX_EVENT_TOGGLE_OFFSET w zależności od stylu przycisku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1648">**gen_event** If GX_TRUE, the button will generate a GX_EVENT_CLICKED, GX_EVENT_DESELECT, or GX_EVENT_TOGGLE_OFFSET event depending on the button style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1649">Jeśli GX_FALSE, przycisk nie wygeneruje żadnego zdarzenia wyższego poziomu, nawet jeśli normalnie to zrobi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1649">If GX_FALSE, the button will not generate any higher level event even if it would normally do so.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1650">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1650">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1651">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Przycisk Powodzenie usuń zaznaczenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1651">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful button deselect</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1652">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1652">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1653">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1653">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1654">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widżet jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1654">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

## <a name="gx_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1672">gx_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1672">gx_button_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-1673">Przycisk Rysuj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1673">Draw button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1674">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1674">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_button_draw(GX_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1675">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1675">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-1676">Ta usługa rysuje określony przycisk.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1676">This service draws the specified button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1677">Ta funkcja jest zwykle wywoływana wewnętrznie przez mechanizm odświeżania kanwy GUIX, ale jest udostępniane aplikacji, aby pomóc w implementacji niestandardowych funkcji rysowania dla niestandardowych widżetów przycisków.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1677">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom button widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1678">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1678">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1679">**przycisk** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki przycisku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1679">**button** Pointer to button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1680">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1680">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1681">**Brak**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1681">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1682">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1682">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-1683">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1683">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1684">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1684">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom button draw function. */
VOID custom_button_draw(GX_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Call default button draw. */
    gx_button_draw(button);

    /* Add custom drawing here. */
}

```

## <a name="gx_button_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1699">gx_button_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1699">gx_button_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-1700">Zdarzenie przycisku Przetwarzania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1700">Process button event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1701">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1701">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_button_event_process(
    GX_BUTTON *button, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1702">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1702">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-1703">Ta usługa przetwarza zdarzenie dla określonego przycisku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1703">This service processes an event for the specified button.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1704">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1704">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1705">**przycisk** Wskaźnik do bloku sterowania przycisku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1705">**button** Pointer to button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1706">**event_ptr** Wskaźnik do zdarzenia do przetwarzania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1706">**event_ptr** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1707">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1707">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1708">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Powodzenie procesu zdarzenia przycisku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1708">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful button event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1709">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1709">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1710">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1710">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1711">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1711">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-1712">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1712">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1713">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1713">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic button event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_button_event_process(GX_BUTTON *button,
                                 GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default button
            event processing */
        status = gx_button_event_process(button, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_alpha_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1765">gx_canvas_alpha_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1765">gx_canvas_alpha_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-1766">Ustawianie wartości alfa-blend dla kanwy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1766">Set alpha-blend value for canvas</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1767">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1767">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_alpha_set(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_UBYTE alpha);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1768">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1768">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-1769">Ta usługa ustawia wartość alfa-blend dla określonej kanwy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1769">This service sets the alpha-blend value for the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1770">Wartości alfa kanwy mogą być od 0 (przezroczyste) do 255 (w pełni nieprzezroczyste).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1770">Canvas alpha values can range from 0 (transparent) to 255 (fully opaque).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-1771">Łączenie kanw nakładek wymaga obsługi sprzętowej warstwy grafiki lub obsługi oprogramowania przez utworzenie kanwy złożonej.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1771">Blending overlay canvases requires either hardware graphics layer support, or software support via the creation of a composite canvas.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-1772">Sprzętowa obsługa mieszania kanwy jest włączana przez wywołania interfejsu API gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind() przed ustawieniem wartości alfa kanwy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1772">Hardware support for canvas blending is enabled by invoking the gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind() API prior to setting the canvas alpha value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1773">Gdy kanwa jest powiązana ze sprzętową warstwą grafiki, wywołanie interfejsu API gx_canvas_alpha_set() bezpośrednio wywołuje usługi mieszania sprzętowej warstwy grafiki.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1773">When a canvas is bound to a hardware graphics layer, calling the gx_canvas_alpha_set() API directly invokes the hardware graphics layer blending services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-1774">Aby korzystać z obsługi oprogramowania do mieszania kanwy, aplikacja musi utworzyć kanwę ze stylem GX_CANVAS_COMPOSITE, w którym wszystkie inne zarządzane kanwy są złożone przed ostatecznym wyświetleniem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1774">To utilize software support for canvas blending, the application must create a canvas with GX_CANVAS_COMPOSITE style, into which all other managed canvases are composited prior to final display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1775">Obsługa oprogramowania w przypadku mieszania kanwy jest zapewniana tylko w przypadku korzystania ze sterownika wyświetlania o głębokości kolorów co najmniej 16 bpp.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1775">Software support for canvas blending is only provided when running with a display driver of 16-bpp or higher color depth.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1776">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1776">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1777">**kanwa** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki kanwy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1777">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1778">**alfa** Wartość mieszania alfa, zakres od 0 (przezroczysty) do 255 (nieprzezroczysty).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1778">**alpha** Alpha-blend value, range from 0 (transparent) to 255 (opaque).</span></span>

### <a name="return--values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1779">Wartości zwracane</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1779">Return  Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1780">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Zestaw wartości pomyślnej mieszania alfa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1780">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful alpha-blend value set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1781">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1781">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1782">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1782">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1783">**GX_INVALID_ERROR** (0x20) Nieprawidłowa kanwa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1783">**GX_INVALID_ERROR** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1784">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1784">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-1785">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1785">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1786">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1786">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the alpha-blend value of “my_canvas”. */
status = gx_canvas_alpha_set(&my_canvas, GX_ALPHA_VALUE_OPAQUE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the alpha-blend value was successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_arc_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1796">gx_canvas_arc_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1796">gx_canvas_arc_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-1797">Rysowanie łuku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1797">Draw arc</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1798">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1798">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_arc_draw(
    INT xcenter, 
    INT ycenter, 
    UINT r,
    INT start_angle, 
    INT end_angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1799">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1799">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-1800">Ta usługa rysuje okrąg arc na kanwie przy użyciu bieżącego pędzla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1800">This service draws a circle arc on the canvas using the current brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1801">Arc okrąg jest obcięty do kanwy w nieprawidłowym regionie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1801">The circle arc is clipped to the canvas invalid region.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1802">Ta usługa wymaga GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT zdefiniowanej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1802">This service requires GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1803">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1803">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1804">**xcenter** x-position of center of the circle arc</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1804">**xcenter** x-position of center of the circle arc</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1805">**ycenter** y-position of center of the circle arc</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1805">**ycenter** y-position of center of the circle arc</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1806">**r** Radius łuku okręgu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1806">**r** Radius of the circle arc</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1807">**start_angle** Kąt początkowy łuku okręgu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1807">**start_angle** Starting angle of the circle arc</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1808">**end_angle** Końcowy kąt łuku okręgu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1808">**end_angle** Ending angle of the circle arc</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1809">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1809">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1810">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślne narysowanie łuku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1810">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful arc draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1811">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1811">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1812">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Nieprawidłowa wartość</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1812">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1813">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Brak otwartego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1813">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1814">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1814">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-1815">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1815">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1816">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1816">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw a circle arc from 0 degree to 90 degree in clockwise. */
status = gx_canvas_arc_draw(100, 100, 50, 0, 90);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the arc has been drawn on “my_canvas”. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_block_move"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1829">gx_canvas_block_move</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1829">gx_canvas_block_move</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-1830">Przenoszenie bloku pikseli kanwy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1830">Move block of canvas pixels</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1831">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1831">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_block_move(GX_RECTANGLE *block,
    GX_VALUE x_shift, GX_VALUE y_shift, GX_RECTANGLE *dirty);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1832">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1832">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-1833">Ta usługa przenosi blok danych pikseli kanwy w określonym kierunku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1833">This service moves a block of canvas pixel data in the direction specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1834">Ta usługa jest używana wewnętrznie przez graficzny interfejs użytkownika (GUIX) do szybkiego przewijania, ale może być również używana przez oprogramowanie aplikacji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1834">This service is used internally by GUIX to accomplish fast scrolling, but may also be used by the application software.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1835">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1835">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1836">**blokuj** Współrzędne obszaru do przeniesienia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1836">**block** Coordinates of area to move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1837">**x_shift** Liczba pikseli do przesunięcia na osi X</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1837">**x_shift** Number of pixels to shift on the x-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1838">**y_shift** Liczba pikseli do przesunięcia na osi y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1838">**y_shift** Number of pixels to shift on the y-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1839">**zanieczyszczone** Jeśli przeniesienie bloku powiedzie się, ta funkcja zwraca część prostokąta źródłowego, która nadal jest zanieczyszczona do obiektu wywołującego w tym parametrze.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1839">**dirty** If the block move is successful, this function returns the portion of the source rectangle that is still dirty to the caller in this parameter.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1840">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1840">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1841">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślne przeniesienie bloku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1841">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful block move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1842">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Nieudane przenoszenie bloku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1842">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Failed block move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1843">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1843">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1844">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1844">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1845">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1845">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-1846">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1846">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1847">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1847">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RECTANGLE invalid;
GX_RECTANGLE move;

/* define 100 x 100 pixel rectangle */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&move, 0, 0, 99, 99);

/* Move this rectangle 10 pixels to the right”. */
status = gx_canvas_block_move(&move, 10, 0, &invalid);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, then ‘invalid’ marks the area that needs to be redrawn after the block move. */

```

## <a name="gx_canvas_circle_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1860">gx_canvas_circle_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1860">gx_canvas_circle_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-1861">Rysowanie okręgu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1861">Draw circle</span></span>

```C
    INT ycenter, 
    UINT r);
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1869">**ycenter** y-coord of center of the cirlce</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1869">**ycenter** y-coord of center of the cirlce</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1872">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślne rysowanie okręgu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1872">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful circle draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1873">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1873">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1874">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Nieprawidłowy promień okręgu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1874">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid circle radius</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1875">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Brak otwartego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1875">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1891">gx_canvas_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1891">gx_canvas_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-1892">Tworzenie kanwy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1892">Create canvas</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1893">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1893">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_create(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_DISPLAY *display, 
    UINT type, 
    UINT width, 
    UINT height,
    GX_COLOR *memory_area, 
    ULONG memory_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1894">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1894">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-1895">Ta usługa tworzy kanwę z określonymi właściwościami i skojarzoną pamięcią.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1895">This service creates the canvas with the specified properties and associated memory.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1896">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1896">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1897">**kanwa** Wskaźnik do bloku sterowania kanwy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1897">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1898">**name (nazwa)** Nazwa logiczna kanwy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1898">**name** Logical name for the canvas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1899">**wyświetlanie** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego ekranu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1899">**display** Pointer to previously created display</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1900">**typ** Typ kanwy Typy kanwy obejmują:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1900">**type** Type of canvasThe canvas types include:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1901">**GX_CANVAS_SIMPLE:** Kanwa pamięci używana do rysowania poza ekranem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1901">**GX_CANVAS_SIMPLE:** A memory canvas which is used to off-screen drawing.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1902">**GX_CANVAS_MANAGED:** Kanwa, która jest automatycznie opróżniona do aktywnego ekranu w ramach złożonego procesu tworzenia lub w ramach operacji przełączania buforu dla architektur z jedną kanwą.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1902">**GX_CANVAS_MANAGED:** A canvas which automatically flushed to the active display, either as part of the composite building process or as part of the buffer toggle operation for single-canvas architectures.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1903">**GX_CANVAS_VISIBLE:** Ta flaga może służyć do włączanie i wyłączanie kanwy bez utraty zawartości rysowania kanwy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1903">**GX_CANVAS_VISIBLE:** This flag can be used to turn on and off a canvas, without losing the canvas drawing contents.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1904">**GX_CANVAS_MODIFIED:** Zarezerwowane do użytku w przyszłości.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1904">**GX_CANVAS_MODIFIED:** Reserved for future use.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1905">**GX_CANVAS_COMPOSITE:** Ta flaga jest używana przez aplikację podczas konfigurowania systemu z wieloma kanwami, który będzie konfigurować wiele zarządzanych kanw w kanwę złożoną, a element złożony jest oparty na buforze ramek sprzętowych.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1905">**GX_CANVAS_COMPOSITE:** This flag is used by the application when configuring a multiple-canvas system which will composite multiple managed canvases into the composite canvas, and the composite is the driven to the hardware frame buffer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1906">**width (szerokość)** Szerokość w pikselach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1906">**width** Width in pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1907">**wysokość** Wysokość w pikselach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1907">**height** Height in pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1908">**memory_area** Obszar pamięci dla kanwy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1908">**memory_area** Memory area for canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1909">Ta wartość może</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1909">This value can</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1910">**GX_NULL** w czasie tworzenia kanwy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1910">**GX_NULL** at the time of canvas creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1911">**i** później zainicjowane przy użyciu gx_canvas_memory_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1911">**and** later initialized using gx_canvas_memory_define</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1912">**memory_size** Rozmiar obszaru pamięci w bajtach lub 0, jeśli pamięć kanwy zostanie zdefiniowana po utworzeniu kanwy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1912">**memory_size** Size of memory area in bytes, or 0 if the canvas memory will be defined after the canvas is created.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1913">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1913">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1914">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślne utworzenie kanwy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1914">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful canvas create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1915">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1915">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1916">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1916">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1917">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1917">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1918">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS_SIZE** (0x1C) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar bloku kontrolki kanwy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1918">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS_SIZE** (0x1C) Invalid canvas control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1919">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B) Nieprawidłowy typ kanwy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1919">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B) Invalid canvas type</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1920">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1920">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-1921">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1921">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1922">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1922">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define global canvas memory area. */
GX_COLOR my_canvas_memory[272*480];

…

/* Create “my_canvas”. */
status = gx_canvas_create(&my_canvas, "my canvas", &my_display,
                    (GX_CANVAS_MANAGED | GX_CANVAS_VISIBLE),
                    272, 480,
                    my_canvas_memory,
                    sizeof(default_canvas_memory));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the 272 x 480 canvas was successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1927">gx_canvas_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1927">gx_canvas_delete</span></span>

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1930">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1930">Description</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1935">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1935">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1939">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Nieprawidłowa kanwa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1939">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1940">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1940">Allowed From</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_drawing_complete"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1950">gx_canvas_drawing_complete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1950">gx_canvas_drawing_complete</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-1951">Kompletny rysunek kanwy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1951">Complete canvas drawing</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1952">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1952">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_drawing_complete(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_BOOL flush);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1953">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1953">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-1954">Ta usługa informuje program GUIX o ukończeniu rysowania aplikacji na określonej kanwie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1954">This service lets GUIX know the application’s drawing on the specified canvas is complete.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-1955">Aplikacja może użyć tej usługi, aby wymusić natychmiastowe rysowanie na kanwie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1955">The application can use this service to force immediate drawing to a canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1956">Powoduje to opróżnienie kanwy do widocznego bufora ramek i/lub wyzwolenie operacji przełączania usterki w zależności od architektury pamięci systemowej.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1956">This flushes the canvas to the visible frame buffer and/or triggers a bugger toggle operation, depending on system memory architecture.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-1957">Ta usługa powinna być wywoływana tylko przez aplikację, aby zamknąć sekwencję rysowania rozpoczętą za pomocą gx_canvas_drawing_initiate().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1957">This service should only be called by the application to close a drawing sequence begun with gx_canvas_drawing_initiate().</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1958">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1958">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1959">**kanwa** Wskaźnik do bloku sterowania kanwy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1959">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1960">**flush (opróżnienie)** Jeśli **_GX_TRUE,_** zmiany kanwy zostaną opróżnione do ekranu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1960">**flush** If **_GX_TRUE_**, canvas changes are flushed to the display</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1961">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1961">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1962">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślne ukończenie rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1962">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful drawing completion</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1963">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1963">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1964">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1964">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1965">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1965">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-1966">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1966">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1967">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1967">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Complete drawing on “my_canvas” and flush to display. */
status = gx_canvas_drawing_complete(&my_canvas, GX_TRUE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the canvas drawing was successfully completed. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_drawing_initiate"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1974">gx_canvas_drawing_initiate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1974">gx_canvas_drawing_initiate</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-1975">Inicjowanie rysowania kanwy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1975">Initiate canvas drawing</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1976">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1976">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_drawing_initiate(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas,
    GX_WIDGET *who, 
    GX_RECTANGLE *dirty_area);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1977">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1977">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-1978">Ta usługa inicjuje rysowanie na określonej kanwie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1978">This service initiates drawing on the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1979">Ta usługa jest wywoływana wewnętrznie w ramach odroczonej operacji rysowania wykonywanej automatycznie przez graficzny interfejs użytkownika, gdy należy zaktualizować kanwę.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1979">This service is called internally as part of the deferred drawing operation performed automatically by GUIX when a canvas needs to be update.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1980">Jednak aplikacja może pominąć algorytm rysowania odroczonego w graficznym interfejsie GUIX i wykonać natychmiastowe i bezpośrednie rysowanie na kanwie, najpierw wywołując funkcję gx_canvas_drawing_inititate, a następnie wywołując żądane funkcje rysowania, a następnie wywołując funkcję gx_canvas_drawing_complete().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1980">However, the application is allowed bypass the GUIX deferred drawing algorithm and perform immediate and direct drawing on a canvas by first calling gx_canvas_drawing_inititate, then calling the desired drawing functions, then calling gx_canvas_drawing_complete().</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1981">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1981">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1982">**kanwa** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki kanwy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1982">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1983">**who (kto)** Wskaźnik do bloku sterowania widżetem elementu wywołującego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1983">**who** Pointer to widget control block of the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1984">Ten parametr służy do inicjowania obcinania rysowania i wyświetlania parametrów dla kolejnych operacji rysowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1984">This parameter is used to initialize the drawing clipping and view parameters for subsequent drawing operations.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1985">**dirty_area** Obszar do narysowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1985">**dirty_area** Area to draw within.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1986">Ten parametr jest przekazywany przez obiekt wywołujący, aby wskazać obszar, do którego obiekt wywołujący chce przycinać wszystkie operacje rysowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1986">This parameter is passed by the caller to indicate the area to which the caller wants all drawing operations clipped.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1987">Zazwyczaj jest to obszar wcześniej oznaczony jako zanieczyszczony, ale obiekt wywołujący może rozwinąć lub zawędzić obszar obcinania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1987">This is usually the area previously marked as dirty, but the caller is free to expand or contract the clipping area.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1988">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1988">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1989">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślne zainicjowanie rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1989">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful drawing initiation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1990">**GX_DRAW_NESTING_EXCEEDED** (0x05) Przekroczenie maksymalnej liczby zagnieżdżeń</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1990">**GX_DRAW_NESTING_EXCEEDED** (0x05) Exceed maximum nesting count</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1991">**GX_NO_VIEW** (0x03) Brak widoków dla wywołującego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1991">**GX_NO_VIEW** (0x03) No viewports for the caller</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1992">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1992">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1993">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1993">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-1994">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Nieprawidłowa kanwa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1994">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1995">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1995">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-1996">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1996">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-1997">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-1997">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Initiate drawing on “my_canvas”, my_widget.gx_widget_size
specify the area the application wants GUIX to redraw. */
status = gx_canvas_drawing_initiate(&my_canvas, &my_widget,
    &my_widget.gx_widget_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the canvas drawing was successfully initiated. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2002">gx_canvas_offset_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2002">gx_canvas_offset_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_ellipse_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2004">gx_canvas_ellipse_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2004">gx_canvas_ellipse_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2005">Rysowanie wielokropka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2005">Draw ellipse</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2006">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2006">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_ellipse_draw(
    INT xcenter, 
    INT ycenter, 
    INT a, 
    dINT b);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2007">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2007">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2008">Ta usługa rysuje wielokropek na kanwie przy użyciu bieżącego pędzla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2008">This service draws an ellipse on the canvas using the current brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2009">Wielokropek jest obcięty do kanwy w nieprawidłowym regionie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2009">The ellipse is clipped to the canvas invalid region.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2010">Ta usługa wymaga GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT zdefiniowanej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2010">This service requires GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2011">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2011">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2012">**xcenter** x-coord centrum wielokropka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2012">**xcenter** x-coord of center of the ellipse</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2013">**ycenter** y-coord of center of the ellipse (ycenter y-coord centrum wielokropka)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2013">**ycenter** y-coord of center of the ellipse</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2014">**a** Długość osi częściowo głównej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2014">**a** Length of the semi-major axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2015">**b** Długość osi częściowo pomocniczej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2015">**b** Length of the semi-minor axis</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2016">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2016">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2017">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślne rysowanie okręgów</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2017">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful circle draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2018">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2018">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2019">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Nieprawidłowa wartość</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2019">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2020">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Brak otwartego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2020">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2021">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2021">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2022">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2022">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2023">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2023">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw an ellipse of semi-major radius 100, semi-minor radius 50
    and centered at (200, 200). */
status = gx_canvas_ellipse_draw(200, 200, 100, 50);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the ellipse has been drawn on
    “my_canvas”. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2030">gx_canvas_pie_draw,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2030">gx_canvas_pie_draw,</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2031">gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2031">gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2033">gx_canvas_polygon_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2033">gx_canvas_polygon_draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2034">gx_canvas_rectangle_draw,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2034">gx_canvas_rectangle_draw,</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2035">gx_canvas_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2035">gx_canvas_text_draw</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2036">gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2036">gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2037">Wiązanie kanwy ze sprzętową warstwą grafiki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2037">Bind canvas to hardware graphics layer</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2038">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2038">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    INT layer);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2039">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2039">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2040">Ta usługa wiąże kanwę rysunku GUIX ze sprzętową warstwą grafiki.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2040">This service binds a GUIX drawing canvas to a hardware graphics layer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2041">Ta usługa jest wymagana tylko w przypadku urządzeń sprzętowych, które obsługują wiele sprzętowych warstw graficznych.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2041">This service is only required for hardware devices supporting multiple hardware graphics layers.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2042">Powiązanie kanwy ze sprzętową warstwą grafiki powoduje, że interfejsy API gx_canvas_show(), gx_canvas_hide(), gx_canvas_alpha_set() i gx_canvas_offset_set() są implementowane bezpośrednio przez usługi sterowników wyświetlania sprzętu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2042">Binding a canvas to a hardware graphics layer results in the gx_canvas_show(), gx_canvas_hide(), gx_canvas_alpha_set(), and gx_canvas_offset_set() APIs being implemented directly by hardware display driver services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2043">Jeśli sprzętowy sterownik wyświetlania nie obsługuje wielu warstw grafiki, ta usługa nie zwróci GX_INVALID_DISPLAY.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2043">If the hardware display driver does not support multiple graphics layers, this service will fail returning GX_INVALID_DISPLAY.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2044">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2044">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2045">**Kanwa** kanwy do zaimplementowania na sprzęcie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2045">**canvas** canvas to be implement in hardware</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2046">**warstwa** sprzętowa warstwa grafiki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2046">**layer** hardware graphics layer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2047">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2047">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2048">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślne powiązanie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2048">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful binding</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2049">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Display Layer Service nie jest zdefiniowana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2049">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Display layer service is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2050">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x17) Nieprawidłowe wskaźniki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2050">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x17) Invalid pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2051">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2051">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2052">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Nieprawidłowa kanwa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2052">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_hide"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2060">gx_canvas_hide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2060">gx_canvas_hide</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_hide(GX_CANVAS *canvas);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2063">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2063">Description</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2068">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2068">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2070">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Nieprawidłowa kanwa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2070">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2071">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x17) Nieprawidłowe wskaźniki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2071">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x17) Invalid pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2072">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2072">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

```C
    GX_VALUE y_start,
    GX_VALUE x_end, 
    GX_VALUE y_end);
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2100">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Brak otwartego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2100">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2101">**GX_INVALID_WIDTH** (0x1E) Nieprawidłowa szerokość pędzla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2101">**GX_INVALID_WIDTH** (0x1E) Invalid brush width</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_memory_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2117">gx_canvas_memory_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2117">gx_canvas_memory_define</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2118">Definiowanie pamięci kanwy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2118">Define canvas memory</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2119">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2119">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_memory_define(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_COLOR *memory,
    ULONG memsize);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2120">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2120">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2121">Ta usługa może służyć do przypisywania adresu pamięci kanwy po utworzeniu kanwy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2121">This service can be used to assign the canvas memory address after the canvas has been created.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2122">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2122">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2123">**kanwa** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonej kanwy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2123">**canvas** Pointer to previously created canvas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2124">**pamięć** Adres pamięci kanwy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2124">**memory** Canvas memory address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2125">**memsize** Rozmiar bloku pamięci kanwy w bajtach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2125">**memsize** Size of the canvas memory block in bytes</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2126">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2126">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2127">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślne przypisanie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2127">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful assignment</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2128">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Nieprawidłowy blok sterowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2128">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2129">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2129">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2130">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2130">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2131">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2131">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2132">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2132">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Assign canvas memory block. */
status = gx_canvas_memory_define(canvas,
    (GX_COLOR *) DRAM_MEMORY,
    (640 * 480 * 2));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the canvas memory pointer has be
reassigned. */

```

## <a name="gx_canvas_mouse_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2136">gx_canvas_mouse_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2136">gx_canvas_mouse_define</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2137">Definiowanie obrazu kursora myszy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2137">Define the mouse cursor image</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2138">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2138">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_mouse_define(GX_CANVAS *canvas,
    GX_MOUSE_CURSOR_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2139">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2139">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2140">Ta usługa definiuje informacje o myszy dla określonej kanwy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2140">This service defines mouse information for the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2141">Ta usługa wymaga GX_MOUSE_SUPPORT zdefiniowanej.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2141">This service requires GX_MOUSE_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2142">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2142">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2143">**kanwa** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki kanwy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2143">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2144">**info (informacje)** Wskaźnik do informacji o kursorze myszy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2144">**info** Pointer to mouse cursor information.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2145">**Dodatek I** zawiera definicję GX_MOUSE_CURSOR_INFO struktury.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2145">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_MOUSE_CURSOR_INFO structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2146">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2146">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2147">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Zestaw informacji o pomyślnym myszy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2147">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful mouse info set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2148">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2148">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2149">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2149">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2150">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2150">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2151">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2151">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2152">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2152">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set mouse cursor info. */
GX_MOUSE_CURSOR_INFO mouse_cursor;
mouse_cursor.gx_mouse_cursor_image_id = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_MOUSE;
mouse_cursor.gx_mouse_cursor_hotspot_x = 0;
mouse_cursor.gx_mouse_cursor_hotspot_y = 0;

status = gx_canvas_mouse_define(&my_canvas, &mouse_cursor);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the mouse info of “my_canvas” has been
set successfully. */

```

## <a name="gx_canvas_offset_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2195">gx_canvas_offset_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2195">gx_canvas_offset_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2196">Przypisywanie przesunięcia ekranu x,y kanwy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2196">Assign canvas x,y display offset</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2197">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2197">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_offset_set(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas,
    GX_VALUE x, 
    GX_VALUE y);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2198">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2198">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2199">Ta usługa przypisuje przesunięcie wyświetlania x,y dla określonej kanwy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2199">This service assigns an x,y display offset for the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2200">Pozwala to na sterowanie położeniem, w którym kanwa jest złożona z widocznym buforem ramek, i jest często używana, gdy kanwa jest mniejsza niż ekran fizyczny.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2200">This controls the position at which the canvas is composited into the visible frame buffer, and is often used when the canvas is smaller than the physical display.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2201">Jeśli kanwa została powiązana ze sprzętową warstwą grafiki przy użyciu interfejsu API gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind(), usługa gx_canvas_offset_set jest implementowane bezpośrednio przy użyciu obsługi sprzętowej.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2201">If the canvas has been bound to a hardware graphics layer using the gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind() API, the gx_canvas_offset_set service is implemented directly using hardware support.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2202">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2202">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2203">**kanwa** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki kanwy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2203">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2204">**Współrzędna** x X przesunięcia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2204">**x** X coordinate of offset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2205">**Współrzędna y** Y przesunięcia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2205">**y** Y coordinate of offset</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2206">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2206">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2207">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślne przypisanie przesunięcia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2207">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful assignment of offset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2208">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2208">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2209">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2209">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2210">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Nieprawidłowa kanwa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2210">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2211">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2211">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2212">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2212">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2213">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2213">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set display offset for “my_canvas”. */
status = gx_canvas_offset_set(&my_canvas, 20, 30);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the canvas drawing is now offset from
position 20,30. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_pie_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2223">gx_canvas_pie_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2223">gx_canvas_pie_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2224">Rysowanie koła</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2224">Draw pie</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2225">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2225">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_pie_draw(
    INT xcenter, 
    INT ycenter,
    UINT r, 
    INT start_angle, 
    INT end_angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2226">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2226">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2227">Ta usługa rysuje kołowe na kanwie przy użyciu bieżącego pędzla kontekstu rysowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2227">This service draws a pie into the canvas using the current drawing context brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2228">Obszar kołowy jest obcięty do kanwy w nieprawidłowym regionie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2228">The pie is clipped to the canvas invalid region.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2229">Ta usługa wymaga zdefiniowanej GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT konfiguracji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2229">This service requires the configuration option GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2230">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2230">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2231">**xcenter** x-position of center of the pie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2231">**xcenter** x-position of center of the pie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2232">**ycenter** y-position of center of the pie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2232">**ycenter** y-position of center of the pie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2233">**r** Radius koła</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2233">**r** Radius of the pie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2234">**start_angle** Kąt początkowy koła</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2234">**start_angle** Starting angle of the pie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2235">**end_angle** Końcowy kąt koła</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2235">**end_angle** Ending angle of the pie</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2236">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2236">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2237">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślne rysowanie łuku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2237">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful arc draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2238">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2238">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2239">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Nieprawidłowa wartość</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2239">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2240">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Brak otwartego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2240">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2241">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2241">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2243">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2243">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw a pie from 0 degree to 90 degree in clockwise. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pie has been drawn to canvas. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_pixel_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2256">gx_canvas_pixel_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2256">gx_canvas_pixel_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2257">Rysowanie pikseli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2257">Draw pixel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2258">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2258">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_pixel_draw(GX_POINT position);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2259">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2259">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2260">Ta usługa rysuje piksel na kanwie przy użyciu koloru linii bieżącego pędzla kontekstowego rysowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2260">This service draws a pixel on the canvas using the line color of the current drawing context brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2261">Jeśli zdefiniowano GX_BRUSH_ALPHA_SUPPORT konfiguracji, należy w przeciwnym razie wtopić piksel jako całkowicie nieprzezroczysty.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2261">If configuration option GX_BRUSH_ALPHA_SUPPORT is defined, blend the pixel with the otherwise, draw the pixel as fully opaque.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2262">**punkt** x,y położenie pikseli do narysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2262">**point** x,y position of pixel to draw</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2263">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2263">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2264">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślne rysowanie mapy pikseli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2264">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2265">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2265">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2266">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Brak otwartego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2266">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2267">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2267">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2268">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2268">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2269">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2269">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_POINT point; /* the x,y position you want to draw to */
GX_RECTANGLE drawto; /* the rectangle bounding your drawing */
GX_CANVAS *mycanvas; /* the canvas you want to draw to */

/* calculate 1x1 pixel drawing area: */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&drawto,
    point.gx_point_x, point.gx_point_y,
    point.gx_point_x, point.gx_point_y);

/* get my canvas: */
gx_widget_canvas_get(win, &mycanvas);

/* open my canvas for drawing: */
gx_canvas_drawing_initiate(mycanvas, win, &drawto);

/* setup my brush colors. Use any color ID in your resources: */
gx_context_line_color_set(GX_COLOR_ID_WINDOW_BORDER);

/* draw a pixel: */
status = gx_canvas_pixel_draw(point);

/* close the canvas: */
gx_canvas_drawing_complete(mycanvas, GX_TRUE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the pixel was successfully drawn to mycanvas. */
```
