## <a name="gx_canvas_pixelmap_blend"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2274">gx_canvas_pixelmap_blend</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2274">gx_canvas_pixelmap_blend</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2275">Blend pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2275">Blend pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2276">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2276">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_pixelmap_blend(
    GX_VALUE x_position,
    GX_VALUE y_position, 
    GX_PIXELMAP *pixelmap, 
    GX_UBYTE alpha);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2277">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2277">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2278">Ta usługa łączy mapę pikseli z tłem kanwy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2278">This service blends a pixelmap with the canvas background.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2279">Współczynnik mieszania jest określony przez wywołującego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2279">The blending ratio is specified by the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2280">Wartość alfa może być z zakresu od 0 (w pełni przezroczysta) do 255 (w pełni nieprzezroczysta).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2280">The alpha value can range from 0 (fully transparent) to 255 (fully opaque).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2281">Mapa pikseli może również zawierać wewnętrzny kanał alfa, który jest połączony z wartością mieszania przychodzącego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2281">The pixelmap may also include an internal alpha channel, which is combined with the incoming blending value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2282">Ta usługa jest obsługiwana tylko przez sterowniki wyświetlania działające na głębokości kolorów 16 bpp lub wyższej.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2282">This service is only supported by display drivers running at 16-bpp color depth and higher.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2283">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2283">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2284">**x_start** Początkowa pozycja x mapy pikseli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2284">**x_start** Starting x-position of the pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2285">**y_end** Początkowa pozycja y mapy pikseli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2285">**y_end** Starting y-position of the pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2286">**pixelmap** Wskaźnik do mapy pikseli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2286">**pixelmap** Pointer to pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2287">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2287">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2288">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślne rysowanie mapy pikseli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2288">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2289">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2289">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2290">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2290">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2291">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) Nie są obsługiwane</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2291">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) Not supported</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2292">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Brak otwartego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2292">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2293">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2293">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2294">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2294">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2295">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2295">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw pixelmap on active canvas */

GX_PIXELMAP *map;
gx_system_pixelmap_get(ID_MY_PIXELMAP, &map);

status = gx_canvas_pixelmap_blend(10, 20, map, 128);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap has been blended onto the current canvas. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2341">gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2341">gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2342">Rysowanie obróconej mapy pikseli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2342">Draw rotated pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2343">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2343">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate(
    GX_VALUE x_position, 
    GX_VALUE y_position,
    GX_PIXELMAP *pixelmap, 
    INT angle,
    INT rot_cx, 
    INT rot_cy);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2344">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2344">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2345">Ta usługa obraca mapę pikseli pod określonym kątem i renderuje mapę pikseli na kanwie bezpośrednio podczas obracania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2345">This service rotates a pixelmap at the specified angle and renders the pixelmap to the canvas directly as the rotation is performed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2346">Ta usługa różni się gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate tym, że dane wyjściowe obrotu są bezpośrednio renderowane w pamięci kanwy, a obracana mapa pikseli nie jest zwracana do obiektu wywołującego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2346">This service differs from gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate in that the output of the rotation is directly rendered to the canvas memory, and the rotated pixelmap is not returned to the caller.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2347">Zaletą tej usługi w porównaniu gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate jest to, że do przechowywania obróconej mapy pikseli nie jest wymagana żadna dodatkowa pamięć.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2347">The advantage of this service over gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate is that no additional memory is required to hold the rotated pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2348">Wadą jest to, że kod obrotu musi być wykonywany za każdym razem, gdy mapa pikseli jest rysowana.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2348">The disadvantage is that the rotation code must be executed each time the pixelmap is drawn.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2349">Przycinanie i sprawdzanie poprawności ekranu są wymuszane podczas renderowania obróconej mapy pikseli.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2349">Clipping and viewport validation are enforced during rendering of the rotated pixelmap.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2350">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2350">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2351">**x_position** Uruchamianie x-położenie mapy pikseli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2351">**x_position** Starting x-position of the pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2352">**y_position** Początkowa pozycja y mapy pikseli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2352">**y_position** Starting y-position of the pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2353">**mapa pikseli** Wskaźnik do mapy pikseli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2353">**pixelmap** Pointer to pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2354">**kąt** Kąt do rotacji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2354">**angle** Angle to rotate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2355">**rot_cx** X-koord środka obrotu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2355">**rot_cx** X-coord of center of rotation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2356">Jeśli ta wartość jest ustawiona na -1, środek obrazu jest używany jako środek obrotu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2356">If this value is set to -1, the center of the image is used as the rotation center.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2357">**rot_cy** Y-coord środka obrotu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2357">**rot_cy** Y-coord of center of rotation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2358">Jeśli ta wartość jest ustawiona na -1, środek obrazu jest używany jako środek obrotu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2358">If this value is set to -1, the center of the image is used as the center of rotation.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2359">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2359">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2360">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślne rysowanie mapy pikseli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2360">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2361">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2361">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2362">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2362">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2363">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Brak otwartego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2363">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

```C
/* rotate “src_pixelmap” by 30 degree in clockwise direction and draw in on canvas. */
status = gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate(10, 20, &my_pixelmap, 30,
    -1, -1);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the rotated pixelmap “my_pixelmap” has been drawn. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_pixelmap_tile"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2372">gx_canvas_pixelmap_tile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2372">gx_canvas_pixelmap_tile</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2373">Mapa pikseli kafelka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2373">Tile pixelmap</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_pixelmap_tile(
    GX_RECTANGLE *fill,
    GX_PIXELMAP *pixelmap);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2375">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2375">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2376">Ta usługa wypełnia prostokąt w obrębie kanwy żądaną mapą pikseli.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2376">This service fills a rectangle within a canvas with the requested pixelmap.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2378">**fill (wypełnienie)** Obszar do kafelka z mapą pikseli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2378">**fill** Area to tile with pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2379">**mapa pikseli** Wskaźnik do mapy pikseli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2379">**pixelmap** Pointer to pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2380">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2380">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2381">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślne mapowanie pikseli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2381">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap tile</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2382">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2382">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2383">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2383">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2384">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Brak otwartego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2384">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2385">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar wypełnienia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2385">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid fill size</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2406">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Brak otwartego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2406">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

```C
{
    { 208, 63 },
    { 274, 63 },
    { 274, 163 },
    { 208, 163 }
};
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2449">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2449">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2450">Rysowanie tekstu obróconego o punkt środkowy (przestarzałe)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2450">Draw text rotated about a center point (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2451">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2451">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw(
    const GX_CHAR *text,
    GX_VALUE xCenter, 
    GX_VALUE yCenter, 
    INT angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2452">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2452">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2453">Ten interfejs API został wycofany na rzecz lub gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2453">This API has been deprecated in favor or gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext().</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2454">Mimo że są one nadal obsługiwane, nowe aplikacje nie powinny używać tego interfejsu API i zamiast tego powinny używać gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2454">While still supported, new applications should not use this API and should instead use gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2455">Ta usługa rysuje tekst na kanwie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2455">This service draws text to the canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2456">Tekst jest rysowany obrócony o żądany punkt środkowy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2456">The text is drawn rotated about the requested center point.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2457">Bieżąca czcionka kontekstu rysowania i kolor linii kontekstu rysowania są używane do renderowania tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2457">The current drawing context font and drawing context line color is used to render the text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2458">Ta usługa używa funkcji gx_utility_string_to_alphamap do renderowania ciągu tekstowego do tymczasowej mapy pikseli 8bpp zawierającej tylko wartość alfa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2458">This service uses the function gx_utility_string_to_alphamap to render the text string to a temporary 8bpp pixelmap containing only alpha value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2459">Następnie usługa obraca mapę alfamap przy użyciu funkcji gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2459">The service then rotates the alphamap using the function gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2460">Po zrenderowania końcowej mapy alfa na kanwie ta usługa powoduje wolne tymczasowej mapy alfamapy i skojarzonej pamięci.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2460">After the final alphamap is rendered to the canvas, this service frees the temporary alphamap and associated memory.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2461">Ponieważ tymczasowa mapa alfamapy jest wymagana do renderowania obróconego tekstu, przed próbą narysowania obróconego tekstu aplikacja musi skonfigurować gx_system_memory_allocator przez wywołujący interfejs API gx_system_memory_allocator_set().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2461">Since a temporary alphamap is required to render rotated text, the application must configure the gx_system_memory_allocator by the calling gx_system_memory_allocator_set() API before attempting to draw rotated text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2462">Tej usługi należy używać tylko do renderowania obracanego tekstu "jeden raz".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2462">This service should only be used to render rotated text “one time”.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2463">Jeśli ten sam ciąg tekstowy zostanie narysowany wiele razy w różnych lokalizacjach lub różnych kątach obrotu, bardziej efektywne jest użycie funkcji narzędzia gx_utility_string_to_alphamap() w celu utworzenia tekstu alfamapy raz, a następnie wielokrotne użycie funkcji gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate do wielokrotnego obracania wynikowej mapy alfamapy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2463">If the same text string will be drawn multiple times at different locations or different rotation angles, it is more efficient to use the utility function gx_utility_string_to_alphamap() to create the text alphamap once, then use gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate multiple times to rotate the resulting alphamap repeatedly.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2464">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2464">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2465">**text (tekst)** Ciąg tekstowy do narysu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2465">**text** Text string to be drawn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2466">**xCenter** Wyśrodkuj położenie wokół tekstu, wokół którego zostanie obrócony tekst.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2466">**xCenter** Center positon around which text will be rotated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2467">**yCenter** Wyśrodkowana pozycja, wokół której zostanie obrócony tekst.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2467">**yCenter** Center position around which text will be rotated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2468">**kąt** Żądany kąt obrotu tekstu w stopniach.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2468">**angle** The desired text rotation angle, in degrees.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2469">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2469">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2470">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślne renderowanie tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2470">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text rendering</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2471">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2471">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2472">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2472">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2473">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Niewystarczająca ilość dostępnej pamięci lub gx_system_memory_allocator nie została przypisana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2473">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Insufficient memory available or gx_system_memory_allocator has not been assigned</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2474">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Nieprawidłowa długość ciągu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2474">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2475">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2475">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2476">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2476">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2477">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2477">Example</span></span>

```C
void my_window_draw(GX_WINDOW *window)
{

    GX_VALUE xpos = 100;
    GX_VALUE ypos = 100;
    INT dynamic_count = 1234567;
    GX_CHAR dynamic_text[10];

    /* Call default window draw routine. */
    gx_window_draw(window);

    /* Set font. */
    gx_context_font_set(GX_FONT_ID_SMALL_BOLD);

    /* Convert int value to string. */
    gx_utility_ltoa(dynamic_count, dynamic_text, 20);

    /* Draw rotate text. */
    gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw(dynamic_text, xpos, ypos, 45);
}
```

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2486">Rysowanie tekstu obróconego o punkt środkowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2486">Draw text rotated about a center point</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext(
    GX_CONST GX_STRING *text,

    GX_VALUE yCenter, 
    INT angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2488">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2488">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2489">Ta usługa rysuje tekst na kanwie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2489">This service draws text to the canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2490">Tekst jest rysowany obrócony o żądany punkt środkowy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2490">The text is drawn rotated about the requested center point.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2491">Bieżąca czcionka kontekstu rysowania i kolor linii kontekstu rysowania są używane do renderowania tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2491">The current drawing context font and drawing context line color is used to render the text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2492">Ta usługa używa funkcji gx_utility_string_to_alphamap do renderowania ciągu tekstowego do tymczasowej mapy pikseli 8bpp zawierającej tylko wartość alfa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2492">This service uses the function gx_utility_string_to_alphamap to render the text string to a temporary 8bpp pixelmap containing only alpha value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2493">Następnie usługa obraca mapę alfamapy przy użyciu funkcji gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2493">The service then rotates the alphamap using the function gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2494">Po zrenderowania końcowej mapy alfa na kanwie ta usługa powoduje wolne tymczasowej mapy alfamapy i skojarzonej pamięci.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2494">After the final alphamap is rendered to the canvas, this service frees the temporary alphamap and associated memory.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2495">Ponieważ do renderowania obróconego tekstu jest wymagana tymczasowa mapa alfamapy, aplikacja musi skonfigurować gx_system_memory_allocator przez wywołujący interfejs ***API*** gx_system_memory_allocator_set przed próbą narysowania obróconego tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2495">Since a temporary alphamap is required to render rotated text, the application must configure the gx_system_memory_allocator by the calling ***gx_system_memory_allocator_set*** API before attempting to draw rotated text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2496">Tej usługi należy używać tylko do renderowania obracanego tekstu "jeden raz".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2496">This service should only be used to render rotated text “one time”.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2497">Jeśli ten sam ciąg tekstowy zostanie narysowany wiele razy w różnych lokalizacjach lub różnych kątach obrotu, bardziej efektywne jest użycie funkcji narzędzia gx_utility_string_to_alphamap() w celu utworzenia tekstu alfamapy raz, a następnie wielokrotne użycie funkcji gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate do wielokrotnego obracania wynikowej mapy alfamapy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2497">If the same text string will be drawn multiple times at different locations or different rotation angles, it is more efficient to use the utility function gx_utility_string_to_alphamap() to create the text alphamap once, then use gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate multiple times to rotate the resulting alphamap repeatedly.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2498">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2498">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2499">**text (tekst)** Ciąg tekstowy do narysu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2499">**text** Text string to be drawn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2500">**xCenter** Wyśrodkuj położenie wokół tekstu, wokół którego zostanie obrócony tekst.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2500">**xCenter** Center positon around which text will be rotated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2501">**yCenter** Wyśrodkowana pozycja, wokół której zostanie obrócony tekst.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2501">**yCenter** Center position around which text will be rotated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2502">**kąt** Żądany kąt obrotu tekstu w stopniach.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2502">**angle** The desired text rotation angle, in degrees.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2503">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2503">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2504">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślne renderowanie tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2504">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text rendering</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2505">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2505">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2506">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2506">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2507">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Nieprawidłowy kontekst rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2507">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Invalid draw context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2508">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Niewystarczająca ilość gx_system_memory_allocator nie została przypisana.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2508">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Insufficient memory available or gx_system_memory_allocator has not been assigned.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2509">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Nieprawidłowa długość ciągu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2509">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2510">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2510">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2511">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2511">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2512">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2512">Example</span></span>

```C
void my_window_draw(GX_WINDOW *window)
{

    GX_VALUE xpos = 100;
    GX_VALUE ypos = 100;
    INT dynamic_count = 1234567;
    GX_CHAR dynamic_text[10];
    GX_STRING string;

    /* Call default window draw routine. */
    gx_window_draw(window);

    /* Set font. */
    gx_context_font_set(GX_FONT_ID_SMALL_BOLD);

    /* Convert int value to string. */
    gx_utility_ltoa(dynamic_count, dynamic_text, 20);

    string.gx_string_ptr = dynamic_text;
    string.gx_string_length = strlen(dynamic_text);

    /* Draw rotate text. */
    gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext(&string, xpos, ypos, 45);
}
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_shift"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2520">gx_canvas_shift</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2520">gx_canvas_shift</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2521">Shift canvas by x,y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2521">Shift canvas by x,y</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2522">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2522">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_shift(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_VALUE x, GX_VALUE y);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2523">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2523">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2524">Ta usługa przesuwa określone przesunięcie kanwy o określoną kwotę.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2524">This service shifts the specified canvas offset by the specified amount.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2525">Ma to wpływ na pozycję, w której kanwa jest renderowana w widocznym buforze ramek.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2525">This affects the position at which the canvas is rendered within the visible frame buffer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2526">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2526">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2527">**kanwa** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki kanwy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2527">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2528">**x** Pikseli do przesunięcia na osi X</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2528">**x** Pixels to shift on the X axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2529">y Pixels to shift on the Y axis **(y** Piksele do przesunięcia na osi Y)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2529">**y** Pixels to shift on the Y axis</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2530">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2530">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2531">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślne przesunięcie kanwy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2531">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful canvas shift</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2532">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2532">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2533">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2533">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2534">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Nieprawidłowa kanwa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2534">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2535">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2535">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2537">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2537">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Shift canvas “my_canvas”. */
status = gx_canvas_shift(&my_canvas, 10, 15);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the canvas has been shifted by 10 pixels
    on the X axis and 15 on the Y axis. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_show"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2544">gx_canvas_show</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2544">gx_canvas_show</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2545">Aby kanwa była widoczna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2545">Make a canvas visible</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2546">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2546">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_show(GX_CANVAS *canvas);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2547">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2547">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2548">Ta usługa sprawia, że kanwa jest widoczna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2548">This service makes a canvas visible.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2549">Jeśli kanwa została wcześniej powiązana ze sprzętową warstwą grafiki przy użyciu interfejsu API gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind(), usługa gx_canvas_show() jest implementowane bezpośrednio przy użyciu obsługi sprzętowej.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2549">If the canvas has been previously bound to a hardware graphics layer using the gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind() API, the gx_canvas_show() service is implemented directly using hardware support.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2550">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2550">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2551">**kanwa** Wskaźnik do bloku sterowania kanwy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2551">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2552">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2552">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2553">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślne przypisanie przesunięcia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2553">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful assignment of offset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2554">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2554">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2555">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2555">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2556">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Nieprawidłowa kanwa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2556">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2557">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2557">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2558">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2558">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2559">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2559">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Make this canvas visible. */
status = gx_canvas_show(&my_canvas);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the canvas drawing is now visible */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2568">gx_canvas_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2568">gx_canvas_text_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2569">Rysowanie tekstu (przestarzałe)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2569">Draw text (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2570">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2570">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_text_draw(
    GX_VALUE x_start, 
    GX_VALUE y_start,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *string, 
    INT length);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2571">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2571">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2572">Ta usługa rysuje tekst na kanwie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2572">This service draws text on the canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2573">Ten interfejs API, mimo że jest nadal obsługiwany, jest przestarzały, a nowe aplikacje powinny zamiast tego używać funkcji gx_canvas_text_draw_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2573">This API, while still supported, is deprecated and new applications should instead use gx_canvas_text_draw_ext().</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2574">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2574">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2575">**x_start** Uruchamianie współrzędnych x dla tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2575">**x_start** Starting x-coordinate for text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2576">**y_start** Początkowa współrzędna y dla tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2576">**y_start** Starting y-coordinate for text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2577">**ciąg** Wskaźnik do ciągu do narysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2577">**string** Pointer to string to draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2578">**długość** Jeśli długość >= 0, ogranicza liczbę znaków rysowanych do długości.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2578">**length** If length >= 0, limits the number of characters drawn to length.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2579">Jeśli długość < 0, cały ciąg aż do zakończenia NULL zostanie narysowany.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2579">If length < 0, the entire string until NULL terminator is drawn.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2580">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2580">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2581">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślne rysowanie tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2581">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2582">**GX_FAILURE** (0x1E) Nieudane rysowanie tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2582">**GX_FAILURE** (0x1E) Failed text draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2583">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2583">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2584">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2584">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2585">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Brak otwartego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2585">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2586">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Nieprawidłowa długość ciągu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2586">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2587">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2587">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2588">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2588">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2589">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2589">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw text “example” on current canvas”. */
status = gx_canvas_text_draw(10, 20, “example”, 7);

/* Draw all of a string of unknown length on the current canvas */
status = gx_canvas_text_draw(10, 40, string_ptr, -1);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text “example” has been drawn. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_text_draw_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2602">gx_canvas_text_draw_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2602">gx_canvas_text_draw_ext</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2603">Rysowanie tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2603">Draw text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2604">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2604">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_text_draw_ext(
    GX_VALUE x_start, 
    GX_VALUE y_start,
    GX_CONST GX_STRING *string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2605">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2605">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2606">Ta usługa rysuje tekst na kanwie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2606">This service draws text on the canvas.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2607">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2607">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2608">**x_start** Uruchamianie współrzędnych x dla tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2608">**x_start** Starting x-coordinate for text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2609">**y_start** Początkowa współrzędna y dla tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2609">**y_start** Starting y-coordinate for text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2610">**ciąg** Wskaźnik do ciągu do narysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2610">**string** Pointer to string to draw</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2611">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2611">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2612">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślne rysowanie tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2612">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2613">**GX_FAILURE** (0x1E) Nieudany rysowanie tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2613">**GX_FAILURE** (0x1E) Failed text draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2614">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2614">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2615">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2615">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2616">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Brak otwartego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2616">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2617">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Nieprawidłowa długość ciągu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2617">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2618">**GX_INVALID_FONT** (0x16) Nieprawidłowa czcionka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2618">**GX_INVALID_FONT** (0x16) Invalid font</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2619">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2619">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2621">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2621">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_STRING string;
string.gx_string_ptr = “example”;
string.gx_string_length = 7;
```

## <a name="gx_checkbox_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2634">gx_checkbox_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2634">gx_checkbox_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2635">Pole wyboru Utwórz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2635">Create checkbox</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2636">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2636">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_checkbox_create(
    GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT checkbox_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2637">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2637">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2638">Ta usługa tworzy widżet pola wyboru z określonymi właściwościami.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2638">This service creates a checkbox widget with the specified properties.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2639">GX_CHECKBOX pochodzi od GX_TEXT_BUTTON, a wszystkie usługi gx_text_button mogą być używane z GX_CHECKBOX widgetami.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2639">GX_CHECKBOX is derived from GX_TEXT_BUTTON, and all gx_text_button services may be used with GX_CHECKBOX widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2640">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2640">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2641">**pole wyboru** Wskaźnik do nazwy bloku kontrolki pola wyboru Nazwa logiczna widżetu pola wyboru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2641">**checkbox** Pointer to checkbox control block name Logical name of checkbox widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2642">**element nadrzędny** Wskaźnik do widżetu nadrzędnego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2642">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2643">**text_id** Identyfikator zasobu tekstu pola wyboru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2643">**text_id** Resource ID of checkbox text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2644">**style (styl)** Styl pola wyboru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2644">**style** Style of checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2645">**Dodatek D** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane style ogólne dla wszystkich widżetów, a także style specyficzne dla widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2645">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2646">**checkbox_id** Pole wyboru Identyfikator zdefiniowany przez aplikację</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2646">**checkbox_id** Application-defined ID of checkbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2647">**rozmiar** Wymiary pola wyboru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2647">**size** Dimensions of checkbox</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2648">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2648">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2649">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślne utworzenie pola wyboru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2649">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful checkbox create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2650">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2650">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2651">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2651">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2652">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget już utworzony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2652">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2653">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2653">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2654">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2654">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2655">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2655">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2656">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2656">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_checkbox”. */
status = gx_checkbox_create(&my_checkbox, “my_checkbox”,
    &my_parent,
    MY_CHECKBOX_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
    MY_CHECKBOX_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the checkbox “my_checkbox” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_checkbox_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2661">gx_checkbox_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2661">gx_checkbox_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2662">Pole wyboru Rysowanie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2662">Draw checkbox</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2663">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2663">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_checkbox_draw(GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2664">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2664">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2665">Ta usługa rysuje określone pole wyboru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2665">This service draws the specified checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2666">Ta funkcja jest zwykle wywoływana wewnętrznie przez mechanizm odświeżania kanwy GUIX, ale jest udostępniane aplikacji, aby pomóc w implementacji niestandardowych funkcji rysowania dla niestandardowych widżetów pola wyboru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2666">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom checkbox widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2667">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2667">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2668">**pole wyboru** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki pola wyboru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2668">**checkbox** Pointer to checkbox control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2669">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2669">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2670">**Brak**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2670">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2671">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2671">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2672">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2672">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2673">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2673">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom checkbox draw function. */
VOID custom_checkbox_draw(GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox)
{
    /* Call default checkbox draw. */
    gx_checkbox_draw(checkbox);

    /* Add custom drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_checkbox_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2678">gx_checkbox_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2678">gx_checkbox_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2679">Zdarzenie pola wyboru Procesu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2679">Process checkbox event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2680">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2680">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_checkbox_event_process(
    GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox, 
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2681">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2681">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2682">Ta usługa przetwarza zdarzenie dla określonego pola wyboru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2682">This service processes an event for the specified checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2683">Ta usługa powinna być wywoływana jako domyślna procedura obsługi zdarzeń przez dowolne niestandardowe funkcje przetwarzania zdarzeń pola wyboru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2683">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom checkbox event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2684">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2684">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2685">**pole wyboru** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki pola wyboru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2685">**checkbox** Pointer to checkbox control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2686">**event_ptr** Wskaźnik do zdarzenia do przetwarzania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2686">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2687">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2687">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2688">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Powodzenie procesu zdarzenia pola wyboru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2688">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful checkbox event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2689">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2689">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2690">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2690">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2691">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2691">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2692">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2692">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2693">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2693">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2694">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2694">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic checkbox event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_checkbox_event_process(GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default checkbox
            event processing */
        status = gx_checkbox_event_process(checkbox, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_checkbox_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2699">gx_checkbox_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2699">gx_checkbox_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2700">Pole wyboru Set pixelmap for (Ustaw mapę pikseli dla)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2700">Set pixelmap for checkbox</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2701">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2701">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_checkbox_pixelmap_set(
    GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID unchecked_id, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID checked_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID unchecked_disabled_id, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID checked_disabled_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2702">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2702">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2703">Ta usługa przypisuje mapy pikseli, które mają być wyświetlane przez określone pole wyboru dla każdego stanu pola wyboru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2703">This service assigns the pixelmaps to be displayed by the specified checkbox for each checkbox state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2704">Identyfikatory zasobów mogą być zduplikowane.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2704">The resource IDs can be duplicated.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2705">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2705">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2706">**pole wyboru** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki pola wyboru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2706">**checkbox** Pointer to checkbox control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2707">**unchecked_id** Mapa pikseli używana dla stanu niezaznaczonego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2707">**unchecked_id** Pixelmap used for unchecked state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2708">**checked_id** Mapa pikseli używana dla stanu zaznaczonego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2708">**checked_id** Pixelmap used for checked state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2709">**unchecked_disabled_id** Mapa pikseli używana dla pola wyboru wyłączonego i niezaznaczonego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2709">**unchecked_disabled_id** Pixelmap used for a disabled and unchecked checkbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2710">**checked_disabled_id** Pole wyboru Pixelmap używane dla wyłączonego i zaznaczonego pola wyboru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2710">**checked_disabled_id** Pixelmap used for a disabled and checked checkbox</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2711">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2711">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2712">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Powodzenie zaznacz pole wyboru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2712">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful checkbox select</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2713">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2713">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2714">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widżet jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2714">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2715">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2715">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2716">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2716">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2717">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2717">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Select “my_checkbox”. */
status = gx_checkbox_pixelmap_set(&my_checkbox,
    PIXELMAP_UNCHECKED_ID,
    PIXELMAP_CHECKED_ID, PIXELMAP_UNCHECKED_DISABLED_ID,
    PIXELMAP_CHECKED_SIABLED_ID));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmaps are assigned to the checkbox “my_checkbox” */
```

## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_angle_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2741">gx_circular_gauge_angle_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2741">gx_circular_gauge_angle_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2742">Uzyskiwanie bieżącego kąta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2742">Get current angle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2743">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2743">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_circular_gauge_angle_get(
    GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge, 
    INT *angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2744">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2744">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2745">Ta usługa pobiera bieżący kąt igieł widżetu miernika cyklicznego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2745">This service retrieves the current needle angle of circular gauge widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2746">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2746">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2747">**miernik** Wskaźnik do bloku sterowania miernika cyklicznego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2747">**gauge** Pointer to circular gauge control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2748">**kąt** Bieżący kąt nagłowy do pobrania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2748">**angle** Current needle angle to be retrieved</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2749">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2749">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2750">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślne uzyskiwanie kąta miernika cyklicznego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2750">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful circular gauge angle get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2751">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2751">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2752">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2752">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2753">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2753">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2754">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2754">Example</span></span>

```C
INT current_angle;

/* Retrieve the current needle angle of “my_gauge”. */
status = gx_circular_gauge_angle_get(&my_gauge, &current_angle);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the current needle angle of “my_gauge” has been retrieved. */
```

```C
UINT gx_circular_gauge_angle_set(

    INT angle);
```

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2766">Ta usługa ustawia kąt docelowy widżetu z okrągłym miernikiem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2766">This service sets the target angle of a circular gauge widget.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_animation_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2784">gx_circular_gauge_animation_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2784">gx_circular_gauge_animation_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2785">Ustawianie parametrów animacji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2785">Set animation parameters</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2786">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2786">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_circular_gauge_animation_set(
    GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge,
    INT steps, 
    INT delay);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2787">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2787">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2788">Ta usługa ustawia kroki animacji i czas opóźnienia dla widżetu miernika cyklicznego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2788">This service sets animation steps and delay time for a circular gauge widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2789">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2789">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2790">**miernik** Wskaźnik do bloku sterowania miernika cyklicznego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2790">**gauge** Pointer to circular gauge control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2791">**kroki** Łączna liczba kroków dla jednej rotacji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2791">**steps** Total steps for one rotation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2792">**opóźnienie** Czas opóźnienia dla każdego kroku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2792">**delay** Delay time for every step</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2793">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2793">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2794">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pole wyboru Powodzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2794">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful checkbox select</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2795">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2795">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2796">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2796">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2797">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Nieprawidłowa wartość</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2797">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2798">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2798">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2799">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2799">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2800">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2800">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set animation steps and delay time of circular gauge “my_gauge”
    to 30 and 1, the needle of “my_gauge” will rotate from
    current angle to target angle by 30 steps with 1 tick delay between every step. */
status = gx_circular_gauge_animation_set(&my_gauge, 30, 1);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the steps and delay time of “my_gauge” has been set. */
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2810">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2810">Prototype</span></span>

```C

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2811">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2811">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2812">Ta usługa rysuje tło określonego miernika cyklicznego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2812">This service draws background of the specified circular gauge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2813">Ta usługa jest zwykle wywoływana wewnętrznie przez funkcję gx_circular_gauge_draw, ale jest narażona na aplikację, aby pomóc w pisaniu niestandardowych funkcji rysowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2813">This service is normally called internally by the gx_circular_gauge_draw function, but is exposed to the application to assist in writing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2814">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2814">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2819">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2819">Threads</span></span>

```C

gx_circular_gauge_background_draw(&my_circular_gauge);
```

## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2828">gx_circular_gauge_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2828">gx_circular_gauge_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2829">Tworzenie okrągłych mierników</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2829">Create circular gauge</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2830">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2830">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_circular_gauge_create(
    GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE_INFO *info,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID background_id,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT circular_gauge_id,
    GX_VALUE xpos,
    GX_VALUE ypos);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2831">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2831">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2832">Ta usługa tworzy widżet miernika cyklicznego z określonymi właściwościami.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2832">This service creates a circular gauge widget with the specified properties.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2833">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2833">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2834">**miernik** Wskaźnik do bloku sterowania miernika cyklicznego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2834">**gauge** Pointer to circular gauge control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2835">**name (nazwa)** Nazwa logiczna widżetu miernika cyklicznego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2835">**name** Logical name of circular gauge widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2836">**element nadrzędny** Wskaźnik do widżetu nadrzędnego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2836">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2837">**info (informacje)** Wskaźnik do struktury informacji miernika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2837">**info** Pointer to the gauge information structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2838">**Dodatek I** zawiera definicję GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE_INFO struktury</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2838">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE_INFO structure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2839">**background_id** Identyfikator zasobu mapy pikseli tła miernika cyklicznego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2839">**background_id** Resource ID of circular gauge background pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2840">**style (styl)** Styl okrągłych mierników.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2840">**style** Style of circular gauge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2841">**Dodatek D** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane style ogólne dla wszystkich widżetów, a także style specyficzne dla widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2841">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2842">**circular_gauge_id** Zdefiniowany przez aplikację identyfikator miernika cyklicznego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2842">**circular_gauge_id** Application-defined ID of circular gauge</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2843">**xpos** Położenie miernika x-współrzędnych</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2843">**xpos** Gauge x-coordinate position</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2844">**ypos** Położenie współrzędnych y miernika</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2844">**ypos** Gauge y-coordinate position</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2845">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2845">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2846">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pole wyboru Powodzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2846">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful checkbox select</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2847">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2847">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2848">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2848">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2849">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar bloku sterowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2849">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2850">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2850">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2851">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2851">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2852">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2852">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2853">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2853">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE gauge_info;

gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_animation_steps = 30;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_animation_delay = 1;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_needle_xpos = 140;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_needle_ypos = 140;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_neelde_xcor = 20;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_neelde_ycor = 88;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_needle_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_NEEDLE;

/* Create “my_gauge”. */
status = gx_circular_gauge_create(&my_gauge, “my_gauge”,
            &my_parent,
            &gauge_info, MY_PIXELMAP_RESOURCE_ID, GX_NULL,
            MY_ICON_ID, 5, 30);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the circular gauge “my_gauge” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2861">gx_circular_gauge_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2861">gx_circular_gauge_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2862">Rysowanie okrągłych mierników</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2862">Draw circular gauge</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2863">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2863">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_circular_gauge_draw(GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2864">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2864">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2865">Ta usługa rysuje określony okrągły miernik.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2865">This service draws the specified circular gauge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2866">Ta funkcja jest zwykle wywoływana wewnętrznie przez mechanizm odświeżania kanwy GUIX, ale jest udostępniane aplikacji, aby pomóc w implementacji niestandardowych funkcji rysowania dla widżetów mierników niestandardowych.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2866">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom gauge widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2867">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2867">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2868">**miernik** Wskaźnik do bloku sterowania miernika cyklicznego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2868">**gauge** Pointer to circular gauge control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2869">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2869">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2870">**Brak**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2870">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2871">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2871">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2872">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2872">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2873">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2873">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom circular gauge draw function. */
VOID custom_gauge_draw(GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge)
{
    /* Call default circular gauge draw. */
    gx_circular_gauge_draw(gauge);

    /* Add custom drawing here. */
}
```
