## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2881">gx_circular_gauge_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2881">gx_circular_gauge_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2882">Przetwarzanie zdarzenia miernika cyklicznego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2882">Process circular gauge event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2883">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2883">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_circular_gauge_event_process(
    GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2884">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2884">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2885">Ta usługa przetwarza zdarzenie dla określonego miernika cyklicznego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2885">This service processes an event for the specified circular gauge.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2886">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2886">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2887">**miernik** Wskaźnik do bloku sterowania miernika</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2887">**gauge** Pointer to gauge control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2888">**event_ptr** Wskaźnik do zdarzenia do przetwarzania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2888">**event_ptr** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2889">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2889">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2890">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślny proces zdarzenia miernika</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2890">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful gauge event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2891">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2891">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2892">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2892">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2893">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2893">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2894">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2894">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2895">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2895">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic circular gauge event processing as part of custom event processing function. */
UINT custom_gauge_event_process(GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default circular gauge
             event processing */
        status = gx_circular_gauge_event_process(gauge, event);
        break;
}
return status;
```

## <a name="gx_context_brush_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2930">gx_context_brush_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2930">gx_context_brush_define</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2931">Definiowanie pędzla bieżącego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2931">Define brush of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2932">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2932">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_brush_define(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID line_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID fill_color_id, 
    UINT style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2933">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2933">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2934">Ta usługa definiuje pędzl bieżącego kontekstu rysowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2934">This service defines the brush of the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2935">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2935">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2936">**line_color_id** Identyfikator zasobu koloru linii.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2936">**line_color_id** Resource ID of line color.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2937">**Dodatek B** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane identyfikatory zasobów kolorów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2937">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2938">Należy pamiętać, że aplikacja może również dodawać niestandardowe identyfikatory zasobów w kolorze.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2938">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2939">**fill_color_id** Identyfikator zasobu koloru wypełnienia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2939">**fill_color_id** Resource ID of fill color.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2940">**Dodatek B** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane identyfikatory zasobów kolorów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2940">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2941">Należy pamiętać, że aplikacja może również dodawać niestandardowe identyfikatory zasobów w kolorze.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2941">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2942">**style (styl)** Styl pędzla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2942">**style** Style of brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2943">**Dodatek D** opisuje obsługiwane style pędzla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2943">**Appendix D** describes the supported brush styles.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2944">Style pędzla można łączyć w jedną zmienną przy użyciu operacji bitowej OR.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2944">Brush styles can be combined into one variable using bitwise OR operation.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2945">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2945">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2946">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Definiowanie pomyślnego pędzla kontekstowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2946">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context brush define</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2947">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Nieprawidłowy identyfikator zasobu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2947">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2948">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Brak definiowania aktywnego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2948">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context define</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2949">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Nieprawidłowy identyfikator zasobu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2949">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2950">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Brak aktywnego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2950">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2951">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2951">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2952">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2952">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2953">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2953">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define the brush of the current context. */
status = gx_context_brush_define(GX_COLOR_BLACK_ID,
    GX_COLOR_BLACK_ID,
    GX_STYLE_BORDER_NONE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush of the current context has been defined. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_brush_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2968">gx_context_brush_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2968">gx_context_brush_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2969">Pobierz pędzla bieżącego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2969">Get brush of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2970">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2970">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_brush_get(GX_BRUSH **return_brush);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2971">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2971">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2972">Ta usługa zwraca wskaźnik do aktywnego pędzla w bieżącym kontekście rysowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2972">This service returns a pointer to the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2973">Jeśli nie ma aktywnego kontekstu rysowania, usługa kończy się niepowodzeniem i zwraca wskaźnik NULL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2973">If there is no active drawing context, the service fails and returns a NULL pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2974">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2974">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2975">**return_brush** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego pędzla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2975">**return_brush** Pointer to destination for brush.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2976">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2976">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2977">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślnie pobrano pędzl kontekstowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2977">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved context brush</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2978">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Brak aktywnego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2978">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-2979">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2979">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2980">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2980">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2981">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2981">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2982">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2982">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BRUSH *my_brush;

/* Get the brush of the current context. */
status = gx_context_brush_get(&my_brush);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush of the current context has been retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_brush_pattern_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2997">gx_context_brush_pattern_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2997">gx_context_brush_pattern_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-2998">Ustawianie wzorca pędzla bieżącego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2998">Set brush pattern of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-2999">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-2999">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_brush_pattern_set(ULONG pattern);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3000">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3000">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-3001">Ta usługa ustawia wzorzec pędzla bieżącego kontekstu rysowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3001">This service sets the brush pattern of the current drawing context.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-3002">Wzorzec pędzla służy do rysowania linii poziomych i kreskowanych w pionie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3002">The brush pattern is used for drawing dashed horizontal and dashed vertical lines.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3003">Gdy gx_canvas_line_draw() jest wywoływana, a linia jest pozioma lub pionowa, a pole brush.gx_brush_line_pattern jest inne niż zero, rysowana jest linia wzorca.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3003">When the gx_canvas_line_draw() is called, and the line is horizontal or vertical, and the brush.gx_brush_line_pattern field is non-zero, a pattern line is drawn.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-3004">Maska wzorca pędzla jest obecnie obsługiwana tylko w przypadku linii poziomych i pionowych.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3004">The brush pattern mask is currently only supported for horizontal and vertical lines.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3005">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3005">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3006">**wzorzec** Wzorzec, który ma być używany dla pędzla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3006">**pattern** Pattern to be used for the brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3007">Jest to prosty wzorzec szesnastkowym wł./wył., który ma być używany do rysowania linii wzorca.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3007">This is a simple hexidecimal on/off pattern to be used for pattern line drawing.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3008">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3008">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3009">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Zestaw pędzla kontekstowego Powodzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3009">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context brush set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3010">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Nieprawidłowy kontekst rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3010">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Invalid drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3011">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3011">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-3012">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3012">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3013">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3013">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the brush pattern for the current contex. */
status = gx_context_brush_pattern_set(0x80808080);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush pattern of the current context
has been set to the specified pattern. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_brush_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3027">gx_context_brush_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3027">gx_context_brush_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-3028">Ustawianie pędzla bieżącego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3028">Set brush of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3029">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3029">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_brush_set(GX_BRUSH *brush);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3030">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3030">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-3031">Ta usługa ustawia pędzl bieżącego kontekstu rysowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3031">This service sets the brush of the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3032">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3032">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3033">**pędzl** Wskaźnik do pędzla do użycia w bieżącym kontekście.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3033">**brush** Pointer to brush to use for current context.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3034">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3034">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3035">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Zestaw pędzla kontekstowego powodzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3035">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context brush set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3036">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Brak aktywnego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3036">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3037">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3037">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3038">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3038">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-3039">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3039">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3040">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3040">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BRSUH my_brush;
GX_FONT *font;
GX_COLOR fill_color;
GX_COLOR line_color;

/* Retrieve the font that associated with the specified font ID. */
gx_context_font_get(MY_FONT_ID, &font);

/* Retrieve the color that associated with the specified color ID. */
gx_context_color_get(MY_FILL_COLOR_ID, &fill_color);
gx_context_color_get(MY_LINE_COLOR, &line_color);

my_brush.gx_brush_pixelmap = MY_PIXELMAP_ID;
my_brush.gx_brush_font = font;
my_brush.gx_brush_line_pattern = 0x80808080;
my_brush.gx_brush_pattern_mask = 0x80000000;
my_brush.gx_brush_fill_color = fill_color;
my_brush.gx_brush_line_color = line_color;
my_brush.gx_brush_style = GX_BRSUH_SOLID_FILL | GX_BRUSH_ALIAS |
                          GX_BRUSH_PIXELMAP_FILL | GX_BRUSH_ROUND
my_brush.gx_brush_width = 2;
my_brush.gx_brush_alpha = 255;

/* Set the brush of the current context. */
status = gx_context_brush_set(my_brush);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush of the current context has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_color_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3110">gx_context_color_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3110">gx_context_color_get</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3112">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3112">Prototype</span></span>

```C

    GX_RESOURCE_ID color_id,
    GX_COLOR *return_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3113">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3113">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-3114">Ta usługa pobiera wartość koloru skojarzoną ze wskazanym identyfikatorem koloru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3114">This service retrieves the color value associated with the indicated color ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3115">Wartość koloru jest zwracana w formacie koloru aktywnego wyświetlania kontekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3115">The color value is returned in the color format of the active context display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3116">Ta usługa powinna być wywoływana tylko z poziomu aktywnej operacji rysowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3116">This service should only be called from within an active drawing operation.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_context_fill_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3142">gx_context_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3142">gx_context_fill_color_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-3143">Ustawianie koloru wypełnienia bieżącego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3143">Set fill color of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3144">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3144">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_fill_color_set(GX_RESOURCE_ID fill_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3145">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3145">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-3146">Ta usługa ustawia kolor wypełnienia aktywnego pędzla w bieżącym kontekście rysowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3146">This service sets the fill color of the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3147">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3147">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3148">**fill_color_id** Identyfikator zasobu koloru wypełnienia bieżącego kontekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3148">**fill_color_id** Resource ID of fill color of current context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3149">**Dodatek B** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane identyfikatory zasobów kolorów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3149">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3150">Należy pamiętać, że aplikacja może również dodawać niestandardowe identyfikatory zasobów w kolorze.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3150">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3151">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3151">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3152">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Zestaw kolorów pomyślnego wypełnienia kontekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3152">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context fill color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3153">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Nieprawidłowy identyfikator zasobu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3153">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3154">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Brak aktywnego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3154">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3155">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3155">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3157">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3157">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the fill color of the current context to black. */
status = gx_context_fill_color_set(MY_BLACK_COLOR_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the fill color of the current context has been set to black. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_font_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3172">gx_context_font_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3172">gx_context_font_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-3173">Pobierz czcionkę skojarzoną z identyfikatorem czcionki w bieżącym kontekście rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3173">Get font associated with font ID in current draw context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3174">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3174">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_font_get(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID font_id,
    GX_FONT **return_font);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3175">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3175">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-3176">Ta usługa pobiera wskaźnik czcionki skojarzony ze wskazanym identyfikatorem czcionki.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3176">This service retrieves the font pointer associated with the indicated font ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3177">Ta usługa powinna być wywoływana tylko z poziomu aktywnej operacji rysowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3177">This service should only be called from within an active drawing operation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3178">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3178">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3179">**font_id** Żądany identyfikator zasobu czcionki.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3179">**font_id** Resource ID of font requested.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3180">**return_font** Adres zmiennej do przechowywania zwróconego wskaźnika czcionki.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3180">**return_font** Address of variable to hold returned font pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3181">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3181">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3182">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślnie pobrano czcionkę</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3182">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3183">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Nieprawidłowy identyfikator zasobu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3183">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3184">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Brak aktywnego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3184">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3185">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3185">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3186">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3186">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-3187">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3187">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3188">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3188">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_FONT *my_font;

/* Get the font pointer. */
status = gx_context_font_get(MY_MIDSIZE_FONT, &my_font);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the font that indicated with MY_MIDSIZE_FONT has been successfully retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_font_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3203">gx_context_font_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3203">gx_context_font_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-3204">Ustawianie czcionki bieżącego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3204">Set font of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3205">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3205">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_font_set(GX_RESOURCE_ID font_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3206">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3206">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-3207">Ta usługa ustawia czcionkę w aktywnym pędzlu bieżącego kontekstu rysowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3207">This service sets the font in the active brush of the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3214">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3214">Allowed From</span></span>

## <a name="gx_context_line_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3231">gx_context_line_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3231">gx_context_line_color_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-3232">Ustawianie koloru linii bieżącego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3232">Set line color of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3233">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3233">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_line_color_set(GX_RESOURCE_ID line_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3234">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3234">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-3235">Ta usługa ustawia kolor linii aktywnego pędzla w bieżącym kontekście rysowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3235">This service sets the line color of the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3236">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3236">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3237">**line_color_id** Kolor linii bieżącego kontekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3237">**line_color_id** Line color of current context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3238">**Dodatek B** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane identyfikatory zasobów kolorów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3238">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3239">Należy pamiętać, że aplikacja może również dodawać niestandardowe identyfikatory zasobów w kolorze.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3239">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3240">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3240">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3241">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Zestaw kolorów linii kontekstu Powodzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3241">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context line color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3242">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Nieprawidłowy identyfikator zasobu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3242">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3243">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Brak aktywnego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3243">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3244">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3244">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-3245">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3245">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3246">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3246">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the line color of the current context to black. */
status = gx_context_line_color_set(GX_COLOR_BLACK_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the line color of the current context has been set to black. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_pixelmap_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3261">gx_context_pixelmap_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3261">gx_context_pixelmap_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-3262">Pobierz mapę pikseli skojarzoną z identyfikatorem mapy pikseli w bieżącym kontekście rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3262">Get pixelmap associated with pixelmap ID in current draw context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3263">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3263">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_pixelmap_get(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID pixelmap_id,
    GX_PIXELMAP **return_map);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3264">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3264">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-3265">Ta usługa pobiera wskaźnik mapy pikseli skojarzony ze wskazanym identyfikatorem mapy pikseli.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3265">This service retrieves the pixelmap pointer associated with the indicated pixelmap ID.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3266">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3266">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3267">**pixelmap_id** Identyfikator zasobu żądanej mapy pikseli.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3267">**pixelmap_id** Resource ID of pixelmap requested.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3268">**return_map** Adres zmiennej do przechowywania zwróconego adresu pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3268">**return_map** Address of variable to hold returned pixelmap address.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3269">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3269">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3270">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślnie pobrano mapę pikseli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3270">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3271">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Nieprawidłowy identyfikator zasobu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3271">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3272">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Brak aktywnego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3272">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3273">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik mapy pikseli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3273">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pixelmap pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3274">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3274">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-3275">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3275">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3276">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3276">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PIXELMAP *map;

/* Get the pixelmap pointer. */
status = gx_context_pixelmap_get(MY_PIXELMAP_ID, &map);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the pixelmap was successfully retrieved. */
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3322">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3322">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-3323">Ta usługa definiuje nieprzetworzone pędzle bieżącego kontekstu ekranu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3323">This service defines the raw brush of the current screen context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3324">Definicje pierwotne są używane, gdy 32-bitowe wartości kolorów ARGB mają być przekazywane do pędzla, a nie identyfikatorów kolorów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3324">Raw definitions are used when 32-bit ARGB color values are to be passed into the brush rather than color IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3325">Definicje kolorów pierwotnych są przydatne, gdy żądany kolor nie jest obecny w bieżącej tabeli kolorów systemu lub gdy wartość koloru RGB jest obliczana w czasie wykonywania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3325">Raw color definitions are useful when the desired color is not present in the current system color table or when the RGB color value is computed at runtime.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3326">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3326">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3327">**line_color** Kolor linii w 32-bitowym nieprzetworzowym formacie ARGB.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3327">**line_color** Color of line in 32-bit raw ARGB color format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3328">**Dodatek A** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane kolory.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3328">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3329">Pamiętaj, że aplikacja może również dodawać kolory niestandardowe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3329">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3330">**fill_color** Kolor wypełnienia w 32-bitowym nieprzetworzonej formacie ARGB.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3330">**fill_color** Color of fill in 32-bit raw ARGB color format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3331">**Dodatek A** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane kolory.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3331">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3332">Pamiętaj, że aplikacja może również dodawać kolory niestandardowe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3332">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3333">**style (styl)** Styl pędzla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3333">**style** Style of brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3334">**Dodatek D** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane style ogólne dla wszystkich widżetów, a także style specyficzne dla widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3334">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3335">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3335">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3336">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Definiowanie pędzla raw kontekstu pomyślnego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3336">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context raw brush define</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3337">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Brak aktywnego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3337">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3338">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3338">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-3339">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3339">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3340">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3340">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define the raw brush of the current context. */
status = gx_context_raw_brush_define(GX_COLOR_BLACK,
    GX_COLOR_BLACK, GX_STYLE_BORDER_NONE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the raw brush of the current context has been defined. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3427">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3427">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

## <a name="gx_context_string_get_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3435">gx_context_string_get_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3435">gx_context_string_get_ext</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-3436">Pobierz ciąg skojarzony z danym identyfikatorem ciągu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3436">Retrieve string associated with given string ID.</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3437">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3437">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_string_get_ext(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID string_id, 
    GX_STRING *return_string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3438">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3438">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-3439">Ta usługa zwraca ciąg skojarzony z danym identyfikatorem ciągu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3439">This service returns the string associated with a given string ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3440">Tę usługę można wywołać tylko wtedy, gdy istnieje aktywny kontekst rysowania, tj. z poziomu funkcji rysowania widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3440">This service can only be invoked when there is an active drawing context, i.e. from within the drawing function of a widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3441">Ta usługa identyfikuje aktywną kanwę i wyświetla ją, a następnie pobiera ciąg z zlokalizowanego wystąpienia wyświetlania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3441">This service identifies the active canvas and display and retrieves the string from the located display instance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3442">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3442">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3443">**string_id** Identyfikator ciągu używany do identyfikowania ciągu wygenerowanego przez program GUIX Studio w pliku nagłówka zasobu aplikacji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3443">**string_id** String ID used to identify the string, as generated by GUIX Studio in the application resource header file.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3444">**return_string** Adres zmiennej GX_STRING, w której zostanie zwrócony wskaźnik ciągu i długość ciągu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3444">**return_string** Address of GX_STRING variable in which the string pointer and string length will be returned.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3445">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3445">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3446">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Zestaw kolorów nieprzetworzonych linii kontekstu pomyślnego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3446">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context raw line color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3447">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3447">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3448">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3448">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3449">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) Brak aktywnego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3449">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3450">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3450">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-3451">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3451">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3452">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3452">Example</span></span>


```C
GX_STRING string;

/* Set the raw line color of the current context. */
status = gx_context_string_get_ext(ID_ERROR, &string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the string.gx_string_ptr and
string.gx_string_length values have been returned. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3459">gx_context_brush_style_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3459">gx_context_brush_style_set</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3466">gx_context_raw_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3466">gx_context_raw_fill_color_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_display_active_language_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3467">gx_display_active_language_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3467">gx_display_active_language_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-3468">Przypisywanie wyświetlanego aktywnego języka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3468">Assign the display active language</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3469">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3469">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_active_language_set(
    GX_DISPLAY *display, 
    GX_UBYTE language);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3470">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3470">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-3471">Ta usługa przypisuje aktualnie aktywny język dla wskazanego wyświetlania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3471">This service assigns the currently active language for the indicated display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3472">Indeks języka odpowiada językom zdefiniowanym w tabeli języka wyświetlania i nie jest identyfikatorem języka ANSI.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3472">The language index corresponds to the languages defined in the display language table, and is not an ANSI language identifier.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-3473">Różne ekrany w systemie z wieloma ekranami mogą uruchamiać różne aktywne języki.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3473">Different displays in a multi display system can each run different active languages.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3474">Przed rozpoczęciem pracy z tym interfejsem API należy przypisać tabelę języka wyświetlania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3474">The display language table should be assigned before this API is used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3475">Gdy ekran jest zainicjowany przy użyciu gx_studio_display_configure, tabela języka jest instalowana automatycznie, a aplikacja przekazuje aktywny indeks języka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3475">When a display is initialized using gx_studio_display_configure, the language table is automatically installed and the application passes in the active language index.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3476">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3476">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3477">**wyświetlanie** Wskaźnik do wyświetlania bloku sterowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3477">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3478">**language (język)** Indeks języka aktywnego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3478">**language** Active language index</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3479">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3479">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3480">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślne przypisanie języka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3480">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful language assign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3481">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik wyświetlania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3481">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid display pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3482">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Nieprawidłowy indeks języka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3482">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid language index</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3483">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3483">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-3484">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3484">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3485">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3485">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Change value of color MY_COLOR_ID. */
status = gx_display_active_language_set(&my_display,
    LANGUAGE_ENGLISH);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the active language has been assigned. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3486">Zobacz też</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3486">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3487">gx_display_language_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3487">gx_display_language_table_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_display_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3489">gx_display_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3489">gx_display_color_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-3490">Ponowne przypisywanie jednej wartości koloru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3490">Re-assign one color value</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3491">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3491">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_color_set(
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID color_id, 
    GX_COLOR new_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3492">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3492">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-3493">Ta usługa ponownie przypisuje wartość koloru skojarzoną z określonym identyfikatorem koloru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3493">This service re-assigns the color value associated with the specified color ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3494">Może to służyć do modyfikowania tabeli kolorów ekranu bez konieczności dostarczania zupełnie nowej tabeli kolorów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3494">This can be used to modify the color table of a display without providing an entirely new color table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3495">Wartość koloru musi być w formacie natywnym obsługiwanym przez ekran.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3495">The color value provided must be in the native format supported by the display.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3496">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3496">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3497">**wyświetlanie** Wskaźnik do wyświetlania bloku sterowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3497">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3498">**color_id** Identyfikator koloru do ponownego przypisania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3498">**color_id** Color ID to reassign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3499">**new_color** Wartość koloru do przypisania do color_id danych</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3499">**new_color** Color value to assign to this color_id slot</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3500">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3500">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3501">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślne ponowne przypisanie koloru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3501">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful color reassign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3502">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Nieprawidłowy identyfikator koloru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3502">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid color ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3503">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3503">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3504">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Nieprawidłowy ekran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3504">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Invalid display</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3505">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3505">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-3506">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3506">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3507">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3507">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Change value of color MY_COLOR_ID. */
status = gx_display_color_set(&my_display, MY_COLOR_ID, 0x5454);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the color has been reassigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_display_color_table_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3510">gx_display_color_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3510">gx_display_color_table_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-3511">Przypisywanie tabeli kolorów wyświetlania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3511">Assign display color table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3512">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3512">Prototype</span></span>

```C

    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    GX_COLOR *color_table, 
    INT color_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3513">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3513">Description</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3522">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3522">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3524">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Nieprawidłowy ekran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3524">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Invalid display</span></span>

```C
GX_COLOR default_table[32] = { … };

```

## <a name="gx_display_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3530">gx_display_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3530">gx_display_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-3531">Tworzenie wyświetlania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3531">Create display</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3532">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3532">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_create(
    GX_DISPLAY *display, 
    GX_CONST CHAR *name,
    UINT (*display_driver_setup)(GX_DISPLAY *),
    GX_VALUE width, 
    GX_VALUE height);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3533">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3533">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-3534">Ta usługa tworzy ekran i wywołuje funkcję konfiguracji sterownika wyświetlania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3534">This service creates a display and calls the display driver setup function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3535">Graficzny interfejs użytkownika przejmuje ten ekran i dodaje go do wewnętrznej listy ekranów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3535">GUIX takes this display and adds it to its internal list of displays.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3536">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3536">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3537">**wyświetlanie** Wskaźnik do wyświetlania bloku sterowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3537">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3538">**name (nazwa)** Nazwa wyświetlanego ekranu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3538">**name** Name of the display</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3539">**display_driver_setup** Wskaźnik do wyświetlania funkcji konfiguracji sterownika</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3539">**display_driver_setup** Pointer to display driver setup function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3540">**optional_driver_info** Wskaźnik do opcjonalnych informacji o sterowniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3540">**optional_driver_info** Pointer to optional driver information</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3541">**color_format** Format kolorów, zgodnie z definicją w **dodatku C**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3541">**color_format** Color format, as defined in **Appendix C**</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3542">**width (szerokość)** Liczba pikseli na osi X</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3542">**width** Number of pixels on the x-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3543">**wysokość** Liczba pikseli na osi y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3543">**height** Number of pixels on the y-axis</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3544">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3544">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3545">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślne utworzenie wyświetlania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3545">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful display create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3546">**GX_SYSTEM_ERROR** (0xFE) Nie można skonfigurować</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3546">**GX_SYSTEM_ERROR** (0xFE) Fail to setup display</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3547">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3547">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3548">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3548">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3549">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x23) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar bloku kontrolki wyświetlania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3549">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x23) Invalid display control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3550">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3550">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-3551">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3551">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3552">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3552">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_DISPLAY my_display;

UINT my_driver_setup_callback(GX_DISPLAY *display)
{
    …
}

/* Create screen “my_display”. */
status = gx_display_create(&my_display, “my display”,
    my_driver_setup_callback, 320, 480);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the screen “my_display” has been created. */
```

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-3559">Ta usługa zamyka ekran i czyści przydzielone zasoby.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3559">This service shuts down a display, and cleans up allocated resources.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3563">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3563">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3567">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3567">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

```C
{
    …
}

/* Delete a display “my_display”. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the screen “my_display” has been destroyed. */
```

## <a name="gx_display_font_table_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3580">gx_display_font_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3580">gx_display_font_table_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-3581">Przypisywanie wyświetlanej tabeli czcionek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3581">Assign display font table</span></span>

```C
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    GX_FONT **font_table, 
    INT table_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3583">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3583">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-3584">Ta usługa ponownie przypisuje tabelę czcionek do wyświetlania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3584">This service re-assigns the font table to be used by the display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3585">Ta usługa jest zwykle wywoływana przez funkcję konfiguracji wyświetlania wygenerowaną przez program GUIX Studio, ale może być również wywoływana przez oprogramowanie aplikacji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3585">This service is normally invoked by the GUIX Studio generated display configuration function, but can also be called by the application software.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3586">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3586">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3587">**wyświetlanie** Wskaźnik do wyświetlania bloku sterowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3587">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3588">**font_table** Tablica GX_FONT wskaźników.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3588">**font_table** Array of GX_FONT pointers.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3589">**table_size** Liczba czcionek w tabeli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3589">**table_size** Number of fonts in table</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3590">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3590">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3591">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Zestaw tabel czcionek pomyślny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3591">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful font table set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3592">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3592">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3593">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3593">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3594">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3594">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3596">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3596">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_FONT *font_table[32] = { … };

/* Assign font table */
status = gx_display_font_table_set(&my_display, font_table, 32);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the font table has been reassigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_display_language_table_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3601">gx_display_language_table_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3601">gx_display_language_table_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-3602">Pobieranie tabeli języka wyświetlania (przestarzałe)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3602">Retrieve display language table (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3603">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3603">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_language_table_get(
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    GX_CHAR **table, 
    GX_UBYTE *language_count,
    UINT *string_table_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3604">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3604">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-3605">Ta usługa pobiera tabelę języków ze wskazanego ekranu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3605">This service retrieves the language table from the indicated display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3606">Ta usługa może być używana przez aplikację do modyfikowania tabeli języka wyświetlania w czasie wykonywania przy użyciu dynamicznie zdefiniowanych ciągów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3606">This service can be used by an application to modify the display language table, at runtime, using dynamically defined strings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-3607">Ten interfejs API jest przestarzały i jest obsługiwany tylko w przypadku aplikacji korzystających ze starej tabeli języków stylu (tj. plik zasobów wygenerowany przez program Studio jest generowany dla wersji biblioteki wcześniejszej niż 5.6).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3607">This API is deprecated and supported only for applications using the old style language table (i.e. the Studio generated resource file is generated for library version prior to version 5.6).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3608">Nowe aplikacje powinny używać funkcji gx_display_language_table_get_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3608">New applications should use gx_display_language_table_get_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-3790">Ta usługa pobiera tabelę ciągów skojarzoną z aktywnym językiem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3790">This service retrieves the string table associated with the active language.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3791">Ta usługa nie jest często używana, ale zapewnia kompletność dla tych aplikacji, które mogą wymagać modyfikacji w czasie wykonywania tabeli ciągów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3791">This service is not frequently used, but is provided for completeness for those applications that might need to make runtime modifications to the string table.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3792">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3792">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3793">**wyświetlanie** Wskaźnik do wyświetlania bloku sterowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3793">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3794">**language (język)** Kolumna tabeli do pobrania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3794">**language** Table column to retrieve.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3795">**tabela** Adres zmiennej, która ma zwracać wskaźnik.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3795">**table** Address of variable to return pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3796">**table_size** Adres zmiennej zwracania rozmiaru tabeli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3796">**table_size** Address of variable to return table size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3797">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3797">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3798">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Zestaw pomyślnych tabel czcionek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3798">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful font table set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3799">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3799">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3800">**GX_NOT_FOUND** (0x09) Nieprawidłowy indeks języka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3800">**GX_NOT_FOUND** (0x09) Invalid language index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3801">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3801">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3802">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3802">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-3803">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3803">Initialization and threads</span></span>

## <a name="gx_display_theme_install"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3809">gx_display_theme_install</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3809">gx_display_theme_install</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-3810">Instalowanie motywów na określonym ekranie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3810">Install themes to the specified display</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3811">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3811">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_theme_install(
    GX_DISPLAY *display, 
    GX_THEME *theme_table);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3812">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3812">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-3813">Ta usługa instaluje motywy na określonym ekranie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3813">This service install themes to the specified display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3814">Ta usługa jest zwykle wywoływana przez funkcję konfiguracji wyświetlania wygenerowaną przez program Studio, ale może być również wywoływana przez oprogramowanie aplikacji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3814">This service is normally invoked by the Studio generated display configuration function, but can also be called by the application software.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3815">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3815">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3816">**wyświetlanie** Wskaźnik do wyświetlania bloku sterowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3816">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3817">**theme_table** Tabela motywów do zainstalowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3817">**theme_table** Theme table to be installed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3818">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3818">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3819">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślnie zainstalowano tabelę motywów</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3819">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully installed theme table</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3820">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3820">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3821">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik tabeli motywu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3821">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid theme table pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3822">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Nieprawidłowy ekran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3822">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Invalid display</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3823">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3823">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-3824">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3824">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3825">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3825">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_THEME theme_1;

&theme_table[1] = {
    &theme_1,
    …
}

/* Define resource tables. */
GX_COLOR color_table[32] = {…};
GX_FONT *font_table[32] = {…};
GX_PIXELMAP *pixelmap_table[32] = { … };

/* Define scroll appearance. */
GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE scroll_appearance;

memset(&scroll_appearance, 0, sizeof(GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE));

scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_width = 20;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_width = 18;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_color =
    GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_border_color =
    GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_button_color =
    GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_travel_min = 20;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_travel_max = 20;
scroll appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_border_style =
    GX_STYLE_BORDER_THIN;

theme_1.theme_color_table = color_table;
theme_1.theme_font_table = font_table;
theme_1.theme_pixlemap_table = pixelmap_table;
theme_1.theme_palette = GX_NULL;
theme_1.theme_vertical_scrollbar_appearance = scroll_appearance;
theme_1.theme_horizontal_scrollbar_appearance = scroll_appearance;
theme_1.theme_vertical_scroll_style = GX_SCROLLBAR_RELATIVE_THUMB;
theme_1.theme_horizontal_scroll_style =
    GX_SCROLLBAR_RELATIVE_THUMB;
theme_1.theme_color_table_size = 32;
theme_1.theme_font_table_size = 32;
theme_1.theme_pixelmap_table_size = 32;
theme_1.theme_palette_size = 0;

/* Install theme table. */
status = gx_display_theme_install(&my_display, theme_table);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the theme table has been installed. */
```

## <a name="gx_drop_list_close"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3830">gx_drop_list_close</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3830">gx_drop_list_close</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-3831">Zamykanie listy rozwijanej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3831">Close a drop list</span></span>


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3833">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3833">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-3834">Ta usługa zamyka listę podręczną określonej listy rozwijanej.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3834">This service closes the popup list of the specified drop list.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3838">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślnie zamknięto listę rozwijaną</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3838">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful closed the drop list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3839">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3839">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-3840">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3840">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3841">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3841">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-3842">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3842">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-3843">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-3843">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Close a drop list. */
status = gx_drop_list_close(&drop_list);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the drop list is closed. */
```
