- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4584">**selected_id** Identyfikator zasobu wybranego stanu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4584">**selected_id** Selected state Resource ID</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-4585">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4585">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4586">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Zestaw map pikseli pomyślnej ikony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4586">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful icon pixelmap set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4587">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4587">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4588">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4588">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-4589">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4589">Allowed From</span></span>


## <a name="gx_image_reader_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-4596">gx_image_reader_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4596">gx_image_reader_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-4597">Tworzenie wystąpienia modułu czytnika obrazów</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4597">Create image reader module instance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-4598">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4598">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_image_reader_create(
    GX_IMAGE_READER *image_reader,
    GX_CONST GX_UBYTE *data, 
    INT data_size,
    GX_UBYTE color_format, 
    GX_UBYTE mode);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-4599">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4599">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-4600">Ta funkcja tworzy czytnik/dekoder nieprzetworzonych obrazów środowiska uruchomieniowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4600">This function creates a runtime raw image reader / decoder.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4601">Obecnie obsługiwane są tylko nieprzetworzone typy obrazów JPEG i PNG.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4601">Currently only jpeg and png raw image types are supported.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4602">Ta usługa wymaga GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT zdefiniowanej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4602">This service requires GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-4603">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4603">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4604">**image_reader** Blok sterowania czytnika obrazów</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4604">**image_reader** Image reader control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4605">**dane** Wskaźnik do nieprzetworzonych danych wejściowych.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4605">**data** Pointer to raw input data.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4606">**data_size** Rozmiar nieprzetworzonych danych wejściowych.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4606">**data_size** Size of raw input data.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4607">**color_format** Żądany format koloru danych wyjściowych.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4607">**color_format** The requested output color format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4608">**tryb** Flagi kompresowania, dither i trybów alfa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4608">**mode** Compress, dither and alpha modes flags.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-4609">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4609">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4610">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślne utworzenie czytnika obrazów</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4610">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful image reader create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4611">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4611">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4612">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar danych</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4612">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid data size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-4613">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4613">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-4614">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4614">Initialization and Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-4615">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4615">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_IMAGE_READER my_image_reader;

“color format” could be set to:
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_32ARGB
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_24RGB
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_565RGB
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_8BIT_PALETTE

/* Create image reader “my_image_reader”. */
status = gx_image_reader_create(&my_image_reader, decoder_data,
    decoder_data_size,
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_32ARGB,
    GX_IMAGE_READER_MODE_COMPRESS)

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_image_reader” has been successfully created. */
```

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-4623">Ta usługa ustawia paletę dla bloku sterowania czytnika obrazów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4623">This service sets palette for image reader control block.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4624">Ta usługa wymaga GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT zdefiniowanej.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4624">This service requires GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4628">**palsize** Rozmiar palety</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4628">**palsize** The size of the palette</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4631">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4631">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4632">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar palety</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4632">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid palette size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-4633">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4633">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-4634">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4634">Initialization and Threads</span></span>

## <a name="gx_line_chart_axis_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-4661">gx_line_chart_axis_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4661">gx_line_chart_axis_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-4662">Rysowanie wykresu liniowego osi x,y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4662">Draw line chart x,y axis</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-4663">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4663">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_line_chart_axis_draw(GX_LINE_CHART *chart);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-4664">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4664">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-4665">Ta usługa rysuje oś x,y wykresu liniowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4665">This service draws the x,y axis of a line chart.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4666">Kolory osi i parametry szerokości linii są pobierane ze struktury informacji wykresu liniowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4666">The axis colors and line width parameters are retrieved from the line chart information structure.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-4667">Ta usługa jest zwykle wywoływana wewnętrznie przez funkcję gx_line_chart_draw, ale jest narażona na działanie aplikacji, aby pomóc w pisaniu niestandardowych funkcji rysowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4667">This service is normally called internally by the gx_line_chart_draw function, but is exposed to the application to assist in writing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-4668">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4668">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4669">**wykres** Blok sterowania wykresem liniowym.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4669">**chart** Line chart control block.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-4670">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4670">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4671">**Brak**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4671">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-4672">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4672">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-4673">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4673">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-4674">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4674">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom chart drawing function. */

VOID my_chart_draw(GX_LINE_CHART *chart)
{
    /* Call default window draw. */
    gx_window_draw((GX_WINDOW *)chart);

    /* Draw the line chart axis. */
    gx_line_chart_axis_draw(&chart->gx_line_chart_info);

    /* Draw the data line */
    gx_line_chart_data_draw(&chart->gx_line_chart_info);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-4684">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4684">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-4685">Ta usługa tworzy okno wykresu liniowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4685">This service creates a line chart window.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4686">Parametry rysowania wykresu i dane wykresu są przekazywane za pośrednictwem GX_LINE_CHART_INFO struktury.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4686">The chart drawing parameters and chart data are passed in via the GX_LINE_CHART_INFO structure.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4690">**name (nazwa)** Opcjonalna nazwa wykresu liniowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4690">**name** Optional line chart name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4691">**element nadrzędny** Widżet nadrzędny lub GX_NULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4691">**parent** Parent widget, or GX_NULL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4692">**info (informacje)** Struktura definiująca parametry rysowania wykresu liniowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4692">**info** Structure defining line chart drawing parameters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4693">**Dodatek I** zawiera definicję GX_LINE_CHART_INFO struktury.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4693">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_LINE_CHART_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4694">**style (styl)** Flagi stylu widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4694">**style** Widget style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4695">**chart_id** Wartość identyfikatora logicznego wykresu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4695">**chart_id** Chart logical ID value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-4697">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4697">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4698">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślne utworzenie wykresu liniowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4698">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful line chart create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4699">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4699">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4700">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4700">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4701">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar bloku kontrolki widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4701">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4702">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4702">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-4703">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4703">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-4704">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4704">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-4705">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4705">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create a line chart */
GX_LINE_CHART chart;
GX_RECTANGLE chart_size;
GX_LINE_CHART_INFO gx_chart_info;
GX_WINDOW_ROOT *root_window;

chart_size = root_window->gx_widget_size;

/* Initialize params for the GUIX base chart. */
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_min_val = DATA_MIN_VAL;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_max_val = DATA_MAX_VAL;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_max_data_count = MAX_DATA_COUNT;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_active_data_count = 0;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_axis_line_width = AXIS_LINE_WIDTH;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_data_line_width = DATA_LINE_WIDTH;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_data = chart_data;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_line_color = GX_COLOR_ID_DATA_LINE;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_axis_color = GX_COLOR_ID_AXIS_LINE;

/* Leave room for labels on bottom and right. */
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_left_margin = 0;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_top_margin = 0;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_right_margin = 80;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_bottom_margin = 32;

status = gx_line_chart_create(&chart, “Line Chart”, root_window,
    &gx_chart_info, GX_STYLE_NONE, &chart_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the “chart” has been successfully created. */
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-4734">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4734">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-4735">Jest to domyślna funkcja rysowania wykresu liniowego, która rysuje oś wykresu i linię danych.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4735">This is the default line chart drawing function, which draws the chart axis and data line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4736">Aplikacje zwykle zapewniają niestandardową funkcję rysowania, która zastępuje domyślny rysunek w celu dodania elementów, takich jak znaczniki znaczników czasu, skalowanie lub inne informacje, do osi wykresu i linii danych rysowanych przez widżet podstawowego wykresu liniowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4736">Applications usually provide a custom drawing function to replace the default drawing to add things such as tickmarks, scale, or other information to the chart axis and data line drawn by the base line chart widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-4737">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4737">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4738">**wykres** Wskaźnik do bloku sterowania wykresem liniowym.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4738">**chart** Pointer to the line chart control block.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-4739">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4739">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4740">**Brak**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4740">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-4741">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4741">Allowed From</span></span>

```C

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-4752">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4752">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-4753">Ta usługa aktualizuje tablicę danych wykreślaną przez okno wykresu liniowego i wymusza ponowne narysowanie okna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4753">This service updates the data array plotted by the line chart window, and forces the window to redraw.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4757">**data_count** Rozmiar tablicy danych</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4757">**data_count** Size of the data array</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4759">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślne utworzenie przycisku tekstowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4759">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text button create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4760">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4760">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4761">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4761">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

## <a name="gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-4770">gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4770">gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-4771">Obliczanie wartości skalowania osi y o stałym punkcie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4771">Calculate fixed-point y axis scaling value</span></span>

```C
    GX_LINE_CHART *chart,
    INT *return_val);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-4773">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4773">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-4774">Ta usługa oblicza wartość skalowania o stałym punkcie używaną do wykreślania wartości danych na osi Y wykresu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4774">This service calculates the fixed-point scaling value used to plot data values on the chart Y axis.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4775">Parametry chart_info i prostokąt ograniczający wykres są używane do obliczania tej wartości skalowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4775">The chart_info parameters and chart bounding rectangle are used to calculate this scaling value.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4778">**return_val** Adres wartości do przechowywania wartości zwracanej ze stałym punktem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4778">**return_val** Address of value to hold fixed-point return value.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4781">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4781">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

## <a name="gx_menu_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-4790">gx_menu_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4790">gx_menu_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-4791">Tworzenie menu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4791">Create a menu</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-4792">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4792">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_menu_create(
    GX_MENU *menu,GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID fill_id, 
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT menu_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-4793">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4793">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-4794">Ta usługa tworzy określone menu i kojarzy je z podanym widżetem nadrzędnym.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4794">This service creates a menu as specified and associates the menu with the supplied parent widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4795">Akceptuje wszystkie typy widżetów jako podrzędny element menu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4795">It accepts all types of widget as child menu item.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4796">Aby wstawić widżet jako podrzędny element menu, **wywołaj** gx_menu_insert .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4796">To insert a widget as a child menu item, call **gx_menu_insert**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-4797">GX_MENU pochodzi od usługi GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT obsługuje wszystkie usługi gx_pixelmap_prompt API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4797">GX_MENU is derived from GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT and supports all gx_pixelmap_prompt API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-4798">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4798">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4799">**menu** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki menu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4799">**menu** Pointer to menu control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4800">**name (nazwa)** Nazwa menu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4800">**name** Name of the menu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4801">**element nadrzędny** Wskaźnik do widżetu nadrzędnego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4801">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4802">**text_id** Identyfikator zasobu tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4802">**text_id** Resource ID of text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4803">**fill_id** Identyfikator zasobu wypełnienia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4803">**fill_id** Resource ID of fill</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4804">**style (styl)** Styl widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4804">**style** Style of the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4805">**Dodatek D** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane style ogólne dla wszystkich widżetów, a także style specyficzne dla widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4805">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4806">**menu_id** Identyfikator menu zdefiniowany przez aplikację</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4806">**menu_id** Application-defined ID of the menu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4807">**rozmiar** Rozmiar menu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4807">**size** Size of the menu</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-4808">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4808">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4809">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślne utworzenie menu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4809">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful menu creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4810">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4810">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4811">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4811">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4812">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4812">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4813">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar bloku kontrolki widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4813">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

## <a name="gx_menu_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-4852">gx_menu_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4852">gx_menu_event_process</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-4853">Zdarzenie menu Proces</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4853">Process menu event</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_menu_event_process(GX_MENU *menu, GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-4855">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4855">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-4856">Ta usługa przetwarza zdarzenie dla określonego menu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4856">This service processes an event for the specified menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4857">Ta usługa powinna być wywoływana jako domyślna procedura obsługi zdarzeń przez dowolne funkcje przetwarzania zdarzeń menu niestandardowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4857">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom menu event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-4858">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4858">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4859">**menu** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki menu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4859">**menu** Pointer to menu control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4860">**event_ptr** Wskaźnik do zdarzenia do przetwarzania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4860">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-4861">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4861">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4862">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślne zdarzenie menu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4862">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful menu event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4863">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4863">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4864">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4864">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4865">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x23) Widget jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4865">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x23) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-4866">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4866">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-4867">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4867">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-4868">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4868">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic menu event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_menu_event_process(GX_MENU *menu, GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */

        /* Call default event process if this is a system event such as GX_EVENT_SHOW. */
        status = gx_menu_event_process(menu, event);
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default menu
           event processing */
        status = gx_menu_event_process(menu, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}

```

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-4938">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4938">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-4939">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4939">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-4940">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4940">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom menu drawing function. */

VOID my_menu_draw(GX_MENU *menu)
{
    /* Call default menu background draw. */
    gx_pixelmap_prompt_background_draw(
                            (GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *)menu);

    /* Draw menu text. */
    gx_menu_text_draw(menu);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_menu_text_offset_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-4952">gx_menu_text_offset_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4952">gx_menu_text_offset_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-4953">Ustawianie przesunięcia rysowania tekstu menu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4953">Set menu text draw offset</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-4954">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4954">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_menu_text_offset_set(
    GX_MENU *menu, 
    GX_VALUE x_offset,
    GX_VALUE y_offset);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-4955">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4955">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-4956">Ta usługa ustawia przesunięcie ekranu x, y dla tekstu menu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4956">This service sets x, y display offset for menu text.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-4957">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4957">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4958">**menu** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki menu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4958">**menu** Pointer to menu control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4959">**x_offset** Współrzędna X przesunięcia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4959">**x_offset** X coordinate of offset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4960">**y_offset** Współrzędna Y przesunięcia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4960">**y_offset** Y coordinate of offset</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4963">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4963">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4964">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4964">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-4965">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4965">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-4967">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4967">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set text draw offset of menu “my_menu” to (20, 10). */
status = gx_menu_text_offset_set(&my_menu, 20, 10);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text draw offset of menu “my_menu” has been set to (20, 10). */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-4979">gx_multi_line_text_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4979">gx_multi_line_text_button_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-4980">Przycisk Tworzenia tekstu wielo wierszowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4980">Create multi line text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-4981">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4981">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_button_create(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT text_button_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-4982">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4982">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-4983">Ta usługa tworzy widżet wielo wiersza przycisku tekstowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4983">This service creates a multi-line text button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4984">Przycisk tekstu wielo wierszowego wyświetla tekst przycisku w ponad 1 n wierszach.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4984">A multi-line text button displays the button text over 1-n lines.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4985">Maksymalna liczba wierszy jest definiowana przez stałą GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON_MAX_LINES, która domyślnie wynosi 4.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4985">The maximum number of lines is defined by the constant GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON_MAX_LINES, which defaults to 4.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4986">Podziały wierszy są ustawiane za pomocą powrotu karetki i/lub powrotu karetki + pary znaków wiersza w ciągu tekstowym przypisanym do przycisku tekstu wielo wierszowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4986">The line breaks are set by carriage return and/or carriage return + line feed pairs within the text string assigned to the multi-line text button.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-4987">GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON pochodzi od usługi GX_TEXT_BUTTON obsługuje wszystkie usługi gx_text_button API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4987">GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON is derived from GX_TEXT_BUTTON and supports all gx_text_button API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-4988">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4988">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4989">**text_button** Blok sterujący wskaźnika do przycisku tekstowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4989">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4990">**name (nazwa)** Nazwa logiczna przycisku tekstowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4990">**name** Logical name of text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4991">**element nadrzędny** Wskaźnik do widżetu nadrzędnego przycisku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4991">**parent** Pointer to parent widget of the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4992">**text_id** Identyfikator zasobu tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4992">**text_id** Resource ID of text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4993">**style (styl)** Styl przycisku tekstowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4993">**style** Text button style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4994">**Dodatek D** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane style ogólne dla wszystkich widżetów, a także style specyficzne dla widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4994">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4995">**text_button_id** Zdefiniowany przez aplikację identyfikator przycisku tekstowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4995">**text_button_id** Application-defined ID of the text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4996">**rozmiar** Rozmiar przycisku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4996">**size** Size of the button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-4997">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4997">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4998">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślne utworzenie przycisku tekstowego z wieloma wierszami</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4998">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi line text button create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-4999">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-4999">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5000">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5000">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5001">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget już utworzony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5001">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5002">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar bloku kontrolki widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5002">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5003">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5003">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5004">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5004">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5005">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5005">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create multi-line text button “my_text_button”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_button_create(&my_text_button, "my text button",
    &my_parent_window, MY_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID,
    GX_STYLE_BUTTON_TOGGLE, MY_TEXT_BUTTON_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the multi-line text button “my_text_button” was created. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5013">gx_multi_line_text_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5013">gx_multi_line_text_button_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5014">Przycisk Rysowanie tekstu wielo wierszowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5014">Draw multi-line text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5015">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5015">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_multi_line_text_button_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5016">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5016">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5017">Ta usługa rysuje wielo wierszowy przycisk tekstowy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5017">This service draws the multi-line text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5018">Ta funkcja jest zwykle wywoływana wewnętrznie przez graficzny interfejs użytkownika (GUIX) jako część operacji odświeżania kanwy, ale jest również narażona na aplikację, która może chcieć udostępnić niestandardową funkcję rysowania i wywołać domyślny wielowierszowy przycisk rysowania tekstu jako niestandardową bazę rysowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5018">This function is normally called internally by GUIX as part of a canvas refresh operation, but it also exposed to the application that might want to provide a custom drawing function and invoke the default multi-line text button drawing as custom drawing base.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5019">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5019">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5020">**przycisk** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki przycisku tekstowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5020">**button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5021">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5021">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5022">**Brak**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5022">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5023">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5023">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5024">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5024">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5025">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5025">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw the text button “my_text_button”. */
void MyButtonDraw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Do the normal drawing first */
    gx_multi_line_text_button_draw(&my_text_button);

    /* Add custom drawing here. */
}
```

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5034">Domyślna obsługa zdarzeń dla przycisku tekstu wielo wierszowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5034">Default event handling for multi-line text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5035">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5035">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5036">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5036">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5037">Ta usługa jest domyślną funkcją obsługi zdarzeń dla widżetu wielo wiersza przycisku tekstowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5037">This service is the default event handling function for the multi line text button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5038">Ta funkcja jest dostępna dla aplikacji, które chcą zapewnić niestandardową obsługę zdarzeń dla widżetu przycisku tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5038">This function is made accessible to applications that want to provide custom event handling for a text button widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5039">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5039">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5040">**przycisk** Blok sterujący wskaźnika do przycisku tekstowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5040">**button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5041">**event_ptr** Zdarzenie do przetworzenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5041">**event_ptr** Event to be processed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5042">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5042">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5043">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślnie obsłużone zdarzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5043">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully handled event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5044">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5044">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5045">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5045">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5046">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5046">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5047">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5047">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5048">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5048">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT MyEventHandler(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process(button, event_ptr);
        /* add custom actions here */
        break;
    default:
        gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process(button, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return GX_SUCCESS;
}
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5056">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5056">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5057">Funkcja obsługi rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5057">Drawing support function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5058">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5058">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5059">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5059">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5060">Ta funkcja obsługi rysuje część tekstową przycisku tekstu wielo wierszowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5060">This support function draws the text portion of a multi-line text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5061">Ta funkcja jest wywoływana wewnętrznie przez funkcję gx_multi_line_text_button_draw() i jest dostarczana jako oddzielny interfejs API jako udogodnienie dla aplikacji, które definiują niestandardową funkcję rysowania wielo wierszowego przycisku tekstowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5061">This function is called internally by gx_multi_line_text_button_draw(), and is provided as a separate API as a convenience for applications that define a custom multi-line text button drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5062">Aplikacje, które chcą dostosować rysunek tła przycisku, mogą zapewnić niestandardową funkcję rysowania i wywołać usługę multi_line_text_button_text_draw jako część niestandardowego rysowania, aby narysować tekst przycisku w tle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5062">Applications that want to customize the button background drawing can provide their custom drawing function, and invoke the multi_line_text_button_text_draw service as part of their custom drawing to draw the button text over the background.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5063">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5063">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5064">**text_button** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki przycisku tekstowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5064">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5065">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5065">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5066">**Brak**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5066">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5067">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5067">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5068">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5068">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5069">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5069">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom drawing function */
VOID my_button_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* insert code here to draw button background */

    /* call support function to do text drawing */
    gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw();

    /* draw child widgets */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *) button);
}
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_text_id_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5077">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_id_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5077">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_id_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5078">Ustawianie identyfikatora zasobu tekstowego na przycisk tekstowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5078">Set text resource ID to the text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5079">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5079">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_button_text_id_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    RESOURCE_ID string_id)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5080">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5080">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5081">Ta usługa ustawia określony identyfikator zasobu ciągu na przycisk tekstowy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5081">This service sets the specified string resource ID to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5082">Ciąg może zawierać znaki nowego wiersza, które działają w celu wyświetlenia tekstu w wielu wierszach w obszarze przycisku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5082">The string may contain newline characters which act to display the text on multiple lines within the button area.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5083">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5083">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5084">**text_button** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki przycisku tekstowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5084">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5085">**string_id** Identyfikator zasobu ciągu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5085">**string_id** Resource ID of the string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5086">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5086">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5087">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślnie ustaw identyfikator zasobu ciągu na przycisk tekstowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5087">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the string resource ID to the text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5088">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5088">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5089">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5089">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5090">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5090">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5091">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5091">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5092">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5092">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the string ID ”MY_STRING_ID” to the text button “my_text_button”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_button_text_id_set(
    &my_text_button, MY_STRING_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the string ID MY_STRING_ID was set to “my_text_button”. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5100">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5100">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5101">Przypisywanie tekstu do przycisku tekstowego (przestarzałe)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5101">Assign text to the text button (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5102">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5102">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_mult_line_text_button_text_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5103">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5103">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5104">Ta usługa jest przestarzała na rzecz gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5104">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5105">Ta usługa przypisuje określony ciąg do przycisku tekstowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5105">This service assigns the specified string to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5106">Jeśli widżet text_button został utworzony za pomocą stylu GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, widżet tworzy prywatną kopię przypisanego ciągu tekstowego i dlatego interfejs API usługi gx_system_memmory_allocate_set musi zostać wywołany raz przed żądaniem tej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5106">If the text_button widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned, and therefore the gx_system_memmory_allocate_set API must be invoked once before this service is requested.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5107">Jeśli GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY nie jest aktywny, widżet nie będzie prywatną kopią ciągu przychodzącego, dlatego ciąg musi być przydzielany statycznie lub globalnie, tzn. może nie być zmienną automatyczną lub tymczasową.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5107">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5108">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5108">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5109">**text_button** Blok sterujący wskaźnika do przycisku tekstowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5109">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5110">**wskaźnik tekstowy** do ciągu zakończonego wartością NULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5110">**text** pointer to the NULL-terminated string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5111">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5111">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5112">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślnie ustaw tekst na przycisk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5112">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the text to the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5113">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5113">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5114">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5114">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5115">**GX_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Alokator pamięci nie jest zdefiniowany</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5115">**GX_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5116">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Nieprawidłowa długość ciągu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5116">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5117">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5117">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5118">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5118">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5119">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5119">Example</span></span>

```C
static GX_CHAR text[] = “myrstring”;

/* Set text to the text button “my_text_button”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set(&my_text_button, text);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text of “my_text_button” was set. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5127">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5127">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set_ext</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5128">Przypisywanie tekstu do przycisku tekstowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5128">Assign text to the text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5129">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5129">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_mult_line_text_button_text_set_ext(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_STRING *string)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5130">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5130">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5131">Ta usługa przypisuje określony ciąg do przycisku tekstowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5131">This service assigns the specified string to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5132">Jeśli widżet text_button został utworzony za pomocą stylu GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, widżet tworzy prywatną kopię przypisanego ciągu tekstowego i dlatego interfejs API usługi gx_system_memmory_allocate_set musi zostać wywołany raz przed żądaniem tej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5132">If the text_button widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned, and therefore the gx_system_memmory_allocate_set API must be invoked once before this service is requested.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5133">Jeśli GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY nie jest aktywny, widżet nie robi prywatnej kopii przychodzącego ciągu, dlatego ciąg musi być przydzielany statycznie lub globalnie, tzn. może nie być automatyczną ani tymczasową zmienną.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5133">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5134">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5134">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5135">**text_button** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki przycisku tekstowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5135">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5136">**wskaźnik** ciągu do GX_STRING zmiennej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5136">**string** pointer to GX_STRING variable</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5137">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5137">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5138">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślnie ustaw tekst na przycisk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5138">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the text to the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5139">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5139">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5140">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5140">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5141">**GX_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Alokator pamięci nie jest zdefiniowany</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5141">**GX_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5142">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Nieprawidłowa długość ciągu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5142">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5143">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5143">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5145">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5145">Example</span></span>

```C
static GX_CHAR text[] = “myrstring”;
GX_STRING string;

string.gx_string_ptr = text;
string.gx_string_length = strlen(text);

/* Set text to the text button “my_text_button”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set_ext(&my_text_button, string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text of “my_text_button” was set. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_clear"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5199">gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_clear</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5199">gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_clear</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5200">Usuwa wszystkie znaki z buforu wprowadzania tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5200">Deletes all characters from the text input buffer</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5201">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5201">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_clear(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5202">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5202">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5203">Ta usługa usuwa wszystkie znaki z buforu wprowadzania tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5203">This service deletes all characters from the text input buffer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5204">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5204">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5209">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5209">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5244">gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5244">gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5245">Pobiera informacje o buforze widżetu wprowadzania tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5245">Retrieves buffer information of text input widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5246">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5246">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_get(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input, 
    GX_CHAR **buffer_address,
    UINT *content_size, 
    UINT *buffer_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5247">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5247">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5248">Ta usługa pobiera informacje o buforze widżetu wprowadzania tekstu w wielu wierszach.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5248">This service retrieves buffer information of a multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5249">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5249">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5250">**text_input** Blok sterowania widżetem wprowadzania tekstu w wielu wierszach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5250">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5251">**buffer_address** Adres buforu wejściowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5251">**buffer_address** The address of the input buffer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5252">**content_size** Liczba bajtów danych wejściowych</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5252">**content_size** The byte count of the input data</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5253">**buffer_size** Rozmiar buforu wejściowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5253">**buffer_size** The size of the input buffer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5254">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5254">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5255">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślne uzyskiwanie tekstu wielo wierszowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5255">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi-line text get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5256">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5256">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5257">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5257">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5258">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5258">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5259">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5259">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5260">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5260">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CHAR *buffer_address;
UINT context_size;
UINT buffer_size;

/* Retrieves buffer information of “my_text_input” widget. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_get(&my_text_input,
    &buffer_address, &string_size,
    &buffer_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the value of buffer_address, string_size and buffer_size has been retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5292">gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5292">gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5293">Wstaw ciąg znaków w bieżącej pozycji kursora wprowadzania tekstu w wielu wierszach (przestarzałe)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5293">Insert a character string at current multi line text input cursor position (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5294">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5294">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_UBYTE *insert_str,
    UINT insert_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5295">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5295">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5296">Ten interfejs API jest przestarzały i zastąpiony przez gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5296">This API is deprecated and replaced by gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5297">Ta usługa wstawia ciąg znaków do buforu ciągu wejściowego tekstu wielo wierszowego na bieżącym miejscu kursora.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5297">This service inserts a character string into the multi line text input string buffer at the current cursor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5298">Ta usługa jest wywoływana wewnętrznie po otrzymaniu określonego zdarzenia kluczowych kluczy, ale może być również wywoływana przez aplikację.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5298">This service is called internally when specific key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5299">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5299">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5300">**text_input** Blok sterowania widżetem wprowadzania tekstu w wielu wierszach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5300">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5301">**insert_str** Ciąg znaków formatu UTF-8 do wstawienia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5301">**insert_str** UTF-8 format character string to be inserted</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5302">**insert_size** Liczba bajtów do wstawienia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5302">**insert_size** Byte count to be inserted</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5303">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5303">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5304">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślnie wstawiono ciąg znaków</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5304">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully inserted the character string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5305">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5305">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5306">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5306">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5307">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5307">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5308">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar ciągu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5308">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid string size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5309">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Nieprawidłowa czcionka lub rozmiar buforu jest poza</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5309">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Invalid font or out of buffer size</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5312">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5312">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Insert characters at current cursor position. */
GX_CHAR insert_text[10] = “insert”;
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert(&my_text_input,
    insert_text,
    GX_STRLEN(insert_text));
```

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5316">Wstawianie ciągu znaków w bieżącej pozycji kursora wprowadzania tekstu w wielu wierszach (przestarzałe)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5316">Insert a character string at current multi line text input cursor position (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5317">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5317">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert_ext(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_CONST GX_STRING *string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5318">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5318">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5319">Ta usługa wstawia ciąg znaków do buforu ciągu wejściowego tekstu wielo wierszowego w bieżącym położeniu kursora.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5319">This service inserts a character string into the multi line text input string buffer at the current cursor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5320">Ta usługa jest wywoływana wewnętrznie po otrzymaniu określonych zdarzeń kluczowych, ale może być również wywoływana przez aplikację.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5320">This service is called internally when specific key down events are received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5323">**ciąg** Ciąg znaków zakodowany w formacie UTF-8 do wstawienia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5323">**string** UTF-8 encoded character string to be inserted</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5325">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślnie wstawiono ciąg znaków</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5325">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully inserted the character string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5326">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5326">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

```C
/* Insert characters at current cursor position. */
GX_CHAR insert_text[10] = “insert”;
GX_STRING string;

string.gx_string_ptr = insert_text;
string.gx_string_length = strlen(insert_text);
```
