## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5366">gx_multi_line_text_input_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5366">gx_multi_line_text_input_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5367">Tworzenie wprowadzania tekstu w wielu wierszach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5367">Create multi-line text input</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5368">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5368">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_create(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, GX_WINDOW *parent,
    GX_CHAR *input_buffer, UINT buffer_size,
    ULONG style, USHORT text_input_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5369">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5369">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5370">Ta usługa tworzy widżet wprowadzania tekstu w wielu wierszach.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5370">This service creates a multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5371">GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT pochodzi od usługi GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW obsługuje wszystkie usługi gx_multi_line_text_view.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5371">GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT is derived from GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW and supports all gx_multi_line_text_view services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5372">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5372">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5373">**text_input** Blok sterowania widżetem wprowadzania tekstu w wielu wierszach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5373">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5374">**name (nazwa)** Nazwa widżetu wprowadzania tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5374">**name** Name of text input widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5375">**element nadrzędny** Wskaźnik do widżetu nadrzędnego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5375">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5376">**input_buffer** Wskaźnik do bufora wprowadzania tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5376">**input_buffer** Pointer to text input buffer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5377">**buffer_size** Rozmiar buforu wprowadzania tekstu w bajtach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5377">**buffer_size** Size of text input buffer in bytes</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5378">**style (styl)** Styl widżetu wprowadzania tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5378">**style** Style of text input widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5379">**Dodatek D** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane style ogólne dla wszystkich widżetów, a także style specyficzne dla widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5379">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5380">**text_input_id** Zdefiniowany przez aplikację identyfikator wprowadzania tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5380">**text_input_id** Application-defined ID of text input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5381">**rozmiar** Wymiary widżetu wprowadzania tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5381">**size** Dimensions of text input widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5382">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5382">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5383">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślne tworzenie wielo wiersza tekstu wejściowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5383">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi-line text input create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5384">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5384">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5385">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5385">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5386">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget już utworzony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5386">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5387">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widżet nadrzędny jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5387">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5388">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar bloku kontrolki widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5388">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5389">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5389">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5390">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5390">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5391">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5391">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT my_text_input;
GX_CHAR my_buffer[100];
GX_RECTANGLE size;

/* Define widget size. */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 10, 10, 100, 200);

/* Create multi-line text input widget “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_create(&my_text_input,
    “my_text_input”, &my_parent,
    my_buffer, 100, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
    MY_TEXT_INPUT_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text input “my_text_input” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_cursor_pos_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5423">gx_multi_line_text_input_cursor_pos_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5423">gx_multi_line_text_input_cursor_pos_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5424">Pobieranie położenia kursora wprowadzania tekstu w wielu wierszach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5424">Retrieve multi line text input cursor position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5425">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5425">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_cursor_pos_get(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_POINT cursor_pos);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5426">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5426">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5427">Ta usługa pobiera pozycję kursora wprowadzania tekstu mult-line.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5427">This service retrieves the mult-line text input cursor position.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5428">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5428">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5429">**text_input** Blok sterowania widżetem wprowadzania tekstu w wielu wierszach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5429">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5430">**cursor_pos** Pozycja pobranego kursora</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5430">**cursor_pos** Retrieved cursor position</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5431">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5431">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5432">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślnie pobrano położenie kursora</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5432">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved cursor position</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5433">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5433">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5434">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widżet jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5434">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5435">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5435">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5436">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5436">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5437">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5437">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve the cursor position of “my_text_input”. */
GX_POINT cursor_pos;
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_cursor_pos_get(&my_text_input,
    &cursor_pos);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the cursor position has been retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5470">gx_multi_line_text_input_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5470">gx_multi_line_text_input_delete</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5471">Usuń znak na pozycji kursora wprowadzania tekstu wielo wierszowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5471">Delete the character at the multi line text input cursor position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5472">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5472">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_delete(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5473">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5473">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5474">Ta usługa usuwa znak po pozycji kursora wprowadzania tekstu wielo wierszowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5474">This service deletes the character after the multi line text input cursor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5475">Ta usługa jest wywoływana wewnętrznie po otrzymaniu zdarzenia usunięcia klucza, ale może być również wywoływana przez aplikację.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5475">This service is called internally when a delete key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5476">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5476">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5477">**text_input** Blok sterowania widżetem wprowadzania tekstu w wielu wierszach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5477">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5478">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5478">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5479">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślnie usuń znak po kursorze</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5479">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully delete a character after the cursor</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5480">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5480">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5481">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5481">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5482">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widżet jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5482">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5483">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Nieprawidłowa czcionka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5483">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Invalid font</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5484">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5484">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5485">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5485">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5486">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5486">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Delete the character after the cursor of “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_delete(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the character after the cursor has been deleted. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_down_arrow"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5518">gx_multi_line_text_input_down_arrow</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5518">gx_multi_line_text_input_down_arrow</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5519">Przenoszenie wielo wierszowego kursora wprowadzania tekstu do następnego wiersza</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5519">Move the multi line text input cursor to the next line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5520">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5520">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_down_arrow(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5521">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5521">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5522">Ta usługa umieszcza kursor widżetu wprowadzania tekstu w wielu wierszach do następnego wiersza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5522">This service positions the multi line text input widget cursor to the next line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5523">Ta usługa jest wywoływana wewnętrznie po otrzymaniu zdarzenia ze strzałką w dół, ale może być również wywoływana przez aplikację.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5523">This service is called internally when a down arrow key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5524">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5524">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5525">**text_input** Blok sterowania widżetem wprowadzania tekstu w wielu wierszach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5525">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5526">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5526">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5527">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślnie przeniesiono kursor wprowadzania tekstu do następnego wiersza</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5527">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved text input cursor to the next line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5528">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5528">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5529">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5529">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5530">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widżet jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5530">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5531">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Nieprawidłowa czcionka lub wysokość wiersza</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5531">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Invalid font or line height</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5532">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5532">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5533">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5533">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5534">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5534">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move input cursor to the next line. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_down_arrow(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, text text input cursor has been moved to the next line. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_end"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5566">gx_multi_line_text_input_end</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5566">gx_multi_line_text_input_end</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5567">Przenieś wielo wierszowy kursor wprowadzania tekstu na koniec bieżącego wiersza</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5567">Move the multi line text input cursor to the end of the current line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5568">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5568">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_end(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5569">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5569">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5570">Ta usługa umieszcza kursor widżetu wprowadzania tekstu wielo wiersza na końcu bieżącego wiersza ciągu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5570">This service positions the multi line text input widget cursor to the end of the current string line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5571">Ta usługa jest wywoływana wewnętrznie po otrzymaniu zdarzenia kluczowych kluczy końcowych, ale może być również wywoływana przez aplikację.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5571">This service is called internally when an end key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5572">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5572">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5573">**text_input** Blok sterowania widżetem wprowadzania tekstu w wielu wierszach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5573">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5574">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5574">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5575">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślnie przeniesiono kursor wprowadzania tekstu na koniec bieżącego wiersza</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5575">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved text input cursor to end of the current line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5576">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5576">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5577">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5577">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5578">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widżet jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5578">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5579">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5579">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5580">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5580">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5581">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5581">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move input cursor to the end of current line. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_end(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the multi line text input cursor has been moved to the end of the current line. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5613">gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5613">gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5614">Domyślna obsługa zdarzeń w przypadku wprowadzania tekstu w wielu wierszach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5614">Default event handling for multi-line text input</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5615">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5615">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *input,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5616">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5616">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5617">Ta usługa jest domyślną funkcją obsługi zdarzeń dla widżetu wprowadzania tekstu w wielu wierszach.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5617">This service is the default event handling function for the multi line text input widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5618">Ta funkcja jest dostępna dla aplikacji, które chcą zapewnić niestandardową obsługę zdarzeń dla widżetu wprowadzania tekstu w wielu wierszach.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5618">This function is made accessible to applications that want to provide custom event handling for a multi line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5619">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5619">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5620">**przycisk** Wskaźnik do wielo wierszowego bloku kontrolki wprowadzania tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5620">**button** Pointer to multi line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5621">**event_ptr** Zdarzenie do przetworzenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5621">**event_ptr** Event to be processed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5622">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5622">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5623">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślnie obsłużone zdarzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5623">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully handled event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5624">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5624">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5625">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5625">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5626">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widżet nadrzędny jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5626">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5627">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5627">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5628">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5628">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5629">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5629">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT MyEventHandler(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *input,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* pass all other events to the generic multi line text
            input event processing */
        gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process(input, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return GX_SUCCESS;
}
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_fill_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5661">gx_multi_line_text_input_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5661">gx_multi_line_text_input_fill_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5662">Ustawianie koloru tła wprowadzania tekstu w wielu wierszach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5662">Set multi line text input background color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5663">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5663">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_fill_color_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID readonly_fill_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5664">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5664">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5665">Ta usługa przypisuje kolory wypełnienia dla widżetu wprowadzania tekstu wielo wierszowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5665">This service assigns fill colors for the multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5666">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5666">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5667">**text_input** Blok sterowania widżetem wprowadzania tekstu w wielu wierszach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5667">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5668">**normal_fill_color_id** Identyfikator zasobu normalnego koloru wypełnienia, który był używany w stanie normalnym</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5668">**normal_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the normal fill color that used in normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5669">**selected_fill_color_id** Identyfikator zasobu wybranego koloru wypełnienia, który był używany podczas koncentracji uwagi widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5669">**selected_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the selected fill color that used when the widget gain focus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5670">**disabled_fill_color_id** Identyfikator zasobu wyłączonego koloru wypełnienia, który jest używany GX_STYLE_ENABLED nie jest aktywny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5670">**disabled_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the disabled fill color that used when GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not active</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5671">**readonly_fill_color_id** Identyfikator zasobu koloru wypełnienia tylko do odczytu, który jest używany, gdy GX_STYLE_ENABLED i GX_STYLE_INPUT_READONLY aktywne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5671">**readonly_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the read only fill color that used when both GX_STYLE_ENABLED and GX_STYLE_INPUT_READONLY are active.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5672">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5672">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5673">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślnie ustawiono kolory dla wprowadzania tekstu w wielu wierszach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5673">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set colors for the multi-line text input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5674">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5674">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5675">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5675">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5676">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5676">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5677">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5677">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5678">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5678">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set fill colors for the multi-line text input widget “my_text_input”. */

status = gx_multi_line_text_input_fill_color_set(&my_text_input,
    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_FILL,
    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_FILL,
    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_FILL,
    GX_COLOR_ID_READONLY_FILL);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the fill color of “my_text_input” has been successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_home"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5710">gx_multi_line_text_input_home</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5710">gx_multi_line_text_input_home</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5711">Przenoszenie kursora wprowadzania tekstu na początek bieżącego wiersza</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5711">Move the text input cursor to the start of the current line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5712">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5712">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_home(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5713">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5713">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5714">Ta usługa przenosi położenie kursora wprowadzania tekstu na początek bieżącego wiersza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5714">This service moves the text input cursor position to the start of the current line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5715">Ta usługa jest wywoływana wewnętrznie po otrzymaniu zdarzenia kluczowych kluczy głównych, ale może być również wywoływana przez aplikację.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5715">This service is called internally when a home key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5716">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5716">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5717">**text_input** Blok sterowania widżetem wprowadzania tekstu w wielu wierszach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5717">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5718">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5718">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5719">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślnie przeniesiono kursor na początek bieżącego wiersza</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5719">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved cursor to start of the current line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5720">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5720">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5721">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5721">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5722">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5722">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5723">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5723">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5724">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5724">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5725">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5725">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move cursor to the start of the current line. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_home(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the cursor has been moved to the start of the current line. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_left_arrow"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5757">gx_multi_line_text_input_left_arrow</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5757">gx_multi_line_text_input_left_arrow</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5758">Przenoszenie kursora wprowadzania tekstu wielo wierszowego o jeden znak w lewo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5758">Move multi line text input cursor one character to the left</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5759">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5759">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_left_arrow(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5760">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5760">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5761">Ta usługa przenosi wielo wierszowy kursor wprowadzania tekstu o jeden znak w lewo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5761">This service moves the multi line text input cursor one character to the left.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5762">Ta usługa jest wywoływana wewnętrznie po otrzymaniu zdarzenia z lewym kluczem, ale może być również wywoływana przez aplikację.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5762">This service is called internally when a left key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5763">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5763">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5764">**text_input** Blok kontrolki widżetu wprowadzania tekstu jedno wierszowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5764">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5765">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5765">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5766">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślnie przeniesiono kursor w lewo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5766">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved cursor to the left</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5767">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5767">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5768">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5768">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5769">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5769">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5770">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Nieprawidłowa czcionka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5770">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Invalid font</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5771">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5771">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
/* Move the cursor one character to the left. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_right_arrow"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5805">gx_multi_line_text_input_right_arrow</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5805">gx_multi_line_text_input_right_arrow</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5806">Przenoszenie kursora wprowadzania tekstu w wierszu mult o jeden znak w prawo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5806">Move mult line text input cursor one character to the right</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5807">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5807">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_right_arrow(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5808">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5808">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5809">Ta usługa przenosi wielo wierszowy kursor wprowadzania tekstu o jeden znak w prawo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5809">This service moves the multi line text input cursor one character to the right.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5810">Ta usługa jest wywoływana wewnętrznie po otrzymaniu zdarzenia kluczowych kluczy, ale może być również wywoływana przez aplikację.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5810">This service is called internally when a right key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5811">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5811">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5812">**text_input** Blok sterowania widżetem wprowadzania tekstu w wielu wierszach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5812">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5813">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5813">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5814">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślnie przeniesiono kursor w prawo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5814">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved cursor to the right</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5815">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5815">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5816">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5816">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5817">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5817">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5818">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5818">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5819">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5819">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5820">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5820">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move cursor one character to the right. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_right_arrow(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text input cursor has been moved one character to the right. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_style_add"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5852">gx_multi_line_text_input_style_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5852">gx_multi_line_text_input_style_add</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5853">Dodawanie stylów wprowadzania tekstu wielo wierszowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5853">Add multi line text input styles</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5854">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5854">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_style_add(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5855">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5855">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5856">Ta usługa dodaje style do widżetu wprowadzania tekstu w wielu wierszach.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5856">This service adds styles to a multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5857">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5857">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5858">**text_input** Blok sterowania widżetem wprowadzania tekstu w wielu wierszach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5858">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5859">**style (styl)** Style do dodania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5859">**style** Styles to add.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5860">**Dodatek D** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane style ogólne dla wszystkich widżetów</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5860">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5861">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5861">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5862">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślne dodanie stylu wprowadzania tekstu w wielu wierszach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5862">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi-line text input style add</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5863">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5863">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5864">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5864">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5865">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5865">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5866">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5866">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5867">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5867">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Add style GX_STYTLE_CURSOR_ALWAYS to multi-line text input widget “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_style_add(&my_text_input,
    GX_STYLE_CURSOR_ALWAYS);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the style GX_STYLE_CURSOR_ALWAYS has been successfully added. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_style_remove"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5899">gx_multi_line_text_input_style_remove</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5899">gx_multi_line_text_input_style_remove</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5900">Usuwanie stylów</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5900">Remove styles</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5901">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5901">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_remove(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5902">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5902">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5903">Ta usługa usuwa określone style z widżetu wprowadzania tekstu w wielu wierszach.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5903">This service removes the specified styles from the multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5904">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5904">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5905">**text_input** Blok sterowania widżetem wprowadzania tekstu w wielu wierszach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5905">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5906">**style (styl)** Style do usunięcia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5906">**style** Styles to remove.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5907">**Dodatek D** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane style ogólne dla wszystkich widżetów</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5907">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5908">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5908">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5910">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5910">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5914">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5914">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Remove style GX_STYLE_CURSOR_ALWAYS from text input widget “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_style_remove(&my_text_input,
    GX_STYLE_CURSOR_ALWAYS);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the style GX_STYLE_CURSOR_ALWAYS has been successfully removed. */
```

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5950">Ta usługa ustawia style dla widżetu wprowadzania tekstu w wielu wierszach.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5950">This service sets styles for a multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5993">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5993">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5994">Ustawianie koloru tekstu wejściowego tekstu wielo wierszowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5994">Set multi line text input text color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5995">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5995">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_text_color_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID readonly_text_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5996">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5996">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-5997">Ta usługa przypisuje kolory tekstu dla widżetu wprowadzania tekstu w wielu wierszach.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5997">This service assigns text colors for the multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-5998">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5998">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-5999">**text_input** Blok sterowania widżetem wprowadzania tekstu w wielu wierszach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-5999">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-6000">**normal_fill_color_id** Identyfikator zasobu normalnego koloru tekstu, który był używany w stanie normalnym</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6000">**normal_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the normal text color that used in normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-6001">**selected_text_color_id** Identyfikator zasobu wybranego koloru tekstu, który był używany podczas koncentracji uwagi widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6001">**selected_text_color_id** Resource ID of the selected text color that used when the widget gain focus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-6002">**disabled_text_color_id** Identyfikator zasobu wyłączonego koloru tekstu, który jest używany, GX_STYLE_ENABLED nie jest aktywny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6002">**disabled_text_color_id** Resource ID of the disabled text color that used when GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not active</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-6003">**readonly_text_color_id** Identyfikator zasobu koloru tekstu tylko do odczytu, który jest używany, gdy GX_STYLE_ENABLED i GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READONLY są aktywne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6003">**readonly_text_color_id** Resource ID of the read only text color that used when both GX_STYLE_ENABLED and GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READONLY are active</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-6004">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6004">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-6005">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślnie ustawiono kolory dla wprowadzania tekstu w wielu wierszach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6005">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set colors for the multi-line text input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-6006">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6006">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-6007">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6007">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-6008">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6008">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-6009">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6009">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-6010">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6010">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set text colors for the multi-line text input widget “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_text_color_set(&my_text_input,
    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_READONLY_TEXT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the fill colors of “my_text_view” has been successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_text_select"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-6042">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_select</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6042">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_select</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-6043">Zaznaczanie tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6043">Select text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-6044">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6044">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_text_select(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    UINT start_index, UINT end_index);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-6045">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6045">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-6046">Ta usługa wybiera tekst wejściowy tekstu wielo wierszowego z określonym znakiem startowym i indeksem znacznika końcowego oraz wyróżnia zaznaczony tekst wybranym kolorem wypełnienia i tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6046">This service selects multi line text input text with specified start mark and end mark index and highlights the selected text with the selected fill and text colors.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-6047">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6047">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-6048">**text_input** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki wprowadzania tekstu w wielu wierszach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6048">**text_input** Pointer to multi line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-6049">**start_index** Indeks pierwszego wybranego znaku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6049">**start_index** Index of the first selected character</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-6050">**end_index** Indeks ostatniego wybranego znaku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6050">**end_index** Index of the last selected character</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-6051">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6051">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-6052">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślne zaznaczenie tekstu wejściowego tekstu w wielu wierszach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6052">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi line text input text selection</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-6053">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6053">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-6054">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6054">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-6055">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6055">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-6056">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Indeks jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6056">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Index value not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-6057">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6057">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-6058">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6058">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-6059">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6059">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Select text between index [0, 9]. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_text_select(&my_text_input,
    0,9);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text between 
    index [0, 9] “my_text_input” was selected. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-6091">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6091">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-6092">Przypisywanie tekstu do tekstu wejściowego (przestarzałe)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6092">Assign text to the text input (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-6093">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6093">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_mult_line_text_input_text_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-6094">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6094">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-6095">Ten interfejs API jest przestarzały i zastąp gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6095">This API is deprecated and replace by gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-6096">Ta usługa przypisuje określony ciąg do wprowadzania tekstu w wielu wierszach.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6096">This service assigns the specified string to the multi line text input.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-6097">Jeśli rozmiar multi_line_text_input buforu wejściowego widżetu jest mniejszy niż długość ciągu, ciąg zostanie obcięty.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6097">If the multi_line_text_input widget’s input buffer size is smaller than string length, the string will be truncated.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-6098">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6098">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-6099">**text_input** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki wprowadzania tekstu w wielu wierszach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6099">**text_input** Pointer to multi line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-6100">**wskaźnik tekstowy** do ciągu zakończonego wartością NULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6100">**text** pointer to the NULL-terminated string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-6101">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6101">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-6102">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślnie ustaw tekst na wprowadzanie tekstu w wielu wierszach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6102">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the text to the multi line text input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-6103">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6103">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-6104">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6104">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-6105">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Nieprawidłowa długość ciągu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6105">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-6106">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6106">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-6107">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6107">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-6108">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6108">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the string “my string” to the text button “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set(&my_text_input,
    “myrstring”);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the content of “my_text_input” bas been reset. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_up_arrow"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-6159">gx_multi_line_text_input_up_arrow</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6159">gx_multi_line_text_input_up_arrow</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-6160">Przenoszenie kursora wprowadzania tekstu wielo wierszowego do poprzedniego wiersza</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6160">Move multi line text input cursor to the previous line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-6161">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6161">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_up_arrow(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-6162">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6162">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-6163">Ta usługa przenosi wielo wierszowy kursor wprowadzania tekstu do poprzedniego wiersza tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6163">This service moves the multi line text input cursor to the previous line of text.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-6164">Ta usługa jest wywoływana wewnętrznie po otrzymaniu zdarzenia strzałki w dół, ale może być również wywoływana przez aplikację.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6164">This service is called internally when an up arrow key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-6206">gx_multi_line_text_view_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6206">gx_multi_line_text_view_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-6207">Tworzenie widoku tekstowego z wieloma wierszami</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6207">Create multi-line text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-6208">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6208">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_create(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WINDOW *parent, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT text_view_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-6209">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6209">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-6210">Ta usługa tworzy GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6210">This service creates a GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-6211">Ten typ widżetu pochodzi od GX_WINDOW i dlatego wszystkie usługi gx_window API mogą być również używane z tym typem widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6211">This widget type is derived from GX_WINDOW, and therefore all gx_window API services may also be utilized with this widget type.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-6212">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6212">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-6213">**text_view** Blok kontrolki widżetu widoku tekstu wielo wierszowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6213">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-6214">**name (nazwa)** Nazwa widżetu widoku tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6214">**name** Name of the text view widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-6215">**element nadrzędny** Wskaźnik do widżetu nadrzędnego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6215">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-6216">**text_id** Identyfikator zasobu ciągu tekstowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6216">**text_id** Resource ID of the text string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-6217">**style (styl)** Styl widżetu widoku tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6217">**style** Style of text view widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-6218">**Dodatek D** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane style ogólne dla wszystkich widżetów, a także style specyficzne dla widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6218">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-6219">**text_view_id** Zdefiniowany przez aplikację identyfikator widoku tekstowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6219">**text_view_id** Application-defined ID of text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-6220">**rozmiar** Wymiary widżetu widoku tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6220">**size** Dimensions of text view widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-6221">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6221">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-6222">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślnie utworzono widżet widoku tekstowego z wieloma wierszami</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6222">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created multi-line text view widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-6223">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6223">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-6224">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6224">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-6225">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget już utworzony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6225">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-6226">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar bloku kontrolki widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6226">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-6227">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6227">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-6228">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6228">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-6229">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6229">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create multi-line text view widget “my_text_view”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_create(&my_text_view,
    “my_text_view”, &my_parent,
    TEXT_STRING_ID, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
    MY_TEXT_VIEW_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text view “my_text_view” has been successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-6305">gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6305">gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-6306">Przetwarzanie zdarzenia widoku tekstu wielo wiersza</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6306">Process multi-line text view event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-6307">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6307">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-6308">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6308">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-6309">Ta usługa przetwarza zdarzenie dla widżetu wielo wierszowego widoku tekstowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6309">This service processes an event for a multi-line text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-6310">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6310">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-6311">**text_view** Blok kontrolki widżetu widoku tekstu wielo wierszowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6311">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-6312">**zdarzenie** Wskaźnik do zdarzenia do przetwarzania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6312">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-6313">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6313">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-6314">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślny wielo wierszowy proces zdarzenia widoku tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6314">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi-line text view event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-6315">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6315">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-6316">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6316">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-6317">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widżet jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6317">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-6318">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6318">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-6319">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6319">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-6320">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6320">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event handler. */
UINT my_event_handler(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *view, GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process(view, event_ptr);
        /* Add custom actions here. */
        break;
    default:
        gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process (view, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return GX_SUCCESS;
}
```


## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_line_space_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-6398">gx_multi_line_text_view_line_space_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6398">gx_multi_line_text_view_line_space_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-6399">Ustawianie obszaru wiersza widoku tekstu wielo wierszowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6399">Set multi-line text view line space</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-6400">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6400">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_line_space_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_BYTE line_space);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-6401">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6401">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-6402">Ta usługa ustawia odstępy między wierszami tekstu dla widżetu widoku tekstu wieloliniowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6402">This service sets the spacing between lines of text for the multi-line text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-6403">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6403">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-6404">**widok** Blok kontrolki widżetu widoku tekstu wielo wierszowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6404">**view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-6405">**line_space** Wartość do ustawienia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6405">**line_space** Value to set</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-6406">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6406">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-6407">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślnie ustawiono wartość obszaru wiersza dla widoku tekstu wielo wierszowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6407">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set line space value for the multi-line text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-6408">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6408">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-6409">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6409">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-6410">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6410">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-6411">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6411">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
/* Set line space of “my_text_view” to 2. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_line_space_set(&my_text_view, 2);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the line space of “my_text_view” has been successfully set to 2. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_scroll_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-6443">gx_multi_line_text_view_scroll_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6443">gx_multi_line_text_view_scroll_info_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-6444">Uzyskiwanie informacji o przewijaniu widoku tekstowego z wieloma wierszami</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6444">Get multi-line text view scroll info</span></span>


### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-6445">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6445">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_scroll_info_get(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, ULONG style,
    GX_SCROLL_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-6446">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6446">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-6447">Ta usługa pobiera informacje o przewijaniu widoku tekstowego z wieloma wierszami.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6447">This service gets the multi-line text view scroll information.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-6448">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6448">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-6449">**text_view** Blok kontrolki widżetu widoku tekstu wielo wierszowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6449">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-6450">**Styl** GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL lub GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6450">**Style** GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL or GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-6451">**Informacje** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla informacji o przewijaniu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6451">**Info** Pointer to destination for scroll info.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-6452">**Dodatek I** zawiera definicję GX_SCROLL_INFO struktury.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6452">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SCROLL_INFO structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-6453">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6453">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-6454">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślnie pobrano informacje o przewijaniu widoku tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6454">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved text view scroll info</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-6455">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Widget nie jest widoczny lub identyfikator czcionki widoku tekstowego jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6455">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Widget is not visible or text view font id is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-6456">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-6456">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
