## <a name="gx_text_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-11843">gx_text_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11843">gx_text_button_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-11844">Przycisk Utwórz tekst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11844">Create text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-11845">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11845">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_button_create(
    GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id, 
    ULONG style,
    USHORT text_button_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-11846">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11846">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-11847">Ta usługa tworzy widżet przycisku tekstowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11847">This service creates a text button widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-11848">GX_TEXT_BUTTON pochodzi od usługi GX_BUTTON obsługuje wszystkie usługi gx_button API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11848">GX_TEXT_BUTTON is derived from GX_BUTTON and supports all gx_button API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-11849">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11849">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-11850">**text_button:** wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki przycisku tekstowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11850">**text_button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-11851">**name**: Nazwa logiczna przycisku tekstowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11851">**name**: Logical name of text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-11852">**parent**: Wskaźnik do widżetu nadrzędnego przycisku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11852">**parent**: Pointer to parent widget of the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-11853">**text_id:** identyfikator zasobu tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11853">**text_id**: Resource ID of text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-11854">**style:** styl przycisku tekstowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11854">**style**: Text button style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-11855">**Dodatek D** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane style ogólne dla wszystkich widżetów, a także style specyficzne dla widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11855">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-11856">**text_button_id:** Zdefiniowany przez aplikację identyfikator przycisku tekstowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11856">**text_button_id**: Application-defined ID of the text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-11857">**size:** rozmiar przycisku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11857">**size**: Size of the button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-11858">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11858">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-11859">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Pomyślne utworzenie przycisku tekstowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11859">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful text button create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-11860">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11860">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-11861">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11861">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-11862">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED:**(0x13) Widżet został już utworzony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11862">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-11863">**GX_INVALID_SIZE:**(0x19) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar bloku kontrolki widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11863">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-11864">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widżet nadrzędny jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11864">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>


### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-11865">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11865">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-11866">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11866">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-11867">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11867">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_TEXT_BUTTON my_text_button;

GX_RECTANGLE size;

/* Define widget size. */

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 0, 0, 100, 100);

/* Create text button “my_text_button”. */

status = gx_text_button_create(&my_text_button, "my text button",
    &my_parent_window, MY_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID,
    GX_STYLE_BUTTON_TOGGLE, MY_TEXT_BUTTON_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text button “my_text_button” was
created. */
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-11885">gx_text_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11885">gx_text_button_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-11886">Przycisk Rysowanie tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11886">Draw text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-11887">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11887">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_text_button_draw(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-11888">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11888">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-11889">Ta usługa rysuje przycisk tekstowy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11889">This service draws the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-11890">Ta usługa jest zwykle wywoływana wewnętrznie podczas odświeżania kanwy, ale może być również wywoływana z niestandardowych funkcji rysowania przycisków tekstowych.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11890">This service is normally called internally during canvas refresh, but can also be called from custom text button drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-11891">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11891">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-11892">**button:** blok sterujący wskaźnika do przycisku tekstowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11892">**button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-11893">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11893">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-11894">**Brak**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11894">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-11895">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11895">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-11896">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11896">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-11897">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11897">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom text button draw function. */

VOID my_text_button_draw(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button)
{
    /* Call default text button draw. */
    gx_text_button_draw(text_button);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-11915">gx_text_button_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11915">gx_text_button_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-11916">Zdarzenie przycisku Przetwarzaj tekst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11916">Process text button event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-11917">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11917">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_button_event_process(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button, GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-11918">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11918">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-11919">Ta usługa przetwarza zdarzenie dla określonego przycisku tekstowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11919">This service processes an event for the specified text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-11920">Ta usługa powinna być wywoływana jako domyślna procedura obsługi zdarzeń przez dowolne niestandardowe funkcje przetwarzania zdarzeń przycisku tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11920">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom text button event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-11921">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11921">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-11922">**text_button** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki przycisku tekstowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11922">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-11923">**event_ptr** Wskaźnik do zdarzenia do przetwarzania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11923">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-11924">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11924">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-11925">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Powodzenie procesu zdarzenia przycisku tekstowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11925">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text button event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-11926">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11926">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-11927">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11927">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-11928">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11928">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-11929">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11929">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-11930">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11930">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-11931">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11931">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic text button event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_text_button_event_process(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button, GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default text button event processing */
        status = gx_text_button_event_process(wheel, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_font_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-11949">gx_text_button_font_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11949">gx_text_button_font_set</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-11951">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11951">Prototype</span></span>

```C
    GX_TEXT_BUTTON *button,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID font_id);
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-11959">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11959">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-11960">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11960">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

## <a name="gx_text_button_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-11982">gx_text_button_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11982">gx_text_button_text_color_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-11983">Ustawianie koloru przycisku tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11983">Set text button color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-11984">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11984">Prototype</span></span>

```C

    GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_text_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-11985">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11985">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-11986">Ta usługa ustawia kolor przycisku tekstowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11986">This service sets the color of the text button.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-11987">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11987">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-11989">**normal_text_color_id:** Identyfikator zasobu zwykłego tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11989">**normal_text_color_id**: Resource ID of normal text.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-11990">**Dodatek A** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane identyfikatory zasobów kolorów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11990">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-11991">Należy pamiętać, że aplikacja może również dodawać niestandardowe identyfikatory zasobów w kolorze.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11991">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-11995">**disabled_text_color_id:** Identyfikator zasobu koloru dla tekstu wyłączonego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11995">**disabled_text_color_id**: Resource ID of color for disabled text.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-11996">**Dodatek A** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane identyfikatory zasobów kolorów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11996">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-11997">Należy pamiętać, że aplikacja może również dodawać niestandardowe identyfikatory zasobów w kolorze.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11997">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-11999">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Zestaw kolorów przycisku Tekst pomyślny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-11999">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful text button color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12000">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12000">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

```C
    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT);

set. */
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12022">gx_text_button_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12022">gx_text_button_text_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12023">Funkcja obsługi rysowania tekstu przycisku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12023">Support function to draw button text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12024">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12024">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_text_button_text_draw(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12025">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12025">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12026">Ta funkcja obsługi rysuje część tekstową przycisku tekstowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12026">This support function draws the text portion of a text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12027">Ta funkcja jest wywoływana wewnętrznie przez gx_text_button_draw i jest dostarczana jako oddzielny interfejs API jako udogodnienie dla aplikacji, które definiują niestandardową funkcję rysowania przycisków.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12027">This function is called internally by gx_text_button_draw, and is provided as a separate API as a convenience for applications that define a custom button drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12028">Aplikacje, które chcą dostosować rysunek tła przycisku, mogą zapewnić niestandardową funkcję rysowania i wywołać usługę gx_text_button_text_draw jako część niestandardowego rysowania w celu narysowania tekstu przycisku w tle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12028">Applications that want to customize the button background drawing can provide their custom drawing function, and invoke the gx_text_button_text_draw service as part of their custom drawing to draw the button text over the background.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12029">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12029">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12030">**text_button:** blok sterowania wskaźnika do przycisku tekstowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12030">**text_button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12031">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12031">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12032">**Brak**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12032">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12033">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12033">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12034">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12034">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12035">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12035">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom drawing function */

VOID my_button_draw(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Insert code here to draw button background */

    /* Call support function to do text drawing */
    gx_text_button_text_draw(button);

    /* Draw child widgets */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *) button);
}
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_text_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12052">gx_text_button_text_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12052">gx_text_button_text_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12053">Pobierz tekst z przycisku tekstowego (przestarzałe)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12053">Get text from the text button (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12054">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12054">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_button_text_get(
    GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_CHAR **return_text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12055">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12055">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12056">Ta usługa jest przestarzała na rzecz gx_text_button_text_get_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12056">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_text_button_text_get_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12057">Ta usługa pobiera określony ciąg z przycisku tekstowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12057">This service retrieves the specified string from the text button.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12058">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12058">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12059">**text_button:** wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki przycisku tekstowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12059">**text_button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12060">**return_text:** wskaźnik do ciągu pobranego z przycisku tekstowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12060">**return_text**: Pointer to the string retrieved from the text button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12061">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12061">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12062">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Pomyślnie pobierz tekst z przycisku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12062">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully get the text from the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12063">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12063">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12065">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widżet jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12065">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12066">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12066">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
GX_CHAR *string;

/* Get the string from the text button “my_text_button”. */
status = gx_text_button_text_get(&my_text_button, &string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the string pointer from
“my_text_button” is retrieved and stored in string. */
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_text_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12135">gx_text_button_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12135">gx_text_button_text_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12136">Przypisywanie tekstu do przycisku tekstowego (przestarzałe)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12136">Assign text to the text button (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12137">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12137">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_button_text_set(
    GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12138">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12138">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12139">Ta usługa jest przestarzała na rzecz gx_text_button_text_set_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12139">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_text_button_text_set_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12140">Ta usługa przypisuje określony ciąg do przycisku tekstowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12140">This service assigns the specified string to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12141">Jeśli widżet text_button został utworzony z GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, widżet tworzy prywatną kopię przypisanego ciągu tekstowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12141">If the text_button widget was created with style  GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12142">Jeśli GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY nie jest aktywny, widżet nie będzie prywatną kopią ciągu przychodzącego, dlatego ciąg musi być przydzielany statycznie lub globalnie, tzn. może nie być zmienną automatyczną lub tymczasową.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12142">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12143">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12143">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12144">**text_button:** wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki przycisku tekstowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12144">**text_button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12145">**text**: wskaźnik do ciągu zakończonego wartością NULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12145">**text**: pointer to the NULL-terminated string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12146">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12146">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12147">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Pomyślnie ustaw tekst na przycisk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12147">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set the text to the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12148">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12148">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12149">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12149">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12150">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widżet jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12150">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12151">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR:**(0x30) Alokator pamięci nie został zdefiniowany lub alokacja pamięci nie powiodła się</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12151">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator not defined or memory allocation failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12152">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH:**(0x34) Nieprawidłowa długość ciągu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12152">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

```C
    GX_UBYTE blink_interval);
```

```C
/* Pointer the input cursor to the cursor instance of single/multi
line text input widget. */

input_cursor = &sl_input.gx_single_line_text_input_cursor_instance;

/* Set the blink interval value of “input_cursor” to 2. */
status = gx_text_input_cursor_blink_interval_set(input_cursor, 2);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the blink interval value of
“input_cursor” has been successfully set to 2. */
```

## <a name="gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12250">gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12250">gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12251">Przypisywanie funkcji wywołania zwrotnego typu tekstowego kółka przewijania (przestarzałe)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12251">Assign the callback function of text type scroll wheel (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12252">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12252">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set(
    GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *(*callback)(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *, int));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12253">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12253">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12254">Ta usługa jest przestarzała na rzecz gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12254">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12255">Ta usługa przypisuje funkcję wywołania zwrotnego, która zostanie wywołana przez kółka przewijania typu tekstu w celu określenia ciągu tekstowego do wyświetlania w każdym wierszu koła przewijania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12255">This service assigns the callback function which a text type scroll wheel will invoke to determine the text string to be displayed at each row of the scroll wheel.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12256">W GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL i GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL są udostępniane domyślne funkcje wywołania zwrotnego, a aplikacja nie musi wprowadzać żadnych zmian w celu używania tych implementacji domyślnych.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12256">For GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL and GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL, default callback functions are provided and the application does not need to make any changes to use these default implementations.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12257">Ten interfejs API umożliwia aplikacji dostosowanie formatowania lub innych parametrów ciągu wyświetlanych w każdym wierszu widżetu kółka przewijania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12257">This API is provided to allow the application to customize the formatting or other parameters of the string that is displayed on each row of the scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12258">Funkcja wywołania zwrotnego otrzyma jako dane wejściowe wskaźnik do bloku sterowania kółka przewijania i wyświetlanego numeru wiersza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12258">The callback function will receive as input a pointer to the scroll wheel control block and the row number that is being displayed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12259">Funkcja powinna zwrócić wskaźnik do ciągu tekstowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12259">The function should return a pointer to a text string.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12260">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12260">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12261">**wheel (koło)** Adres bloku sterowania kółka przewijania ciągów</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12261">**wheel** String scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12262">**wywołanie zwrotne** Wskaźnik do funkcji wywołania zwrotnego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12262">**callback** Pointer to callback function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12263">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12263">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12264">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Pomyślnie ustaw wywołanie zwrotne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12264">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set callback</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12265">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12265">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12266">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widżet jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12266">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12267">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12267">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12268">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12268">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12269">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12269">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL wheel;

GX_CHAR string_buffer[20];

GX_CHAR *my_wheel_callback(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, int row)
{
    /* Just for an example, return row number as string for rows
    >= 0, and return text “Invalid” otherwise */
    if (row >= 0)
    {
        gx_utility_ltoa(row, string_buffer, 20);
    }
    else
    {
        return(“Invalid”);
    }
}

gx_text_scroll_wheel_create(&wheel, “my wheel”, root, 10,
    GX_STYLE_ENABLED|GX_STYLE_TEXT_CENTER|GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT|
    GX_STYLE_WRAP|ID_MY_WHEEL, &size);

status = gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set(&wheel,
    my_wheel_callback);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the scroll whell callback function has
been set. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12299">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Pomyślnie ustawiono wywołanie zwrotne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12299">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set callback</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12300">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12300">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12301">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widżet jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12301">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12302">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12302">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12303">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12303">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12304">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12304">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL wheel;

GX_CHAR string_buffer[20];

UINT *my_wheel_callback(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, int row,
    GX_STRING *return_string)
{
    /* Just for an example, return row number as string for rows
    >= 0, and return text “Invalid” otherwise */
    if (row >= 0)
    {
        gx_utility_ltoa(row, string_buffer, 20);
        return_string->gx_string_ptr = string_buffer;
        return_string->gx_string_length = strlen(string_buffer);
    }
    else
    {
        return_string->gx_string_ptr = “Invalid”;
        return_string->gx_string_length = strlen(“Invalid”);
    }

    return GX_SUCCESS;
}

gx_text_scroll_wheel_create(&wheel, “my wheel”, root, 10,
    GX_STYLE_ENABLED|GX_STYLE_TEXT_CENTER|GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT|
    GX_STYLE_WRAP|ID_MY_WHEEL, &size);

status = gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext(&wheel,
    my_wheel_callback);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the scroll whell callback function has
been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_text_scroll_wheel_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12321">gx_text_scroll_wheel_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12321">gx_text_scroll_wheel_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12322">Tworzenie kółka przewijania tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12322">Create a text scroll wheel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12323">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12323">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_scroll_wheel_create(
    GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    INT total_rows,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT Id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12324">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12324">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12325">Ta usługa tworzy kółka przewijania tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12325">This service creates a text scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12326">Kółka przewijania tekstu jest widżetem bazowym dla GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL i GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL typu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12326">The text scroll wheel is a base widget for the GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL and GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL type widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12327">Ta funkcja jest wywoływana wewnętrznie przez gx_string_scroll_wheel_create i gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create i jest dostarczana jako oddzielny interfejs API jako udogodnienie dla aplikacji, które definiują niestandardowy widżet koła przewijania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12327">This function is called internally by gx_string_scroll_wheel_create and gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create, and is provided as a separate API as a convenience for applications that define a custom scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12328">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12328">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12329">**wheel:** adres bloku sterowania kółka przewijania tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12329">**wheel**: Text scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12330">**name**: Nazwa widżetu zdefiniowanego przez aplikację</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12330">**name**: Application defined widget name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12331">**parent**: wheel parent lub GX_NULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12331">**parent**: Wheel parent or GX_NULL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12332">**total_rows:** Łączna liczba wierszy do zaprezentowania użytkownikowi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12332">**total_rows**: Total rows to be presented to user</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12333">**style:** flagi żądanego stylu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12333">**style**: Desired style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12334">**Identyfikator:** Flagi stylu koła zdefiniowane przez aplikację</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12334">**Id**: Application defined wheel style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12335">**rozmiar:** początkowy rozmiar koła przewijania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12335">**size**: Initial scroll wheel size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12336">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12336">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12337">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Pomyślnie utworzono koło przewijania tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12337">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully created text scroll wheel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12338">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12338">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12339">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12339">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12340">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED:**(0x13) Widget już utworzony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12340">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12341">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widżet jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12341">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>


### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12342">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12342">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12343">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12343">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12344">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12344">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom scroll wheel widget. */
typedef MY_SCROLL_WHEEL_STRUCT
{
    GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL text_scroll_wheel;

    /* Add custom members here. */

} MY_SCROLL_WHEEL;

MY_SCROLL_WHEEL my_scroll_wheel;

UINT my_scroll_wheel_create(MY_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, GX_WIDGET *parent,
    INT total_rows, ULONG style, USHORT Id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size)
{
    /* Call base creation. */
    status = gx_text_scroll_wheel_create(
        &wheel.text_scroll_wheel,
        ”my_text_scroll_wheel”, GX_NULL, 7,
        GX_STYLE_ENABLED, ID_MY_SCROLL_WHEEL, &size);

    if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        /* Add custom initialization here. */
        if(parent)
        {
            gx_widget_link(parent, (GX_WIDGET *)wheel);
        }
    }
}
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12366">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12366">Description</span></span>

## <a name="gx_text_scroll_wheel_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12393">gx_text_scroll_wheel_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12393">gx_text_scroll_wheel_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12394">Zdarzenie koła przewijania tekstu przetwarzania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12394">Process text scroll wheel event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12395">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12395">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_scroll_wheel_event_process(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12396">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12396">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12397">Ta usługa przetwarza zdarzenie dla określonego kółka przewijania tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12397">This service processes an event for the specified text scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12398">Ta usługa powinna być wywoływana jako domyślna procedura obsługi zdarzeń przez wszystkie funkcje przetwarzania zdarzeń niestandardowego przewijania tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12398">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom text scroll wheel event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12399">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12399">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12400">**wheel (koło)** Blok sterujący kółka przewijania wskaźnika do tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12400">**wheel** Pointer to text scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12401">**event_ptr** Wskaźnik do zdarzenia do przetwarzania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12401">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12402">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12402">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12403">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Proces zdarzenia z pomyślnym przewijaniem tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12403">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text scroll wheel event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12404">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12404">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12405">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12405">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12406">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widżet jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12406">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12407">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12407">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12408">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12408">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12409">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12409">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic text scroll wheel event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_text_scroll_wheel_event_process(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default text scroll wheel event processing */
        status = gx_text_scroll_wheel_event_process(wheel, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

```C
    GX_RESOURCe_ID disabled_text_color);
```

## <a name="gx_tree_view_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12491">gx_tree_view_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12491">gx_tree_view_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12492">Tworzenie widoku drzewa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12492">Create a tree view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12493">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12493">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_tree_view_create(
    GX_TREE_VIEW *tree,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT tree_view_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12494">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12494">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12495">Ta usługa tworzy określony widok drzewa i kojarzy widok drzewa z dostarczonym widżetem nadrzędnym.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12495">This service creates a tree view as specified and associates the tree view with the supplied parent widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12496">Akceptuje wszystkie typy widżetów jako podrzędny element menu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12496">It accepts all types of widget as child menu item.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12497">Zaleca się używanie widżetu typu GX_MENU jako elementu menu podrzędnego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12497">It’s recommended to use GX_MENU type widget as its child menu item.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12498">GX_TREE_VIEW jest pochodną usługi GX_WINDOW obsługuje wszystkie usługi gx_window API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12498">GX_TREE_VIEW is derived from GX_WINDOW and supports all gx_window API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12499">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12499">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12500">**tree**: wskaźnik do bloku sterowania widoku drzewa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12500">**tree**: Pointer to tree view control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12501">**name**: Nazwa widoku drzewa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12501">**name**: Name of the tree view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12502">**parent**: Wskaźnik do widżetu nadrzędnego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12502">**parent**: Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12503">**style**: styl widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12503">**style**: Style of the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12504">**Dodatek D** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane style ogólne dla wszystkich widżetów, a także style specyficzne dla widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12504">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12505">**menu_id:** Zdefiniowany przez aplikację identyfikator widoku drzewa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12505">**menu_id**: Application-defined ID of the tree view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12506">**size:** rozmiar widoku drzewa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12506">**size**: Size of the tree view</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12507">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12507">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12508">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Pomyślne utworzenie widoku drzewa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12508">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful tree view creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12509">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12509">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12510">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12510">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12511">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED:**(0x13) Widżet został już utworzony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12511">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12512">**GX_INVALID_SIZE:**(0x19) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar bloku kontrolki widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12512">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12513">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widżet jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12513">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12514">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12514">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12515">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12515">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12516">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12516">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_tree_view_create(&my_tree_view,
    “my_tree_view”, parent,
    GX_STYLE_ENABLED, MY_TREE_VIEW_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the tree view was successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_tree_view_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12531">gx_tree_view_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12531">gx_tree_view_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12532">Rysowanie widoku drzewa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12532">Draw tree view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12533">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12533">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_tree_view_draw(GX_TREE_VIEW *tree);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12534">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12534">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12535">Ta usługa rysuje określony widok drzewa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12535">This service draws the specified tree view.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12536">Ta funkcja jest zwykle wywoływana wewnętrznie przez mechanizm odświeżania kanwy GUIX, ale jest udostępniane aplikacji, aby pomóc w implementacji niestandardowych funkcji rysowania dla niestandardowych widżetów widoku drzewa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12536">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom tree view widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12537">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12537">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12538">**tree (drzewo)** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki widoku drzewa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12538">**tree** Pointer to tree view control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12539">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12539">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12540">**Brak**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12540">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12541">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12541">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12542">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12542">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12543">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12543">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom tree view draw function. */
UINT my_tree_view_draw(GX_TREE_VIEW *tree_view)
{
    /* Perform default drawing */
    gx_tree_view_draw(tree_view);

    /* Add custom drawing here */
}
```

## <a name="gx_tree_view_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12558">gx_tree_view_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12558">gx_tree_view_event_process</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12559">Zdarzenie widoku drzewa procesu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12559">Process tree view event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12560">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12560">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_tree_view_event_process(
    GX_TREE_VIEW *tree, 
    GX_EVENT event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12561">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12561">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12562">Ta usługa przetwarza zdarzenie dla określonego widoku drzewa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12562">This service processes an event for the specified tree view.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12563">Ta usługa powinna być wywoływana jako domyślna procedura obsługi zdarzeń przez wszystkie niestandardowe funkcje przetwarzania zdarzeń widoku drzewa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12563">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom tree view event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12564">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12564">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12565">**tree**: wskaźnik do bloku sterowania widoku drzewa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12565">**tree**: Pointer to tree view control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12566">**event_ptr:** Wskaźnik do zdarzenia do przetwarzania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12566">**event_ptr**: Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12567">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12567">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12568">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Zdarzenie widoku drzewa pomyślnego procesu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12568">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful process tree view event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12569">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12569">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12570">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12570">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12571">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widżet jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12571">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12572">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12572">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12573">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12573">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12574">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12574">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic tree view event processing as part of custom event
    processing function. */

UINT custom_tree_view_event_process(GX_TREE_VIEW *tree_view,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
        case xyz:
            /* Insert custom event handling here */
            break;
        default:
            /* Pass all other events to the default tree view
                event processing */
            status = gx_tree_view_event_process(tree_view, event);
            break;
    }
}
return status;
```

## <a name="gx_utility_canvas_to_bmp"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12767">gx_utility_canvas_to_bmp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12767">gx_utility_canvas_to_bmp</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12768">Konwertowanie notatek kanwy na mapę bitową</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12768">Convert canvas memort to bitmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12769">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12769">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_canvas_to_bmp(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_RECTANGLE *rect,
    UINT (*write_data)(GX_UBYTE *byte_data, UINT data_count));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12770">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12770">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12771">Ta usługa konwertuje pamięć kanwy na plik mapy bitowej.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12771">This service converts canvas memory to bitmap file.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12772">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12772">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12773">**kanwa:** wskaźnik bloku kontrolki kanwy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12773">**canvas**: Canvas control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12774">**rect:** prostokąt do konwersji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12774">**rect**: Rectangle to convert</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12775">**write_data:** Wskaźnik funkcji wywołania zwrotnego do zapisu danych</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12775">**write_data**: Callback function pointer to write data to</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12776">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12776">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12777">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Pomyślnie przekonwertowana wartość całkowita na ciąg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12777">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully converted integer value to string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12778">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik buforu powrotu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12778">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid return buffer pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12779">**GX_INVALID_SIZE:**(0x19) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar buforu powrotu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12779">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid return buffer size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12780">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12780">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12781">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12781">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12782">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12782">Example</span></span>

```C
FILE *fp = GX_NULL;

/* define call back function of how to write the data read from
canvas memory. */

UINT write_data_callback(GX_UBYTE *byte_data, UINT data_count)
{
    if (fp)
    {
        fwrite(byte_data, 1, data_count, fp);
    }
    return GX_SUCCESS;
}

VOID scroll_wheel_screen_draw(GX_WINDOW *window)
{
    UINT status;

    GX_RECTANGLE size = {31,31,610,450};
    gx_window_draw(window);
    if (screenshot)
    {
        fp = fopen("../screenshot.bmp", "wb");
        /* Convert canvas memory to bitmap format.
           Status GX_SUCCESS means operation succeed. */
        status = gx_utility_canvas_to_bmp(root->gx_window_root_canvas,
            &size, write_data_callback);

        fclose(fp);
    }
}
```

## <a name="gx_utility_circle_point_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12798">gx_utility_circle_point_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12798">gx_utility_circle_point_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12799">Obliczanie punktu na okręgu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12799">Calculate point on a circle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12800">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12800">Prototype</span></span>

```C
INT gx_utility_circle_point_get(
    INT xCenter, 
    INT yCenter,
    UINT radius, 
    INT angle, 
    GX_POINT *point);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12801">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12801">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12802">Ta usługa oblicza punkt na okręgu na podstawie środka okręgu, promienia i kąta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12802">This service calculates point on a circle given the circle center, radius, and angle.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12803">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12803">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12804">**xCenter**: x współrzędna środka okręgu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12804">**xCenter**: x coordinate of circle center</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12805">**yCenter:** współrzędna y środka okręgu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12805">**yCenter**: y coordinate of circle center</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12806">**radius:** promień okręgu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12806">**radius**: Circle radius</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12807">**kąt**: kąt, pod którym ma być obliczany punkt obwodowy okręgu w stopniach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12807">**angle**: Angle at which to calculate circle perimeter point, in degrees</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12808">**punkt:** adres zmiennej GX_POINT, w której ma być zapisywana obliczona współrzędna x,y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12808">**point**: Address of GX_POINT variable at which to store calculated x,y coordinate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12809">**end_alpha:** Końcowa wartość alfa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12809">**end_alpha**: End alpha value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12810">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12810">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12811">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Gradient został utworzony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12811">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Gradient was created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12812">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Nieprawidłowy adres punktu powrotu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12812">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid return point address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12813">**GX_INVALID_VALUE:**(0x22) Nieprawidłowy parametr usługi Radius</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12813">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Invalid radius parameter</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12814">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12814">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12815">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12815">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12816">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12816">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_POINT point;
    UINT status;

        status = gx_utility_circle_point_get(100, 100,
20, 45,
&point);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the value of point is the x,y coordinate of a point on the circle perimeter at an angle of 45 degrees, where the circle is centered at (100, 100), has a radius of 20 pixels */

```

## <a name="gx_utility_gradient_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12834">gx_utility_gradient_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12834">gx_utility_gradient_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12835">Tworzenie mapy pikseli gradientu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12835">Create a gradient pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12836">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12836">Prototype</span></span>

```C
INT gx_utility_gradient_create(
    GX_GRADIENT *gradient,
    GX_VALUE width, 
    GX_VALUE height,
    UCHAR type, 
    GX_UBYTE start_alpha, 
    GX_UBYTE end_alpha);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12837">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12837">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12838">Ta usługa tworzy gradientową mapę pikseli w czasie wykonywania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12838">This service creates a gradient pixelmap at runtime.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12839">Obraz gradientu może służyć do wykonywania efektów zanikania i innych interesujących zmian wizualnych.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12839">A gradient image can be used to accomplish fade effects and other interesting visual changes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12840">Szerokość i wysokość żądanego gradientu nie może być mniejsza niż 2x2 piksele.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12840">The width and height of the requested gradient can be no less than 2x2 pixels.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12841">Graficzny interfejs użytkownika (GUIX) wewnętrznie utrzymuje listę utworzonych gradientów, a ta funkcja najpierw przeszukuje listę gradientów, aby znaleźć pasującą mapę pikseli gradientu przed utworzeniem nowej mapy pikseli.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12841">GUIX internally maintains a list of created gradients, and this function will first search the gradient list to find a matching gradient pixelmap before creating a new pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12842">Innymi słowy, ta sama mapa pikseli gradientu jest wymagana wielokrotnie, w rzeczywistości jest tworzona tylko jedna mapa pikseli, a każdy gradient, który wymaga tej mapy pikseli, udostępnia utworzoną mapę pikseli.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12842">In other words,  the same gradient pixelmap is needed multiple times, only one pixelmap is actually created, and each gradient that requires this pixelmap shares the created pixelmap.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12843">Ten interfejs API wymaga gx_system_memory_allocator, aby umożliwić alokację pamięci środowiska uruchomieniowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12843">This API requires the gx_system_memory_allocator function be defined to allow runtime memory allocation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12844">Flagi typu gradientu obejmują GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA i GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_MIRROR.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12844">The gradient type flags include GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA and GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_MIRROR.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12845">Obecnie GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA tylko gradienty typów typów (tj. należy ustawić tę flagę typu).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12845">Only  GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA type gradients are currently supported (i.e. this type flag must be set).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12846">Flaga GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_MORROR jest opcjonalna, a po jej skonfigurowaniu logika tworzenia gradientu tworzy gradient, który zmienia się z start_alpha na end_alpha i z powrotem na start_alpha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12846">The  GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_MORROR flag is optional, and when set  instructs the gradient creation logic to create a gradient that changes from start_alpha to end_alpha and back to start_alpha.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12847">W przeciwnym razie jest tworzony gradient liniowy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12847">Otherwise a linear gradient is created.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12848">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12848">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12849">**gradient:** Wskaźnik do struktury bloku sterowania gradientem</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12849">**gradient**: Pointer to gradient control block structure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12850">**width**: żądana szerokość mapy pikseli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12850">**width**: Requested pixelmap width</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12851">**height:** żądana wysokość mapy pikseli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12851">**height**: Requested pixelmap height</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12852">**type**: żądany typ gradientu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12852">**type**: Requested gradient type</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12853">**start_alpha:** początkowa wartość alfa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12853">**start_alpha**: Starting alpha value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12854">**end_alpha:** Końcowa wartość alfa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12854">**end_alpha**: End alpha value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12855">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12855">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12856">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Gradient został utworzony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12856">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Gradient was created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12857">**GX_INVALID_SIZE:** gradient (0x19) nie jest co najmniej 2x2 piksele</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12857">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Gradient is not at least 2x2 pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12858">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED:**(0x28) Gradient nie jest typem GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12858">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x28) Gradient is not type GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12859">**GX_FAILURE:**(0x10) Alokator pamięci nie jest zdefiniowany lub alokacja pamięci nie powiodła się</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12859">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x10) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12860">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12860">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12861">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Wskaźnik gradientu jest nieprawidłowy<</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12861">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Gradient pointer not valid<</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12862">**GX_INVALID_VALUE:**(0x22) Wartość szerokości i wysokości jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12862">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Width and height value not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12863">**GX_INVALID_TYPE:**(0x1B) Typ gradientu jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12863">**GX_INVALID_TYPE**: (0x1B) Gradient type not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12864">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12864">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12865">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12865">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12866">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12866">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_GRADIENT gradient;

UINT status;

status = gx_utiity_gradient_create(&gradient, 3, 40,
    GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA, 240, 0);

/* If status == GX_SUCCESS the gradient pixelmap has been created */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_gradient_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12884">gx_utility_gradient_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12884">gx_utility_gradient_delete</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12885">Usuwanie wcześniej utworzonego gradientu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12885">Delete a previously created gradient</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12886">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12886">Prototype</span></span>

```C
INT gx_utility_gradient_delete(GX_GRADIENT *gradient);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12887">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12887">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12888">Ta usługa usuwa utworzony wcześniej gradient.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12888">This service deletes a previously created gradient.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12889">Jeśli mapa pikseli skojarzona z tym gradientem nie jest w użyciu przez inne gradienty, dane mapy pikseli również zostaną usunięte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12889">If the pixelmap associated with this gradient is not in use by any other gradients, the pixelmap data will also be deleted.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12890">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12890">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12891">**gradient:** wskaźnik do bloku sterowania gradientem</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12891">**gradient**: Pointer to gradient control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12892">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12892">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12893">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Gradient został usunięty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12893">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Gradient was deleted</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12894">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12894">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12895">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Wskaźnik gradientu jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12895">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Gradient pointer is not valid</span></span>
