## <a name="gx_utility_ltoa"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12916">gx_utility_ltoa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12916">gx_utility_ltoa</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12917">Konwertowanie długiej liczby całkowitej na ASCII</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12917">Convert long integer to ASCII</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12918">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12918">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_itoa(
    LONG value, 
    GX_CHAR *return_buffer,
    UINT seturn_buffer_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12919">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12919">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12920">Ta usługa konwertuje długą wartość całkowitą na ciąg ASCII.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12920">This service converts a long integer value into an ASCII string.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12921">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12921">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12922">**value:** Liczba całkowita długa do przekonwertowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12922">**value**: Long integer value to convert</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12923">**return_buffer:** Bufor docelowy dla ciągu ASCII</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12923">**return_buffer**: Destination buffer for ASCII string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12924">**return_buffer_size:** rozmiar buforu docelowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12924">**return_buffer_size**: Size of destination buffer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12925">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12925">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12926">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Pomyślnie przekonwertowana wartość całkowita na ciąg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12926">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully converted integer value to string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12927">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik buforu powrotu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12927">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid return buffer pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12928">**GX_INVALID_SIZE:**(0x19) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar buforu powrotu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12928">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid return buffer size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12929">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12929">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12930">Wszystko</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12930">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12931">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12931">Example</span></span>

```C
INT my_value = 200;

GX_CHAR string_buffer[10];

UINT status;

/* Convert “my_value” into an ASCII string. */
status = gx_utility_ltoa(my_value, string_buffer, 10);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “string_buffer” contains the ASCII
representation of “my_value”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_math_acos"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12947">gx_utility_math_acos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12947">gx_utility_math_acos</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12948">Cosine arcus obliczeń</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12948">Compute arc cosine</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12949">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12949">Prototype</span></span>

```C
INT gx_utility_math_acos(GX_FIXED_VAL x);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12950">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12950">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12951">Ta usługa oblicza wartość kąta co sinusu arcus x.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12951">This service computes the angle value of the arc cosine x.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12952">Wartość wejściowa to typ danych punktu stałego, który GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE konwersję z INT na GX_FIXED_VAL typu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12952">The input value is a fixed point data type, call GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE to convert from INT to GX_FIXED_VAL type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12953">Jeśli na przykład chcesz obliczyć co sinus arcus co 0,5, wprowadź dane wejściowe jako GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12953">For example, if you want to calculate the arc cosine of 0.5, make the input as GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12954">W wersji 5.4.0 lub mniejszej GUIX typ wartości wejściowej tej funkcji to INT, a wartość jest ograniczona do zakresu [-256, 256].</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12954">In 5.4.0 or lesser version GUIX, the input value type of this function is INT, and the value is limited to the range [-256, 256].</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12955">Przed wywołaniem tej usługi aplikacja musi przeskalować wartość z zakresu [-1, 1] do zakresu [-256, 256].</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12955">The application must scale the value from range [-1, 1] to range [-256, 256] before invoke this service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12956">Jeśli projekt z wersją GUIX równą lub mniejszą niż 5.4.0 zawiera odwołanie do tego interfejsu API i chcesz uaktualnić projekt przy użyciu najnowszej biblioteki guix.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12956">If your project with GUIX version equal or lesser than 5.4.0 has reference to this API, and you want to upgrade your project with the latest guix library.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12957">Dostępne są dwie opcje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12957">You have two options.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12958">Napraw wartość wejściową tego wywołania interfejsu API, aby GX_FIXED_VAL typu danych.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12958">Fix the input value of this API call to use GX_FIXED_VAL data type value.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12959">Zdefiniuj GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12959">Define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12960">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12960">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12961">**x:** wartość, której cosine arcus jest obliczany</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12961">**x**: Value whose arc cosine is computed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12962">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12962">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-12963">**kąt**: wartość kąta co sinusu x</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12963">**angle**: Angle value of arc cosine x</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12964">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12964">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12965">Wszystko</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12965">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12966">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12966">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Compute the angle value of arc cosine of “0.5”. */

#if defined(GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY)
    x = 256 / 2;
#else
    x = GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2;
#endif

angle = gx_utility_math_acos(x);

/* “angle” contains the angle value of arc cosine “x”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_math_asin"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12984">gx_utility_math_asin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12984">gx_utility_math_asin</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12985">Sinus łuku obliczeniowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12985">Compute arc sine</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12986">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12986">Prototype</span></span>

```C
INT gx_utility_math_asin(GX_FIXED_VAL x);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-12987">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12987">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12988">Ta usługa oblicza wartość kąta sinus kąta x.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-12988">This service computes the angle value of the arc sine x.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-12989">Wartość wejściowa jest typem danych punktu stałego. ## <a name="gx_utility_math_cos"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13021">gx_utility_math_cos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13021">gx_utility_math_cos</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="e9990-13025">Ta usługa oblicza cosine podanego kąta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13025">This service computes the cosine of the supplied angle.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-13026">Wartość wejściowa jest typem danych punktu stałego. Wywołaj GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE konwersję z INT na GX_FIXED_VAL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13026">The input value is a fixed point data type, call  GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE to convert from INT to GX_FIXED_VAL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13027">Jeśli na przykład chcesz obliczyć cous sinus 90 stopni, wprowadź dane wejściowe jako GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(90).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13027">For example, if you want to calculate the cosine of 90 degree, make input as GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(90).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-13028">Wartość zwracana jest typem danych punktu stałego. Wywołaj GX_FIXED_VAL_TO_INT konwersję z GX_FIXED_VAL na INT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13028">The return value is a fixed point data type, call  GX_FIXED_VAL_TO_INT to convert from GX_FIXED_VAL to INT.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-13029">W wersji 5.4.0 lub mniejszej guix wartość wejściowa i typ wartości zwracanej tej usługi to INT, wartość wejściowa i wartość zwracana są powiększone o 256.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13029">In 5.4.0 or lesser version GUIX version, the input value and return value type of this service is INT, the input value and return value are enlarged by 256.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13030">W związku z tym aplikacja musi skalować wartość kąta o 256 przed wywołaniem tej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13030">And therefore, the application must scale the angle value by 256 before invoke this service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13031">Jeśli projekt z wersją GUIX równą lub mniejszą niż 5.4.0 i chcesz uaktualnić projekt przy użyciu najnowszej biblioteki guix, masz dwie opcje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13031">If your project with GUIX version equal or lesser than 5.4.0, and you want to upgrade your project with the latest guix library, you have two options.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13032">Napraw wartość wejściową i obsługę na wartość zwracaną tego wywołania interfejsu API, aby użyć GX_FIXED_VAL typu daty.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13032">Fix the input value and the handling to the return value of this API call to use GX_FIXED_VAL date type value.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13034">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13034">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13035">**kąt**: kąt obliczania cosine of</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13035">**angle**: Angle to compute cosine of</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13036">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13036">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13037">**cosine:** cosine podanego kąta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13037">**cosine**: Cosine of supplied angle</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13038">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13038">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13040">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13040">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Compute cosine of 90 degree. */

INT angle = 90;

#if defined (GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY)
    INT scaled_angle = angle << 8;
#else
    GX_FIXED_VAL scaled_angle = GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(angle);
#endif

my_angle_cosine = gx_utility_math_cos(scaled_angle);

/* “my_angle_cosine” contains the cosine of “my_angle”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13122">gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13122">gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-13123">Zmiana kolejności wyświetlania tekstu BiDi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13123">Reorder BiDi text into its display order</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13124">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13124">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder(GX_BIDI_TEXT_INFO *input_info, 
                                       GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO **resolved_info_head)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13125">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13125">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-13126">Ta usługa zmienia kolejność tekstu BiDi na kolejność wyświetlania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13126">This service reorders BiDi text into its display order.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13127">Jeśli podano czcionkę narysowania tekstu i szerokość wyświetlania, najpierw zostanie zastosowane podział wiersza, a proces zmiany kolejności zostanie zastosowany na podstawie każdego wiersza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13127">If text draw font and display width are provided, line breaking will be applied first, reordering process will be applied based on each line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13128">Jeśli podany tekst zawiera więcej niż jeden akapit, usługa rozbije tekst na akapity, a wynik podziału wiersza i zmiany kolejności każdego akapitu zostanie połączony jako lista.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13128">If the provided text contains more than one paragraph, the service will break the text into paragraphs, the line breaking and reordering result of each paragraph will be linked as a list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13129">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13129">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13130">**input_info:** wskaźnik do informacji dotyczących podziału wiersza i zmiany kolejności tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13130">**input_info**: Pointer to the information for line breaking and text reordering</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13131">**resolved_info_head:** wskaźnik do połączonej listy zawierającej wyniki podziału wiersza i zmiany kolejności poszczególnych akapitów dostarczonego tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13131">**resolved_info_head**: Pointer to the linked list that contains line breaking and reordering results of each paragraph of the the provided text</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13132">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13132">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13133">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Zmiana kolejności tekstu oferty pomyślnej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13133">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful bidi text reorder</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13134">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Nieprawidłowe wskaźniki wejściowe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13134">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13135">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR:**(0x30) Alokator pamięci nie jest zdefiniowany lub alokacja pamięci nie powiodła się</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13135">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13136">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13136">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-13137">Wszystko</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13137">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13138">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13138">Example</span></span>
#### <a name="draw-single-line-bidi-text-to-canvas"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13139">Rysowanie tekstu oferty z jednym wierszem na kanwie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13139">Draw single line bidi text to canvas</span></span>
```C
VOID custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
    GX_BIDI_TEXT_INFO input_info;
    GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO *resolved_info;
    GX_CHAR bidi_text[] = "Single Line String";
    
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_ptr = bidi_text;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_length = sizeof(bidi_text) - 1;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_font = GX_NULL;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_display_width = -1;
    
    /* Reordering BiDi text. */
    status = gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder(&input_info, &resolved_info);
    
    if(status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        /* Draw reordered bidi text to canvas. */
        gx_canvas_text_draw_ext(widget->gx_widget_size.gx_rectangle_left,
                                widget->gx_widget_size.gx_rectangle_top,
                                resolved_info.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_text);

        /* Delete resolved information list. */
        gx_utility_bidi_resolved_text_info_delete(&resolved_info);
    }
}
```
#### <a name="draw-multi-line-bidi-text-to-canvas"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13140">Rysowanie tekstu oferty wielokrotnej na kanwie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13140">Draw multi line bidi text to canvas</span></span>
```C
VOID custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
    GX_BIDI_TEXT_INFO input_info;
    GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO *resolved_info;
    GX_CHAR bidi_text[] = "Multi Line BiDi Text Display Example";
    GX_FONT *font;
    GX_RECTANGLE client;
    GX_VALUE display_width;
    INT index;
    GX_VALUE xpos;
    GX_VALUE ypos;
    
    /* Pickup the font. */
    gx_context_font_get(font_id, &font);
    gx_widget_client_get(widget, 2, &client);
    
    display_width = (GX_VALUE)(client.gx_rectangle_right - client.gx_rectangle_left + 1);
    
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_ptr = bidi_text;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_length = sizeof(bidi_text) - 1;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_font = font;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_display_width = display_width;
    
    /* Reordering BiDi text. */
    status = gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder(&input_info, &resolved_info);
    
    if(status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        xpos = client.gx_rectangle_left;
        ypos = client.gx_rectangle_top;
        
        /* Draw reordered bidi text to canvas. */
        for(index = 0; index < resolved_info.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_total_lines; index++)
        {
            gx_canvas_text_draw_ext(xpos, ypos, &resolved_info.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_text[index]);
        
            ypos += font->gx_font_line_height;
        }
        
        /* Delete resolved information list. */
        gx_utility_bidi_resolved_text_info_delete(&resolved_info);
    }
}
```

#### <a name="draw-multi-paragraph-bidi-text-to-canvas"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13141">Rysowanie tekstu oferty z wieloma akapitami na kanwie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13141">Draw multi paragraph bidi text to canvas</span></span>
```C
VOID custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
    GX_BIDI_TEXT_INFO input_info;
    GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO *resolved_info;
    GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO *next;
    GX_CHAR bidi_text[] = "Multi Paragraph\r BiDi Text Display Example";
    GX_FONT *font;
    GX_RECTANGLE client;
    GX_VALUE display_width;
    INT index;
    GX_VALUE xpos;
    GX_VALUE ypos;
    
    /* Pickup the font. */
    gx_context_font_get(font_id, &font);
    gx_widget_client_get(widget, 2, &client);
    
    display_width = (GX_VALUE)(client.gx_rectangle_right - client.gx_rectangle_left + 1);
    
    
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_ptr = bidi_text;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_length = sizeof(bidi_text) - 1;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_font = font;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_display_width = display_width;
    
    /* Reordering BiDi text. */
    status = gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder(&input_info, &resolved_info);
    
    if(status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        xpos = client.gx_rectangle_left;
        ypos = client.gx_rectangle_top;
        
        next = resolved_info;
        
        /* Draw reordered bidi text to canvas. */
        while(next)
        {
            for(index = 0; index < next.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_total_lines; index++)
            {
                gx_canvas_text_draw_ext(xpos, ypos, &next.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_text[index]);
            
                ypos += font->gx_font_line_height;
            }
            
            next = next->gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_next;
        }
        
        /* Delete resolved information list. */
        gx_utility_bidi_resolved_text_info_delete(&resolved_info);
    }
}
```

```C
VOID custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
    GX_BIDI_TEXT_INFO input_info;
    GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO *resolved_info;
    GX_CHAR bidi_text[] = "Single Line String";
    
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_ptr = bidi_text;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_length = sizeof(bidi_text) - 1;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_font = GX_NULL;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_display_width = -1;
    
    /* Reordering BiDi text. */
    status = gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder(&input_info, &resolved_info);
    
    if(status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        /* Draw reordered bidi text to canvas. */
        gx_canvas_text_draw_ext(widget->gx_widget_size.gx_rectangle_left,
                                widget->gx_widget_size.gx_rectangle_top,
                                resolved_info.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_text);

        /* Delete resolved information list. */
        gx_utility_bidi_resolved_text_info_delete(&resolved_info);
    }
}
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13163">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13163">Description</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13168">**destination**: docelowy bufor wynikowej mapy pikseli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13168">**destination**: Destination buffer for the resulting pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13169">**width:** szerokość wynikowej mapy pikseli w pikselach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13169">**width**: Width of the resulting pixelmap, in pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13170">**height**: Hieght wynikowej mapy pikseli w pikselach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13170">**height**: Hieght of the resulting pixelmap, in pixels</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13172">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Pomyślna zmiana rozmiaru mapy pikseli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13172">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful pixelmap resize</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13173">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Nieprawidłowy źródłowy lub docelowy wskaźnik mapy pikseli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13173">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid source or destination pixelmap pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13174">**GX_INVALID_VALUE:**(0x22) Wartość szerokości lub wysokości jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13174">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Width or height value not valid</span></span>

## <a name="gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13196">gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13196">gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-13197">Obracanie mapy pikseli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13197">Rotate pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13198">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13198">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(
    GX_PIXELMAP *src, INT angle,
    GX_PIXELMAP *destination,
    UINT *rot_cx, 
    UINT *rot_cy);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13199">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13199">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-13200">Ta usługa obraca mapę pikseli i zwraca wskaźnik do nowej mapy pikseli, która jest wynikiem obrotu mapy pikseli.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13200">This service rotates a pixelmap and returns a pointer to a new pixelmap, which is the result of the pixelmap rotation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13201">Aby obrócić mapę pikseli bezpośrednio do kanwy, użyj gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13201">To rotate a pixelmap directly to the canvas, use gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-13202">Ta usługa wymaga wcześniejszego użycia gx_system_memory_allocator_set, aby umożliwić alokację pamięci do przechowywania obracanych danych na mapie pikseli.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13202">This service requires the prior use of gx_system_memory_allocator_set, to allow allocation of memory to hold the rotated pixelmap data.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13203">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13203">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13204">**src:** mapa pikseli do rotacji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13204">**src**: The pixelmap to rotate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13205">**angle**: kąt obrotu w stopniach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13205">**angle**: Angle of rotation in degrees</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13206">**destination**: docelowy bufor wynikowej mapy pikseli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13206">**destination**: Destination buffer for the resulting pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13207">**rot_cx:** pobrano współrzędną x środka obrotu względem docelowej mapy pikseli.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13207">**rot_cx**: Retrieved x coordinate of rotation center with respect to destination pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13208">Należy zainicjować za pomocą współrzędnych x centrum obrotu względem źródłowej mapy pikseli.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13208">Should be initiated with the x coordinate of rotation center with respect to source pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13209">Jeśli rot_cx jest GX_NULL, wartość nie zostanie pobrana.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13209">If rot_cx is GX_NULL, value will not be retrieved.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13210">**rot_cy:** pobrano współrzędną y środka obrotu w odniesieniu do docelowej mapy pikseli.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13210">**rot_cy**: Retrieved y coordinate of rotation center with respect to destination pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13211">Powinny być inicjowane za pomocą współrzędnej y środka obrotu w odniesieniu do źródłowej mapy pikseli.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13211">Should be initiated with the y coordinate of rotation center with respect to source pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13212">Jeśli rot_cy jest GX_NULL, wartość nie zostanie pobrana.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13212">If rot_cy is GX_NULL, value will not be retrieved.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13213">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13213">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13214">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Pomyślna rotacja mapy pikseli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13214">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful pixelmap rotate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13215">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Nieprawidłowy źródłowy lub docelowy wskaźnik mapy pikseli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13215">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid source or destination pixelmap pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13216">**GX_INVALID_VALUE:**(0x22) Wartość kąta wynosi 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13216">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Angle value is 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13217">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT:**(0x28) Skompresowany format źródłowej mapy pikseli, który nie jest obsługiwany</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13217">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT**: (0x28) Source pixelmap is compressed format, which is not supported</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13218">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR:**(0x30) Alokator pamięci nie jest zdefiniowany lub alokacja pamięci nie powiodła się</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13218">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13221">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13221">Example</span></span>

```C
rot_cx = source_rotate_center_x;
rot_cy = source_rotate_center_y;

/* rotate “src_pixelmap” by 30 degree in clockwise direction. */
status = gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(src_pixelmap, 30,
    &des_pixelmap, &rot_cx, &rot_cy);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS. “des_pixelmap” successfully load the
resulting pixelmap of rotation. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13246">**destination**: docelowy bufor wynikowej mapy pikseli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13246">**destination**: Destination buffer for the resulting pixelmap</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-13250">**rot_cy:** pobrano współrzędną y środka obrotu w odniesieniu do docelowej mapy pikseli.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13250">**rot_cy**: Retrieved y coordinate of rotation center with respect to destination pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13251">Powinny być inicjowane za pomocą współrzędnej y środka obrotu w odniesieniu do źródłowej mapy pikseli.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13251">Should be initiated with the y coordinate of rotation center with respect to source pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13252">Jeśli rot_cy jest GX_NULL, wartość nie zostanie pobrana.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13252">If rot_cy is GX_NULL, value will not be retrieved.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13253">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13253">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13254">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Pomyślna rotacja mapy pikseli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13254">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful pixelmap rotate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13255">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Nieprawidłowy źródłowy lub docelowy wskaźnik mapy pikseli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13255">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid source or destination pixelmap pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13256">**GX_INVALID_VALUE:**(0x22) Wartość kąta to 0 lub nie jest prostym kątem, np. 90, 180, 270</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13256">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Angle value is 0 or not a simple angle like 90, 180, 270</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13257">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT:**(0x28) Skompresowany format źródłowej mapy pikseli, który nie jest obsługiwany</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13257">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT**: (0x28) Source pixelmap is compressed format, which is not supported</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13258">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR:**(0x30) Alokator pamięci nie jest zdefiniowany lub alokacja pamięci nie powiodła się</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13258">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**:  (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13259">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13259">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-13260">Wszystko</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13260">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13261">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13261">Example</span></span>

```C
rot_cx = source_rotate_center_x;
rot_cy = source_rotate_center_y;

/* rotate “src_pixelmap” by 90 degree in clockwise direction. */
status = gx_utility_pixelmap_simple_rotate(src_pixelmap, 90,
    &des_pixelmap,
    &rot_cx, &rot_cy);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS. “des_pixelmap” successfully load the
resulting pixelmap of rotation. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_center"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13277">gx_utility_rectangle_center</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13277">gx_utility_rectangle_center</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-13278">Wyśrodkowania prostokąta w innym prostokącie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13278">Center rectangle within another rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13279">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13279">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_center(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *within_rectangle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13280">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13280">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-13281">Ta usługa wyśrodkuje prostokąt w ramach innego prostokąta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13281">This service centers the rectangle within another rectangle.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13282">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13282">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13283">**prostokąt:** prostokąt do środka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13283">**rectangle**: Rectangle to center</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13284">**within_rectangle:** prostokąt do wyśrodkowania w obrębie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13284">**within_rectangle**: Rectangle to center within</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13285">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13285">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13286">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Pomyślnie wyśrodkował prostokąt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13286">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully centered the rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13287">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik prostokąta wejściowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13287">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input rectangle pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13288">**GX_INVALID_SIZE:**(0x19) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar prostokąta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13288">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid rectangle size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13289">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13289">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-13290">Wszystko</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13290">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13291">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13291">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

/* Center “my_inner_rectangle” inside of “my_outer_rectangle”.*/
status = gx_utility_rectangle_center(&my_inner_rectangle,
    &my_outer_rectangle);

/* Is status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_inner_rectangle” is centered
within “my_other_rectangle”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_center_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13307">gx_utility_rectangle_center_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13307">gx_utility_rectangle_center_find</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-13308">Znajdowanie środka prostokąta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13308">Find center of rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13309">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13309">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_center_find(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_POINT *return_center);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13310">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13310">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-13311">Ta usługa znajduje środek prostokąta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13311">This service finds the center of the rectangle.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13312">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13312">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13313">**prostokąt:** Prostokąt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13313">**rectangle**: Rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13314">**return_center:** Wskaźnik do punktu środkowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13314">**return_center**: Pointer to center point</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13315">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13315">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13316">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Pomyślnie znaleziono środek prostokąta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13316">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully found the center of the rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13317">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik wejściowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13317">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13318">**GX_INVALID_SIZE:**(0x19) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar prostokąta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13318">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid rectangle size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13319">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13319">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-13320">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13320">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13321">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13321">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

GX_RECTANGLE my_rectangle;

GX_POINT my_center_point;

gx_utility_define(&my_rectangle, 0, 0, 100, 100);

/* Find center of “my_rectangle””. */

status = gx_utility_rectangle_center_find(&my_rectangle,
    &my_center_point);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_center_point” is the center point
of “my_rectangle” (50, 50). */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_combine"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13337">gx_utility_rectangle_combine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13337">gx_utility_rectangle_combine</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-13338">Połącz dwa prostokąty w pierwszej kolejności</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13338">Combine two rectangles into first</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13339">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13339">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_combine(
    GX_RECTANGLE *first_rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *second_rectangle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13340">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13340">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-13341">Ta usługa łączy pierwszy i drugi prostokąt w pierwszy prostokąt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13341">This service combines the first and second rectangle into the first rectangle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13342">Pierwszy prostokąt jest rozwinięty, aby uwzględnić drugi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13342">The first rectangle is expanded to include the second.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13343">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13343">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13344">**first_rectangle:** pierwszy prostokąt i połączony prostokąt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13344">**first_rectangle**: First rectangle and combined rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13345">**second_rectangle:** Drugi prostokąt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13345">**second_rectangle**: Second rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13346">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13346">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13347">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Pomyślnie połączone dwa prostokąty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13347">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully combined two rectangles</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13348">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik wejściowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13348">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13349">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13349">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-13350">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13350">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13351">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13351">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

GX_RECTANGLE rect_a;

GX_RECTANGLE rect_b;

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&rect_a, 0, 0, 100, 100);
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&rect_b, 50, 50, 200, 200);

/* Combine “my_rectangle_a” to “my_rectangle_b”. */
status = gx_utility_rectangle_combine(&rect_a, &rect_b);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “rect_a” is (0, 0, 200, 200) the merger
of the original “rect_a” and “rect_b”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_compare"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13367">gx_utility_rectangle_compare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13367">gx_utility_rectangle_compare</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-13368">Porównanie dwóch prostokątów</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13368">Compare two rectangles</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13369">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13369">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL gx_utility_rectangle_compare( 
    GX_RECTANGLE *first_rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *second_rectangle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13370">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13370">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-13371">Ta usługa porównuje pierwszy i drugi prostokąt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13371">This service compares the first and second rectangle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13372">Jeśli są równe, zwracana jest GX_TRUE wartość .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13372">If they are equal, a value of GX_TRUE is returned.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13373">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13373">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13374">**first_rectangle:** Pierwszy prostokąt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13374">**first_rectangle**: First rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13375">**second_rectangle:** Drugi prostokąt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13375">**second_rectangle**: Second rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13376">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13376">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13377">**result**: GX_TRUE jeśli prostokąty są równe, GX_FALSE zwracane są wartości.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13377">**result**: GX_TRUE if rectangles are equal, otherwise GX_FALSE is returned.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13378">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13378">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-13379">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13379">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13380">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13380">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Compare “my_rectangle_a” to “my_rectangle_b”. */
result = gx_utility_rectangle_compare(&my_rectangle_a,
    &my_rectangle_b);

/* If result is GX_TRUE, the two rectangles are equal. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13396">gx_utility_rectangle_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13396">gx_utility_rectangle_define</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-13397">Definiowanie prostokąta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13397">Define a rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13398">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13398">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_define(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_VALUE left,
    GX_VALUE top, 
    GX_VALUE right, 
    GX_VALUE bottom);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13399">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13399">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-13400">Ta usługa definiuje prostokąt w określony sposób.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13400">This service defines a rectangle as specified.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13401">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13401">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13402">**prostokąt:** blok kontrolki prostokąta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13402">**rectangle**: Rectangle control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13403">**left**: lewa większość współrzędnych</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13403">**left**: Left most coordinate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13404">**top**: najbardziej współrzędna najwyższego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13404">**top**: Top most coordinate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13405">**right**: najbardziej współrzędna w prawo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13405">**right**: Right most coordinate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13406">**bottom**: najbardziej dolna współrzędna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13406">**bottom**: Bottom most coordinate</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13407">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13407">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13408">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Pomyślnie zdefiniowano prostokąt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13408">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully defined a rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13409">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik prostokąta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13409">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid rectangle pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13410">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13410">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-13411">Wszystko</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13411">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13412">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13412">Example</span></span>

```C

GX_RECTANGLE my_rect;

/* Define “my_rect”. */

status = gx_utility_rectangle_define(&my_rect, 10, 5, 200, 100);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_rect” is defined. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13428">gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13428">gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-13429">Wykrywanie nakładania się prostokątów</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13429">Detect overlap of rectangles</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13430">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13430">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect(
    GX_RECTANGLE *first_rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *second_rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *return_overlap_area);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13431">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13431">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-13432">Ta usługa wykrywa wszelkie nakładające się na podane prostokąty.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13432">This service detects any overlap of the supplied rectangles.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13433">Jeśli zostanie znalezione nakładanie się, usługa GX_TRUE i nakładający się prostokąt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13433">If overlap is found, the service returns GX_TRUE and the overlapping rectangle.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13434">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13434">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13435">**first_rectangle:** Pierwszy prostokąt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13435">**first_rectangle**: First rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13436">**second_rectangle:** Drugi prostokąt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13436">**second_rectangle**: Second rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13437">**return_overlap_area:** Nakładający się obszar prostokąta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13437">**return_overlap_area**: Overlapping rectangle area</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13438">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13438">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13439">**result**: GX_TRUE jeśli prostokąty nakładają się na siebie, w przeciwnym razie GX_FALSE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13439">**result**: GX_TRUE if rectangles overlap, otherwise GX_FALSE.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13440">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13440">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-13441">Wszystko</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13441">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13442">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13442">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Detect overlap of “my_rectangle_a” and “my_rectangle_b”. */
result = gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect(&my_rectangle_a,
    &my_rectangle_b,
    &my_overlap_area);

/* If result is GX_TRUE, “my_overlap_area” specifies the area the
rectangles overlap. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13458">gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13458">gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-13459">Wykrywanie, czy punkt znajduje się w prostokącie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13459">Detect if point resides in rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13460">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13460">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_POINT point);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13461">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13461">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-13462">Ta usługa wykrywa, czy określony punkt znajduje się w prostokącie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13462">This service detects if the specified point resides in the rectangle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13463">Jeśli punkt znajduje się w prostokącie, usługa zwraca GX_TRUE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13463">If the point does reside in the rectangle, the service returns  GX_TRUE.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13464">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13464">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13465">**prostokąt:** Prostokąt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13465">**rectangle**: Rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13466">**punkt**: punkt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13466">**point**: Point</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13467">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13467">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13468">**result**: GX_TRUE, jeśli punkt znajduje się w prostokącie, w przeciwnym razie GX_FALSE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13468">**result**: GX_TRUE if point resides in rectangle, otherwise GX_FALSE</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13469">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13469">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-13470">Wszystko</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13470">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13471">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13471">Example</span></span>

```c
GX_RECTANGLE my_rectangle;

GX_POINT my_point;

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&my_rectangle, 0, 0, 100, 100);

my_point.gx_point_x = 20; my_point.gx_point_y = 20;

/* Detect if point “my_point” is within “my_rectangle””. */
result = gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect(&my_rectangle,
    &my_point);

/* If result is GX_TRUE, “my_point” resides in the rectangle. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_resize"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13487">gx_utility_rectangle_resize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13487">gx_utility_rectangle_resize</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-13488">Powiększanie prostokąta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13488">Grow rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13489">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13489">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_resize(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_VALUE adjust);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13490">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13490">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-13491">Ta usługa zwiększa rozmiar prostokąta zgodnie z określonymi wartościami.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13491">This service increases the size of the rectangle as specified.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13492">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13492">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13493">**prostokąt:** wskaźnik do prostokąta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13493">**rectangle**: Pointer to rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13494">**adjust:** ilość do dostosowania prostokąta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13494">**adjust**: Amount to adjust the rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13495">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13495">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13496">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Pomyślnie zmieniliśmy rozmiar prostokąta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13496">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully resized the rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13497">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik prostokąta wejściowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13497">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input rectangle pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13498">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13498">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-13499">Wszystko</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13499">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13500">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13500">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

/* Adjust “my_rectangle” by increasing 20 pixels on four sides */
status = gx_utility_rectangle_resize(&my_rectangle, 20);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_rectangle” is 20 pixels larger. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_shift"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13516">gx_utility_rectangle_shift</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13516">gx_utility_rectangle_shift</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-13517">Przesunięcie prostokąta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13517">Shift rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13518">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13518">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_shift(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_VALUE x_shift,
    GX_VALUE y_shift);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13519">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13519">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-13520">Ta usługa przesuwa prostokąt o określone wartości.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13520">This service shifts the rectangle by the specified values.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13521">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13521">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13522">**prostokąt:** prostokąt do przesunięcia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13522">**rectangle**: Rectangle to shift</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13523">**x_shif:** liczba pikseli do przesunięcia na osi X</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13523">**x_shif**: Number of pixels to shift on the x-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13524">**y_shift:** liczba pikseli do przesunięcia na osi y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13524">**y_shift**: Number of pixels to shift on the y-axis</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13525">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13525">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13526">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Pomyślnie przesunięte prostokąt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13526">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully shifted the rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13527">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Nieprawidłowy wejściowy wskaźnik prostokąta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13527">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input rectangle pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13528">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13528">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-13529">Wszystko</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13529">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13530">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13530">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

/* Shift “my_rectangle”. */

status = gx_utility_rectangle_shift(&my_rectangle, 10, 20);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_rectangle” has been shifted. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_string_to_alphamap"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13546">gx_utility_string_to_alphamap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13546">gx_utility_string_to_alphamap</span></span>


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13549">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13549">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-13550">Ta usługa została wycofana na rzecz gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13550">This service has been deprecated in favor of gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-13551">Ta usługa renderuje ciąg tekstowy do mapy alfamapy, która jest specjalną formą mapy pikseli 8bpp zawierającej tylko wartości alfa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13551">This service renders a text string to an alphamap, which is a special form of 8bpp pixelmap containing only alpha values.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13552">Ta usługa jest zwykle używana wraz z gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate i gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw do rysowania obracanego tekstu na kanwie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13552">This service is typically used along with gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate and gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw to draw rotated text to the canvas.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-13553">Ta usługa oblicza rozmiar pamięci wymagany dla wynikowej mapy alfamapy i wywołuje funkcję gx_system_memory_allocator() zdefiniowaną przez aplikację w celu dynamicznego przydzielania pamięci.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13553">This service calculates the memory size needed for the resulting alphamap, and invokes the gx_system_memory_allocator() function defined by the application to dynamically allocate memory.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13554">Aplikacja musi wywołać gx_system_memory_allocator_set() w pewnym momencie, zazwyczaj podczas uruchamiania programu, przed rozpoczęciem korzystania z tej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13554">The application must call gx_system_memory_allocator_set() at some point, usually during program startup, prior to using this service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-13555">Jeśli ciąg tekstowy ma być obracany i rysowany na kanwie tylko raz, usługa gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() jest dostarczana jako alternatywa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13555">If a text string is to be rotated and drawn to the canvas just once, the service gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() is provided as an alternate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13556">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() wywoła gx_utility_string_to_alphamap(), gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate() i gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(), aby renderować obracany tekst w jednej operacji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13556">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() will call gx_utility_string_to_alphamap(), gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(), and gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw() to render the rotated text in one operation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13557">Jeśli jednak ten sam tekst będzie rysowany wielokrotnie obrócony pod różnymi kątami, bardziej efektywne jest utworzenie mapy alfamapy raz przy użyciu interfejsu API usługi gx_utility_string_to_alphmap, a następnie wielokrotne obracanie wynikowej mapy alfamapy wielokrotnie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13557">However if the same text will be drawn multiple times rotated at various angles, it is more efficient to create the alphamap once using the gx_utility_string_to_alphmap API, then rotate the resulting alphamap multiple times as needed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13558">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13558">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13559">**text:** ciąg tekstowy do renderowania do mapy alfamapy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13559">**text**: Text string to render to alphamap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13560">**font:** czcionka do renderowania tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13560">**font**: The font to be to render the text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13561">**return_map:** wskaźnik do GX_PIXELMAP, który ma zostać zwrócony do wywołującego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13561">**return_map**: Pointer to the GX_PIXELMAP to be returned to the caller.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13562">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13562">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13563">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Pomyślnie wyrenderowany ciąg tekstowy do mapy alfamapy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13563">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully rendered a text string to an alphamap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13564">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik wejściowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13564">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13565">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR:**(0x30) Alokacja pamięci/funkcja bezpłatna nie jest zdefiniowana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13565">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocation/free function is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13566">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH:**(0x34) Nieprawidłowa długość ciągu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13566">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13567">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13567">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-13568">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13568">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13569">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13569">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PIXELMAP alphamap;

GX_PIXELMAP rotated_text;

INT xpos;

INT ypos;

gx_widget_font_get(widget, GX_FONT_ID_SCREEN_LABEL, &font);

/* render string to alphamap once */

gx_utility_string_to_alphamap("Hello World", font, &alphamap);

/* rotate and render the alphmap at multiple angles */

gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 45, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(10, 10, &rotated_text);

gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 135, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(100, 100, &rotated_text);

gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 300, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(200, 200, &rotated_text);
```

```C
GX_STRING string;

GX_PIXELMAP alphamap;

INT ypos;

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(10, 10, &rotated_text);

    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(100, 100, &rotated_text);

gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 300, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(200, 200, &rotated_text);
```

## <a name="gx_vertical_list_children_position"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13610">gx_vertical_list_children_position</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13610">gx_vertical_list_children_position</span></span>

```C
    GX_VERTICAL_LIST *vertical_list)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13613">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13613">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-13614">Ta funkcja umieszcza dzieci na pionowej liście.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13614">This function positions the children for the vertical list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13615">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13615">Parameters</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13617">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13617">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13618">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślnie pozycjonowano dzieci dla pionowej listy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13618">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully positioned the children for the vertical list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13619">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13619">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13620">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13620">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13621">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widżet jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13621">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13622">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13622">Allowed From</span></span>

## <a name="gx_vertical_list_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13634">gx_vertical_list_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13634">gx_vertical_list_create</span></span>
### <a name="create-vertical-list"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13635">Tworzenie listy pionowej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13635">Create vertical list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13636">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13636">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_vertical_list_create(
    GX_VERTICAL_LIST *vertical_list,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    INT total_rows,
    VOID (*callback)(GX_VERTICAL_LIST *, GX_WIDGET *, INT),
    ULONG style, USHORT vertical_list_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13637">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13637">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-13638">Ta usługa tworzy listę pionową.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13638">This service creates a vertical list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-13639">GX_VERTICAL_LIST pochodzi od usługi GX_WINDOW obsługuje wszystkie usługi gx_window API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13639">GX_VERTICAL_LIST is derived from GX_WINDOW and supports all gx_window API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13640">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13640">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13641">**vertical_list** Blok sterowania widżetem listy pionowej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13641">**vertical_list** Vertical list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13642">**name (nazwa)** Nazwa pionowej listy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13642">**name** Name of vertical list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13643">**element nadrzędny** Wskaźnik do widżetu nadrzędnego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13643">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13644">**total_rows** Łączna liczba wierszy na pionowej liście</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13644">**total_rows** Total number of rows in vertical list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13645">**wywołanie zwrotne** Funkcja, która będzie wywoływana przez pionową listę po przewinięciu listy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13645">**callback** A function that will be called by the vertical list when the list is scrolled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13646">Wywołujący powinien początkowo utworzyć wystarczającą liczbę elementów GX_WIDGET podstawie elementów, aby wypełnić wiersze widocznej listy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13646">The caller should initially create enough GX_WIDGET based children to fill the visible list rows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13647">Po przewinięciu listy ta funkcja jest wywoływana w celu ponownego utworzenia elementów children listy odpowiadających podanej liście indeksu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13647">As the list is scrolled, this function is called to re-create the list children corresponding to the supplied list index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13648">**style (styl)** Styl widżetu paska przewijania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13648">**style** Style of scrollbar widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13649">**Dodatek D** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane style ogólne dla wszystkich widżetów, a także style specyficzne dla widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13649">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13650">**vertical_list_id** Zdefiniowany przez aplikację identyfikator pionowej listy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13650">**vertical_list_id** Application-defined ID of vertical list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13651">**rozmiar** Wymiary pionowej listy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13651">**size** Dimensions of vertical list</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13652">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13652">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13653">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślnie utworzono listę pionową</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13653">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created the vertical list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13654">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13654">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13655">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13655">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13656">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget już utworzony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13656">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13657">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar bloku kontrolki widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13657">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13658">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Liczba nieprawidłowych wierszy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13658">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Number of rows not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-13659">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widżet jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13659">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13660">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13660">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-13661">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13661">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-13662">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-13662">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create vertical list “my_list” with 20 rows. */
status = gx_vertical_list_create(&my_list, “my_list”, &my_parent,
                    20, callback, GX_STYLE_WRAP, MY_LIST_ID,
                    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the vertical list “my_list” has been created. */
```
