## <a name="gx_widget_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-14787">gx_widget_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14787">gx_widget_draw</span></span>
### <a name="draw-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-14788">Rysowanie widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14788">Draw widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-14789">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14789">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-14790">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14790">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-14791">Ta usługa rysuje widżet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14791">This service draws the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-14792">Ta funkcja jest zwykle wywoływana wewnętrznie przez mechanizm odświeżania kanwy GUIX, ale jest udostępniane aplikacji, aby pomóc w implementacji niestandardowych funkcji rysowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14792">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-14793">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14793">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-14794">**widżet** Wskaźnik do widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14794">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-14795">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14795">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-14796">**Brak**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14796">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-14797">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14797">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-14798">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14798">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-14799">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14799">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom widget draw function. */

VOID my_custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
      /* Call default widget draw. */
      gx_widget_draw(widget);

      /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_draw_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-14836">gx_widget_draw_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14836">gx_widget_draw_set</span></span>
### <a name="assign-the-widget-drawing-function"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-14837">Przypisywanie funkcji rysowania widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14837">Assign the widget drawing function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-14838">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14838">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_draw_set(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    VOID (*drawing_function) (GX_WIDGET *));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-14839">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14839">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-14840">Ta usługa zastępuje domyślną funkcję rysowania widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14840">This service overrides the default drawing function of the widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-14841">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14841">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-14842">**widżet** Wskaźnik do widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14842">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-14843">**drawing_function** Wskaźnik do funkcji rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14843">**drawing_function** Pointer to drawing function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-14844">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14844">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-14845">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślne przesłonięcie funkcji rysowania widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14845">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget drawing function override</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-14846">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14846">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-14847">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14847">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-14848">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14848">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-14849">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14849">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-14850">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14850">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-14851">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14851">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom drawing function. */
VOID my_drawing_function(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
      /* Add your own drawing here. */
}

/* Set the drawing function of widget “my_widget” to “my_drawing_function”. */
status = gx_widget_draw_set(&my_widget, my_drawing_function);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” has the drawning function “my_drawing_function”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_event_generate"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-14888">gx_widget_event_generate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14888">gx_widget_event_generate</span></span>
### <a name="generate-widget-event"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-14889">Generowanie zdarzenia widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14889">Generate widget event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-14890">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14890">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_event_generate(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    USHORT event_type, LONG value);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-14891">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14891">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-14892">Ta usługa generuje GX_SIGNAL typu zdarzenia, który jest określonym typem lub klasą GX_EVENT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14892">This service generates a GX_SIGNAL type of event, which is a particular type or class of GX_EVENT.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-14893">gx_widget_event_generate() koduje 16-bitowy identyfikator widżetu wraz z przekazanym elementem event_type do pojedynczej 32-bitowej wartości GX_EVENT.gx_event_type.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14893">gx_widget_event_generate() encodes the 16 bit widget ID, along with the passed in event_type, into a single 32 bit GX_EVENT.gx_event_type value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-14894">Parametr value jest kodowany do wygenerowanego gx_event.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14894">The value parameter is encoded into the generated gx_event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-14895">gx_event_payload.gx_event_longdata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14895">gx_event_payload.gx_event_longdata field.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-14896">Pole wygenerowanego event.gx_event_target jest zawsze ładowane z elementem nadrzędnym wywołującego widżetu, co oznacza, że wygenerowane zdarzenie jest zawsze wysyłane jako pierwsze do elementu nadrzędnego generowanego widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14896">The generated event.gx_event_target field is always loaded with the calling widget’s parent, meaning the generated event is always sent first to the parent of the generating widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-14897">Należy pamiętać, gx_widget_event_generate tylko do wysyłania GX_SIGNAL typów zdarzeń z zakresu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14897">Note that gx_widget_event_generate should only be used to send GX_SIGNAL range event types.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-14898">W przypadku wszystkich innych typów zdarzeń, w tym typów zdarzeń zdefiniowanych przez użytkownika, użyj interfejsu API gx_system_event_send(), który zapewnia pełną kontrolę nad każdym polem zdarzenia wypchniętą w kolejce zdarzeń GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14898">For all  other event types, including user defined event types, use the gx_system_event_send() API, which grants full control over every field of the event pushed in the GUIX event queue.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-14899">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14899">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-14900">**widżet** Wskaźnik do widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14900">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-14901">**event_type** Typ zdarzenia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14901">**event_type** Type of event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-14902">**Dodatek E** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane zdarzenia GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14902">**Appendix E** contains pre-defined GUIX events.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-14903">Aplikacja może dodać dodatkowe zdarzenia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14903">Additional events may be added by the application.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-14904">**wartość** Dodatkowe informacje o zdarzeniach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14904">**value** Additional event information</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-14905">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14905">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-14906">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślne generowanie zdarzeń widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14906">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget event generation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-14907">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14907">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-14908">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14908">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-14909">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14909">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-14910">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14910">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-14911">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14911">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-14912">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14912">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Generate a redraw event for widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_event_generate(&my_widget, GX_EVENT_REDRAW, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the redraw event for widget “my_widget” has been generated. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-14950">gx_widget_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14950">gx_widget_event_process</span></span>
### <a name="process-widget-event"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-14951">Zdarzenie widżetu procesu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14951">Process widget event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-14952">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14952">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_event_process(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-14953">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14953">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-14954">Jest to domyślna funkcja przetwarzania zdarzeń dla wszystkich widżetów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14954">This is the default event processing function for all widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-14955">Po napisaniu niestandardowej funkcji przetwarzania zdarzeń domyślną akcją dla dowolnego typu zdarzenia powinno być zawsze przekaż zdarzenie do typu widżetu, na którym jest oparty widżet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14955">When a custom event processing function is written, the default action for any event type should always be to pass the event to the widget type upon which a widget is based.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-14956">Widżety oparte na najbardziej podstawowym przebiegu typu GX_WIDGET używają gx_widget_event_process jako domyślnej funkcji przetwarzania zdarzeń.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14956">Widgets that are based on the most basic GX_WIDGET type pass use gx_widget_event_process as their default event processing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-14957">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14957">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-14958">**widżet** Wskaźnik do widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14958">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-14959">**zdarzenie** Wskaźnik do zdarzenia do przetwarzania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14959">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-14960">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14960">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-14961">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślne przetwarzanie zdarzeń widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14961">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget event processing</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-14962">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14962">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-14963">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14963">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-14964">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widżet jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14964">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-14965">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14965">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-14966">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14966">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-14967">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-14967">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Process event “my_event” for widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_event_process(&my_widget, &my_event);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the event “my_event” for widget “my_widget” has been processed. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_event_process_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15004">gx_widget_event_process_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15004">gx_widget_event_process_set</span></span>
### <a name="set-event-processing-function-of-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15005">Ustawianie funkcji przetwarzania zdarzeń widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15005">Set event processing function of widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15006">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15006">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_event_process_set(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    UINT (*event_processing) (GX_WIDGET *, GX_EVENT *));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15007">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15007">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-15008">Ta usługa zastępuje funkcję przetwarzania zdarzeń widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15008">This service overrides the event processing function of the widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15009">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15009">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15010">**widżet** Wskaźnik do widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15010">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15011">**event_processing** Wskaźnik do nowej funkcji przetwarzania zdarzeń</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15011">**event_processing** Pointer to new event processing function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15012">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15012">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15013">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślne przesłonięcie przetwarzania zdarzeń widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15013">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget event processing override</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15014">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15014">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15015">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widżet jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15015">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15016">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15016">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-15017">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15017">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15018">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15018">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT my_event_process(GX_TREE_VIEW *tree_view,
                      GX_EVENT *event)
{
      UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

      switch(event->gx_event_type)
      {
      case xyz:
            /* Insert custom event handling here */
            break;

      default:
            /* Pass all other events to the default tree view
               event processing */
            status = gx_tree_view_event_process(tree_view, event);
            break;
      }
      return status;
}

/* Use “my_event_process” to process events for widget “my_tree_view”. */
status = gx_widget_event_process_set((GX_WIDGET *)&my_tree_view,
                    (VOID (*)(GX_WIDGET *))my_event_process);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS all event processing for widget “my_tree_view” is handled by “my_event_process”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_event_to_parent"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15055">gx_widget_event_to_parent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15055">gx_widget_event_to_parent</span></span>
### <a name="send-event-to-widgets-parent"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15056">Wysyłanie zdarzenia do elementu nadrzędnego widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15056">Send event to widget’s parent</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15057">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15057">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_event_to_parent(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15058">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15058">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-15059">Ta usługa wysyła zdarzenie do elementu nadrzędnego widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15059">This service sends an event to the widget’s parent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15060">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15060">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15061">**widżet** Wskaźnik do widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15061">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15062">**zdarzenie** Wskaźnik do zdarzenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15062">**event** Pointer to the event</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15063">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15063">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15064">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślnie wysłano zdarzenie do elementu nadrzędnego widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15064">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully sent event to widget’s parent</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15065">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15065">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15066">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15066">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15067">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15067">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-15068">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15068">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15069">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15069">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Send my_event to the widget’s parent */
status = gx_widget_event_to_parent(&my_widget, my_event);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the event has been delivered to the parent of my_widget. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_fill_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15106">gx_widget_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15106">gx_widget_fill_color_set</span></span>
### <a name="set-widget-background-color"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15107">Ustawianie koloru tła widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15107">Set widget background color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15108">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15108">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_fill_color_set(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_color_id);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15109">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15109">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-15110">Ta usługa ustawia kolory tła widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15110">This service sets the widget background colors.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15111">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15111">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15112">**widżet** Wskaźnik do widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15112">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15113">**normal_color_id** Identyfikator zasobu koloru wypełnienia w stanie normalnym.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15113">**normal_color_id** Resource ID of the fill color in normal state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15114">**Dodatek A** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane identyfikatory zasobów kolorów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15114">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15115">Należy pamiętać, że aplikacja może również dodawać niestandardowe identyfikatory zasobów w kolorze.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15115">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15116">**selected_color_id** Identyfikator zasobu koloru wypełnienia po przywęchieniu fokusu widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15116">**selected_color_id** Resource ID of the fill color when the widget gain focus.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15117">**Dodatek A** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane identyfikatory zasobów kolorów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15117">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15118">Należy pamiętać, że aplikacja może również dodawać niestandardowe identyfikatory zasobów w kolorze.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15118">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15119">**disabled_color_id** Identyfikator zasobu koloru wypełnienia, gdy styl GX_STYLE_ENABLED nie jest ustawiony.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15119">**disabled_color_id** Resource ID of the fill color when the style GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15120">**Dodatek A** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane identyfikatory zasobów kolorów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15120">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15121">Należy pamiętać, że aplikacja może również dodawać niestandardowe identyfikatory zasobów w kolorze.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15121">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15122">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15122">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15123">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślnie ustawiono kolor wypełnienia widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15123">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set widget fill color</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15124">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15124">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15125">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15125">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15126">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15126">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15127">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15127">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-15128">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15128">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15129">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15129">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set background of “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_fill_color_set(&my_widget,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_FILL,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_FILL,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_FILL);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” background has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15166">gx_widget_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15166">gx_widget_find</span></span>
### <a name="find-child-widget-of-parent-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15167">Znajdowanie widżetu podrzędnego widżetu nadrzędnego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15167">Find child widget of parent widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15168">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15168">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_find(
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    USHORT widget_id,
    INT search_depth, 
    GX_WIDGET **return_widget);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15169">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15169">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-15170">Ta usługa przeszukuje elementy nadrzędne określonego elementu nadrzędnego w poszukiwaniu widżetu z żądaną wartością identyfikatora.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15170">This service searches through the children of the specified parent looking for a widget with the  requested ID value.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15171">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15171">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15172">**element nadrzędny** Wskaźnik do widżetu nadrzędnego, z którego rozpoczęto wyszukiwanie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15172">**parent** Pointer to parent widget from which search is started</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15173">**widget_id** Identyfikator widżetu do wyszukania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15173">**widget_id** Widget ID to search for</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15174">**search_depth** Definiuje poziom cyklicznego zagnieżdżania, na którym funkcja będzie przeszukiwać podrzędne widżety.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15174">**search_depth** Defines the recursive nesting level into which the function will search child widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15175">Jeśli ta wartość jest <= 0, przeszukiwane są tylko bezpośrednie elementy nadrzędne widżetu nadrzędnego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15175">If this value is <= 0, only immediate children of the parent widget are searched.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15176">Jeśli ta wartość jest GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE, wszystkie elementy podrzędne wszystkich widżetów podrzędnych są przeszukiwane w całości.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15176">If this value is GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE, all children of all child widgets are exhaustively searched.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15177">Dla każdej innej wartości > 0 ta wartość ogranicza, jak głęboko zagnieżdżona ta funkcja będzie przeszukiwać podrzędne widżety wyszukują żądany identyfikator widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15177">For any other value > 0, this value limits how deeply nested this function will search through child widgets looked for the requested widget ID.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15178">**return_widget** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla znalezionego widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15178">**return_widget** Pointer to destination for found widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15179">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15179">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15180">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślne wyszukiwanie widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15180">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget find</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15181">**GX_NOT_FOUND** (0x09) Widget not fount (Widżet GX_NOT_FOUND (0x09)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15181">**GX_NOT_FOUND** (0x09) Widget not fount</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15182">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15182">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15183">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15183">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15184">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15184">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-15185">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15185">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15186">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15186">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_WIDGET *widget_found;

/* Find widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_find(&my_widget, GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE
                        MY_WIDGET_ID, &widget_found);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the pointer “widget_found” contains the pointer to the widget found. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_first_child_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15223">gx_widget_first_child_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15223">gx_widget_first_child_get</span></span>
### <a name="return-pointer-to-first-child-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15224">Zwracanie wskaźnika do pierwszego widżetu podrzędnego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15224">Return pointer to first child widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15225">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15225">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_first_child_get(
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_WIDGET **widget_return);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15226">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15226">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-15227">GuiX utrzymuje listę widżetów nadrzędnych i podrzędnych ze strukturą drzewa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15227">GUIX maintains a tree structured list of parent and child widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15228">Ta usługa zwraca wskaźnik do pierwszego widżetu podrzędnego elementu nadrzędnego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15228">This service returns a pointer to the first child widget of the parent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15229">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15229">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15230">**element nadrzędny** Wskaźnik do widżetu nadrzędnego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15230">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15231">**widget_return** Wskaźnik do zwracania wskaźnika widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15231">**widget_return** Pointer to return widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15232">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15232">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15233">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) zwrócony wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15233">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pointer returned</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15234">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15234">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15235">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Nieprawidłowy widżet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15235">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15236">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15236">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-15237">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15237">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15238">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15238">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve child widget pointer. */

GX_WIDGET *get_child_widget(GX_WIDGET *parent)
{
      GX_WIDGET *child;
      UINT status;

      status = gx_widget_first_child_get(parent, &child);
      if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
      {
            return child;
      }
      return GX_NULL;
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_focus_next"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15245">gx_widget_focus_next</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15245">gx_widget_focus_next</span></span>
### <a name="move-focus-to-next-widget-in-navigation-order"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15246">Przenoszenie fokusu do następnego widżetu w kolejności nawigacji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15246">Move focus to next widget in navigation order</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15247">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15247">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_focus_next(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15248">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15248">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-15249">Ta usługa przenosi fokus do następnego widżetu elementów równorzędnych na połączonej liście widżetów, które akceptują fokus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15249">This service moves focus to the next sibling widget in the linked list of widgets that accept focus.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15250">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15250">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15251">**widżet** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15251">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15252">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15252">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15253">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) został przeniesiony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15253">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) focus was moved</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15254">**GX_FAILURE** (0x00) nie został przeniesiony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15254">**GX_FAILURE** (0x00) focus was not moved</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15255">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15255">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15256">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15256">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15257">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Nieprawidłowy widżet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15257">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15258">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15258">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-15259">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15259">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15260">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15260">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move focus to next widget in navigation order. */ status =
gx_widget_focus_next(&my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the focus has been moved to the next
widget in the navigation order */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_focus_previous"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15263">gx_widget_focus_previous</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15263">gx_widget_focus_previous</span></span>
### <a name="move-focus-to-previous-widget-in-navigation-order"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15264">Przenoszenie fokusu do poprzedniego widżetu w kolejności nawigacji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15264">Move focus to previous widget in navigation order</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_focus_previous(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15266">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15266">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-15267">Ta usługa przenosi fokus do poprzedniego widżetu w kolejności nawigacji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15267">This service moves focus to the previous widget in the navigation order.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15272">**GX_FAILURE** (0x00) nie został przeniesiony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15272">**GX_FAILURE** (0x00) focus was not moved</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15273">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15273">Allowed From</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_font_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15278">gx_widget_font_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15278">gx_widget_font_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-font-for-specified-resource-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15279">Uzyskiwanie czcionki dla określonego identyfikatora zasobu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15279">Get font for specified resource ID</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15280">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15280">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_font_get(
    GX_WIDGETG *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID resource_id,
    GX_FONT **return_font);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15281">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15281">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-15282">Ta usługa pobiera czcionkę skojarzoną z określonym identyfikatorem zasobu z tabeli czcionek na ekranie, na którym jest widoczny ten widżet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15282">This service retrieves the font associated with the specified resource ID from the font table of the display on which this widget is visible.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15283">Ta funkcja powinna być wywoływana tylko przez widoczny widżet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15283">This function should only be called by a visible widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15284">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15284">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15285">**widżet** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15285">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15286">**resource_id** Identyfikator zasobu czcionki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15286">**resource_id** Resource ID of font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15287">**return_font** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla wskaźnika czcionki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15287">**return_font** Pointer to destination for font pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15288">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15288">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15289">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślnie pobrano czcionkę</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15289">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15290">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Nieprawidłowy identyfikator zasobu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15290">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15291">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Kanwa widżetu jest nieprawidłowy lub widżet jest niewidoczny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15291">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Widget canvas not valid or widget is invisible</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15292">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15292">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15293">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widżet jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15293">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15294">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15294">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-15295">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15295">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15296">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15296">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_FONT *my_font;
/* Get font for MY_FONT_ID. */
status = gx_widget_font_get(widget, MY_FONT_RESOURCE_ID, &my_font);
/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the font pointer has been retrieved in “my_font”. */
```
### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15297">Zobacz też</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15297">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15298">gx_widget_color_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15298">gx_widget_color_get</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_free"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15300">gx_widget_free</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15300">gx_widget_free</span></span>
### <a name="release-memory-associated-with-a-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15301">Zwalnianie pamięci skojarzonej z widżetem</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15301">Release memory associated with a widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15302">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15302">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_free(GX_WIDGETG *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15303">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15303">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-15304">Ta usługa zwalnia pamięć skojarzoną z blokiem sterowania widżetem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15304">This service releases the memory associated with a widget control block.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15305">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15305">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15306">**widżet** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15306">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15307">**resource_id** Identyfikator zasobu czcionki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15307">**resource_id** Resource ID of font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15308">**return_font** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla wskaźnika czcionki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15308">**return_font** Pointer to destination for font pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15309">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15309">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15310">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślnie został wolny widżet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15310">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully freed widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15311">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMPRY_ERROR** (0x30) Funkcja bez pamięci nie jest zdefiniowana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15311">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMPRY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory free function is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15312">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15312">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15313">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15313">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-15314">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15314">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15315">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15315">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_WIDGET widget;
UINT status;

status = gx_widget_allocate(&widget, sizeof(GX_WIDGET))

/* Free a runtime allocated widget. */
if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
{
      status = gx_widget_free(widget);
}

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the memory that allocated to the widget has been released. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_front_move"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15352">gx_widget_front_move</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15352">gx_widget_front_move</span></span>
### <a name="move-widget-to-front"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15353">Przenoszenie widżetu na przód</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15353">Move widget to front</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15354">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15354">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_front_move(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_BOOL *return_moved);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15355">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15355">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-15356">Ta usługa przenosi widżet na front na nadrzędnej liście elementów widget elementów nadrzędnych W porządku Z.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15356">This service moves the widget to the front in the parent Z-order list of child widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15357">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15357">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15358">**widżet** Wskaźnik do widżetu do przeniesienia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15358">**widget** Pointer to widget to move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15359">**return_moved** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego widżetu oznaczania został przeniesiony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15359">**return_moved** Pointer to destination for indication widget was moved</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15360">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15360">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15361">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślne przejście widżetu na przód</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15361">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget move to front</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15362">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15362">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15363">**GX_NO_CHANGE** (0x08) widget już przed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15363">**GX_NO_CHANGE** (0x08) Widget already in front</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15364">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15364">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15365">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15365">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15366">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15366">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-15367">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15367">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15368">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15368">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL widget_moved;

/* Move widget “my_widget” to the front. */
status = gx_widget_front_move(&my_widget, &widget_moved);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS and “widget_moved” is GX_TRUE, the
widget “my_widget” was moved to the front . */
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15407">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15407">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_height_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    UINT *return_height);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15408">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15408">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-15409">Ta usługa pobiera wysokość widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15409">This service gets the widget height.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15410">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15410">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15412">**return_height** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla wysokości widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15412">**return_height** Pointer to destination for widget height</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15413">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15413">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15414">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślne uzyskiwanie wysokości widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15414">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget height get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15415">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15415">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15416">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15416">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15417">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15417">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15418">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15418">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15420">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15420">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_VALUE widget_height;

/* Get height for widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_height_get(&my_widget, &widget_height);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the height of the widget is contained in
“widget_height” . */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_last_child_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15509">gx_widget_last_child_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15509">gx_widget_last_child_get</span></span>
### <a name="return-pointer-to-last-child-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15510">Zwracanie wskaźnika do ostatniego widżetu podrzędnego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15510">Return pointer to last child widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15511">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15511">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_last_child_get(
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_WIDGET **widget_return);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15512">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15512">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-15513">GuiX utrzymuje listę widżetów nadrzędnych i podrzędnych ze strukturą drzewa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15513">GUIX maintains a tree structured list of parent and child widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15514">Ta usługa zwraca wskaźnik do ostatniego widżetu podrzędnego elementu nadrzędnego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15514">This service returns a pointer to the last child widget of the parent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15515">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15515">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15516">**element nadrzędny** Wskaźnik do widżetu nadrzędnego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15516">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15517">**widget_return** Wskaźnik do zwracania wskaźnika widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15517">**widget_return** Pointer to return widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15518">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15518">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15519">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) zwrócony wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15519">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pointer returned</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15520">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15520">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15521">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Nieprawidłowy widżet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15521">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15522">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15522">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-15523">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15523">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15524">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15524">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve child widget pointer. */

GX_WIDGET *get_last_child_widget(GX_WIDGET *parent)
{

      GX_WIDGET *child;
      UINT status;

      status = gx_widget_last_child_get(parent, &child);
      if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
      {
              return child;
      }
      return GX_NULL;
}
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15542">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15542">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15543">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Nieprawidłowy widżet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15543">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15556">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15556">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-15557">GuiX utrzymuje listę widżetów nadrzędnych i podrzędnych ze strukturą drzewa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15557">GUIX maintains a tree structured list of parent and child widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15558">Ta usługa zwraca wskaźnik do elementu nadrzędnego bieżącego widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15558">This service returns a pointer to the parent of the current widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15559">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15559">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15560">**current (bieżący)** Wskaźnik do bieżącego widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15560">**current** Pointer to current widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15561">**widget_return** Wskaźnik do zwracania wskaźnika widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15561">**widget_return** Pointer to return widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15562">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15562">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15563">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) zwrócony wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15563">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pointer returned</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15564">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15564">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15565">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Nieprawidłowy widżet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15565">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15566">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15566">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-15567">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15567">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15568">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15568">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve parent widget */

GX_WIDGET *get_parent(GX_WIDGET *current)
{
      GX_WIDGET *parent;
      UINT status;

      status = gx_widget_parent_get(current, &parent);
      if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
      {
            return parent;
      }
      return GX_NULL;
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_pixelmap_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15575">gx_widget_pixelmap_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15575">gx_widget_pixelmap_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-pixelmap"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15576">Uzyskiwanie mapy pikseli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15576">Get pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15577">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15577">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_pixelmap_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID resource_id,
    GX_PIXELMAP **return_pixelmap);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15578">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15578">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-15579">Ta usługa pobiera mapę pikseli skojarzoną z dostarczonym identyfikatorem zasobu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15579">This service gets the pixelmap associated with the supplied resource ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15580">Ta usługa powinna być wywoływana tylko dla widocznych widżetów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15580">This service should only be called for visible widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15581">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15581">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15582">**widżet** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15582">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15583">**pixelmap_id** Identyfikator zasobu mapy pikseli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15583">**pixelmap_id** Pixelmap resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15584">**return_pixelmap** Wskaźnik do wskaźnika docelowego mapy pikseli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15584">**return_pixelmap** Pointer to pixelmap destination pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15585">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15585">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15586">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślne uzyskiwanie mapy pikseli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15586">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15587">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Nieprawidłowy identyfikator zasobu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15587">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15588">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Kanwa widżetu jest nieprawidłowy lub widżet jest niewidoczny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15588">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Widget canvas not valid or widget is invisible</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15589">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15589">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15590">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15590">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15591">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15591">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-15592">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15592">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15593">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15593">Example</span></span>

```c
GX_PIXELMAP *my_pixelmap;

/* Get the pixelmap associated with MY_PIXELMAP_ID. */
status = gx_widget_pixelmap_get(widget, MY_PIXELMAP_RESOURCE_ID,
                                &my_pixelmap);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_pixelmap” contains the pixemap pointer. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_resize"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15619">gx_widget_resize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15619">gx_widget_resize</span></span>
### <a name="resize-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15620">Widżet zmiany rozmiaru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15620">Resize widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15621">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15621">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_resize(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_RECTANGLE *new_size);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15622">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15622">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-15623">Ta usługa zmienia rozmiar widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15623">This service resizes the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15624">Jeśli widżet jest widoczny, jest automatycznie unieważniany i do kolejki w celu ponownego narysowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15624">If the widget is visible, it is automatically invalidated and queued for redrawing.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15625">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15625">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15626">**widżet** Wskaźnik do widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15626">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15627">**new_size** Nowy rozmiar widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15627">**new_size** New widget size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15628">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15628">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15629">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Zmiana rozmiaru widżetu powiodła się</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15629">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget resize</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15630">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15630">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15631">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15631">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15632">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15632">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15633">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15633">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15635">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15635">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RECTANGLE new_size;

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&new_size, 0, 0, 100, 100);

/* Resize widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_resize(&my_widget, &new_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” has been resized. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_shift"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15672">gx_widget_shift</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15672">gx_widget_shift</span></span>
### <a name="shift-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15673">Widżet Shift</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15673">Shift widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15674">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15674">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_shift(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_VALUE x_shift,
    GX_VALUE y_shift, 
    GX_BOOL mark_dirty);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15675">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15675">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-15676">Ta usługa przenosi widżet i opcjonalnie oznacza go jako zanieczyszczony.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15676">This service shifts the widget and optionally marks it as dirty.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15677">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15677">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15678">**widżet** Wskaźnik do widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15678">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15679">**x_shift** Liczba pikseli do przesunięcia na osi X</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15679">**x_shift** Number of pixels to shift on x-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15680">**y_shift** Liczba pikseli do przesunięcia na osi y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15680">**y_shift** Number of pixels to shift on y-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15681">**mark_dirty** GX_TRUE, aby wskazać zanieczyszczone, w przeciwnym razie GX_FALSE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15681">**mark_dirty** GX_TRUE to indicate dirty, otherwise GX_FALSE</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15682">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15682">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15683">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślne przesunięcie widżetu GX_CALLER_ERROR (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15683">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget shift GX_CALLER_ERROR (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15684">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15684">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15685">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widżet jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15685">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15686">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15686">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-15687">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15687">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15688">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15688">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Shift widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_shift(&my_widget, 10, 20, GX_FALSE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” has been shifted. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_show"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15725">gx_widget_show</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15725">gx_widget_show</span></span>
### <a name="show-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15726">Pokaż widżet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15726">Show widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15727">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15727">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_show(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15728">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15728">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-15729">Ta usługa wyświetla widżet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15729">This service shows the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15730">Widżet stanie się widoczny tylko wtedy, gdy jest dołączony do elementu nadrzędnego, a widżet nadrzędny jest również widoczny.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15730">The widget will become visible only if it is attached to a parent and the parent widget is also visible.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15731">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15731">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15732">**widżet** Wskaźnik do widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15732">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15733">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15733">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15734">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślne wyświetlanie widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15734">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget show</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15735">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15735">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15736">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15736">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15737">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widżet jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15737">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15738">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15738">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-15739">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15739">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15740">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15740">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Show widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_show(&my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” has been shown. */
```
