## <a name="gx_widget_status_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15828">gx_widget_status_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15828">gx_widget_status_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-status"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15829">Uzyskiwanie stanu widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15829">Get widget status</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15830">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15830">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_status_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    ULONG *return_status)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15831">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15831">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-15832">Ta usługa pobiera flagi stanu z widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15832">This service retrieves status flags from the widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15833">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15833">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15834">**widżet** Wskaźnik do widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15834">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15835">**return_status** Wskaźnik do zwracanego stanu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15835">**return_status** Pointer to the status being returned</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15836">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15836">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15837">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślne uzyskiwanie stanu widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15837">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15838">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15838">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15839">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15839">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15840">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15840">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-15841">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15841">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15842">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15842">Example</span></span>

```C
ULONT get_status;

/* Retrieve status flag from widget “my_widget”. */ status =
gx_widget_status_get(&my_widget, &get_status);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the status from widget “my_widget” is
saved to “get_status”. */
```

```C
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG status)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15881">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15881">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-15882">Ta usługa usuwa określone flagi stanu z wewnętrznej zmiennej stanu widżetów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15882">This service removes the specified status flags from the widgets internal status variable.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_status_test"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15929">gx_widget_status_test</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15929">gx_widget_status_test</span></span>
### <a name="test-widget-status"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15930">Testowanie stanu widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15930">Test widget status</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15931">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15931">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_status_test(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG status,
    GX_BOOL *return_test);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15932">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15932">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-15933">Ta usługa testuje flagi stanu określonego widżetu i zapisuje wynik w pamięci wskazywanej przez "return_test".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15933">This service tests the status flags of the specified widget and stores the result in the memory pointed by “return_test”.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15934">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15934">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15935">**widżet** Wskaźnik do widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15935">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15936">**stan** Stan do testowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15936">**status** Status to test</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15937">**return_status** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla wyniku testu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15937">**return_status** Pointer to destination for result of test</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15938">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15938">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15939">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślny test stanu widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15939">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status test</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15940">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15940">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15941">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15941">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15942">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15942">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-15943">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15943">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15944">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15944">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL test_result;

/* Test status of widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_status_test(&my_widget, status_to_test,
                              &test_result);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” status was tested
and the result in “test_result”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_string_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15953">gx_widget_string_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15953">gx_widget_string_get</span></span>
### <a name="retrieve-string-associated-with-a-visible-widget-and-string-id-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15954">Pobieranie ciągu skojarzonego z widocznym widżetem i identyfikatorem ciągu (przestarzałe)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15954">Retrieve string associated with a visible widget and string ID (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15955">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15955">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_string_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID string_id,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR **string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15956">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15956">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-15957">Ta usługa jest przestarzała na rzecz gx_widget_string_get_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15957">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_widget_string_get_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-15958">Ta usługa zwraca wpis tabeli ciągów dla danej wartości identyfikatora ciągu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15958">This service returns the string table entry for the given string ID value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15959">Ta usługa jest podobna do gx_display_string_get, z tą różnicą, że aktywny ekran jest określany automatycznie, a nie przekazywany przez wywołujący.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15959">This service is similar to gx_display_string_get, except the active display is determined automatically rather than being passed in by the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15960">Tej usługi można używać tylko w przypadku widocznych widżetów, czyli wyświetlania skojarzonego z tym widżetem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15960">This service can only be used for widgets which are visible, i.e. the display associated with this widget is known.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15961">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15961">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15962">**widżet** Wskaźnik do widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15962">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15963">**string_id** Wartość identyfikatora ciągu z nagłówka zasobów</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15963">**string_id** String ID value from resources header</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15964">**ciąg** Adres zmiennej, która ma zwrócić ciąg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15964">**string** Address of variable to return string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15965">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15965">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15966">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślny test stanu widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15966">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status test</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15967">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15967">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-15968">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widżet jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15968">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15969">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15969">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-15970">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15970">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15971">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15971">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CONST GX_CHAR *string;

/* Test status of widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_string_get(&my_widget, GX_STRING_ID_SHUTDOWN,
      &string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the string has been retrieved */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_style_add"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15996">gx_widget_style_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15996">gx_widget_style_add</span></span>
### <a name="add-widget-style"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15997">Dodawanie stylu widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15997">Add widget style</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15998">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15998">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_style_add(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG style)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-15999">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-15999">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-16000">Ta usługa dodaje styl do widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16000">This service adds a style to the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16001">Ponadto są podejmowane następujące akcje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16001">In addition, the following actions are taken.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-16002">Jeśli dodany styl zostanie GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, zostanie GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT stan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16002">If the added style is GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, status GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT will be added.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-16003">Jeśli dodany styl zostanie GX_STYLE_ENABLED, zostanie GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE stan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16003">If the added style is GX_STYLE_ENABLED, status GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE will be added.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-16004">Jeśli widżet jest widoczny, jest automatycznie unieważniany i do kolejki w celu ponownego narysowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16004">If the widget is visible, it is automatically invalidated and queued for redrawing.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16005">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16005">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16006">**widżet** Wskaźnik do widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16006">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16007">**style (styl)** Nowy styl do dodania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16007">**style** New style to add.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16008">**Dodatek D** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane style ogólne dla wszystkich widżetów, a także style specyficzne dla widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16008">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16009">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16009">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16010">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Dodanie stylu widżetu Powodzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16010">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget style add</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16011">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16011">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16012">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16012">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16013">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widżet jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16013">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16014">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16014">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-16015">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16015">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16016">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16016">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Add style to widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_style_add(&my_widget, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the style was successfully applied to the widget “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_style_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16053">gx_widget_style_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16053">gx_widget_style_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-style"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16054">Uzyskiwanie stylu widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16054">Get widget style</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16055">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16055">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_style_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG *return_style)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16056">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16056">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-16057">Ta usługa pobiera flagę stylu z widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16057">This service retrieves style flag from the widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16058">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16058">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16059">**widżet** Wskaźnik do widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16059">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16060">**return_style** Wskaźnik do zwracanych stylów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16060">**return_style** Pointer to the style being returned.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16061">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16061">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16062">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślnie pobrano styl widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16062">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved widget style</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16063">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16063">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16064">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16064">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16065">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widżet jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16065">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16066">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16066">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-16067">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16067">Initialization and threads</span></span>


### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16068">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16068">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve style from widget into “style”. */
status = gx_widget_style_get(&my_widget, &style);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the style flag from widget is saved in “style”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_style_remove"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16105">gx_widget_style_remove</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16105">gx_widget_style_remove</span></span>
### <a name="remove-widget-style"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16106">Usuwanie stylu widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16106">Remove widget style</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16107">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16107">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_style_remove(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG style)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16108">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16108">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-16109">Ta usługa usuwa styl z widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16109">This service removes a style from the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16110">Ponadto są podejmowane następujące akcje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16110">In addition, the following actions are taken.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-16111">Jeśli usunięty styl jest GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT zostanie usunięty.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16111">If the removed style is GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, status GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT will be removed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-16112">Jeśli usunięty styl jest GX_STYLE_ENABLED, GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE zostanie usunięty.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16112">If the removed style is GX_STYLE_ENABLED, status GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE will be removed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-16113">Jeśli widżet jest widoczny, zostanie automatycznie unieważniony i w kolejce do ponownego narysowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16113">If the widget is visible, it is automatically invalidated and queued for redrawing.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16114">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16114">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16115">**widżet** Wskaźnik do widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16115">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16116">**style (styl)** Styl do usunięcia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16116">**style** Style to remove.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16117">**Dodatek D** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane style ogólne dla wszystkich widżetów, a także style specyficzne dla widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16117">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16118">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16118">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16119">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Usunięcie stylu widżetu Powodzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16119">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget style remove</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16120">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16120">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16121">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16121">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16122">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16122">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16123">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16123">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-16124">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16124">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16125">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16125">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Remove style from widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_style_remove(&my_widget,
                                GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED style was removed from the widget “my_widget”.*/
```

## <a name="gx_widget_style_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16162">gx_widget_style_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16162">gx_widget_style_set</span></span>
### <a name="set-widget-style"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16163">Ustawianie stylu widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16163">Set widget style</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16164">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16164">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_style_set(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG style)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16165">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16165">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-16166">Ta usługa ustawia styl widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16166">This service sets a style to the widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-16167">Jeśli styl zestawu zawiera GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT zostanie dodany stan. W przeciwnym razie stan zostanie usunięty.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16167">If the set style includes GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, status GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT will be added, otherwise the status will be removed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-16168">Jeśli styl zestawu zawiera GX_STYLE_ENABLED, GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE zostanie dodany stan. W przeciwnym razie stan zostanie usunięty.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16168">If the set style includes GX_STYLE_ENABLED, status GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE will be added, otherwise the status will be removed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-16169">Jeśli widżet jest widoczny, jest automatycznie unieważniany i do kolejki w celu ponownego narysowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16169">If the widget is visible, it is automatically invalidated and queued for redrawing.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16170">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16170">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16171">**widżet** Wskaźnik do widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16171">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16172">**style (styl)** Styl do ustawienia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16172">**style** Style to set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16173">**Dodatek D** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane style ogólne dla wszystkich widżetów, a także style specyficzne dla widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16173">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16174">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16174">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16175">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Zestaw stylów widżetu Powodzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16175">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget style set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16176">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16176">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16177">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16177">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16178">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16178">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16179">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16179">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-16180">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16180">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16181">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16181">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set style GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT to the widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_style_set(&my_widget, GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” style is set to GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_top_visible_child_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16329">gx_widget_top_visible_child_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16329">gx_widget_top_visible_child_find</span></span>
### <a name="return-pointer-to-visible-child-that-is-top-of-z-order"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16330">Zwracanie wskaźnika do widocznego podrzędnego, który znajduje się na początku kolejności Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16330">Return pointer to visible child that is top of Z order</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16331">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16331">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_top_visible_child_find(
    GX_WIDGET *current,
    GX_WIDGET **widget_return);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16332">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16332">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-16333">GuiX utrzymuje listę widżetów nadrzędnych i podrzędnych ze strukturą drzewa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16333">GUIX maintains a tree structured list of parent and child widgets.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e9990-16334">Ta usługa zwraca wskaźnik do najwyższego widocznego elementu podrzędnego bieżącego widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16334">This service returns a pointer to the topmost visible child of the current widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16335">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16335">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16336">**current (bieżący)** Wskaźnik do bieżącego widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16336">**current** Pointer to current widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16337">**widget_return** Wskaźnik do zwracania wskaźnika widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16337">**widget_return** Pointer to return widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16338">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16338">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16339">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) zwrócony wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16339">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pointer returned</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16340">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16340">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16341">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Nieprawidłowy widżet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16341">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16342">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16342">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-16343">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16343">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16344">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16344">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve topmost visible widget on the display */

GX_WIDGET *get_top_window(GX_WINDOW_ROOT *root)
{
    GX_WIDGET *top_window;
    UINT status;

    status = gx_widget_top_visible_child_find(root, &top_window);
    if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        return top_window;
    }
    return GX_NULL;
}
```

```C
UINT gx_window_client_height_get(
    GX_WINDOW *window,
    GX_VALUE *return_height);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16457">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16457">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-16458">Ta usługa pobiera wysokość klienta okna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16458">This service gets the client height of the window.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16464">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16464">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16465">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widżet jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16465">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16466">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16466">Allowed From</span></span>

## <a name="gx_window_client_scroll"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16484">gx_window_client_scroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16484">gx_window_client_scroll</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16486">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16486">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_client_scroll(
    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    GX_VALUE x_scroll,
    GX_VALUE y_scroll);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16487">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16487">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-16488">Ta usługa przewija klientów okna o określoną kwotę.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16488">This service scrolls the window clients by the specified amount.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16489">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16489">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16490">**okno** Wskaźnik do okna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16490">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16492">**y_scroll** Kwota do przewinięcia na osi Y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16492">**y_scroll** Amount to scroll on the y-axis</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16494">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Przewijanie klienta okna Powodzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16494">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window client scroll</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16495">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16495">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16496">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16496">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16497">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widżet jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16497">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16498">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Wartości przewijania są nieprawidłowe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16498">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Scroll value(s) not valid</span></span>

```C

    GX_WINDOW *window,
    GX_VALUE *return_width);
```

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-16520">Ta usługa pobiera szerokość klienta w określonym oknie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16520">This service gets the client width of the specified window.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16524">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16524">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16525">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślne uzyskiwanie szerokości klienta okna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16525">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window client width get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16526">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16526">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16528">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16528">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

## <a name="gx_window_close"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16546">gx_window_close</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16546">gx_window_close</span></span>


- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16557">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widżet jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16557">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16558">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16558">Allowed From</span></span>

## <a name="gx_window_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16576">gx_window_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16576">gx_window_create</span></span>
### <a name="create-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16577">Okno tworzenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16577">Create window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16578">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16578">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_create(
    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    ULONG style,
    USHORT window_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16579">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16579">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-16580">Ta usługa tworzy okno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16580">This service creates a window.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-16581">GX_WINDOW pochodzi od usługi GX_WIDGET obsługuje wszystkie usługi gx_widget API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16581">GX_WINDOW is derived from GX_WIDGET and supports all gx_widget API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16582">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16582">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16583">**okno** Wskaźnik do bloku sterowania okna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16583">**window** Pointer to window control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16584">**name (nazwa)** Nazwa logiczna okna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16584">**name** Logical name of window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16585">**element nadrzędny** Wskaźnik do widżetu nadrzędnego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16585">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16586">**style (styl)** Styl okna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16586">**style** Window style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16587">**Dodatek D** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane style ogólne dla wszystkich widżetów, a także style specyficzne dla widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16587">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16588">**window_id** Identyfikator okna zdefiniowany przez aplikację</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16588">**window_id** Application-defined ID of the window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16589">**rozmiar** Rozmiar okna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16589">**size** Size of the window</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16590">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16590">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16591">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślne utworzenie okna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16591">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16592">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16592">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16593">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16593">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16594">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget już utworzony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16594">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16595">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar bloku kontrolki widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16595">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16596">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widżet jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16596">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16597">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16597">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-16598">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16598">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16599">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16599">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_WINDOW my_window;

/* Create window “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_create(&my_window, "my window",
                          &my_parent_window, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
                          MY_WINDOW_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS window “my_window” has been created. */
```


## <a name="gx_window_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16643">gx_window_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16643">gx_window_event_process</span></span>
### <a name="process-window-event"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16644">Zdarzenie okna przetwarzania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16644">Process window event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16645">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16645">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_event_process(
    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16646">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16646">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-16647">Ta usługa przetwarza zdarzenie dla tego okna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16647">This service processes an event for this window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16648">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16648">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16649">**okno** Wskaźnik do bloku sterowania okna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16649">**window** Pointer to window control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16650">**zdarzenie** Wskaźnik do zdarzenia do przetwarzania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16650">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16651">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16651">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16652">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślne przetwarzanie zdarzeń okna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16652">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window event processing</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16653">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16653">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16654">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16654">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16655">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widżet jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16655">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16656">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16656">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-16657">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16657">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16658">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16658">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic window event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_window_event_process(GX_WINDOW *window,
                                 GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
        case xyz:
            /* Insert custom event handling here */
            break;
        default:
            /* Pass all other events to the default window
            event processing */
            status = gx_window_event_process(window, event);
            break;
        }
        return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_window_execute"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16674">gx_window_execute</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16674">gx_window_execute</span></span>
### <a name="modally-execute-a-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16675">Modalne wykonywanie okna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16675">Modally execute a window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16676">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16676">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_execute(
    GX_WINDOW *window,
    ULONG *return_ptr)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16677">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16677">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-16678">Ta usługa modalnie wykonuje okno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16678">This service modally executes a window.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16679">Wszelkie dane wejściowe użytkownika (zdarzenia pióra itp.) poza obszarem klienta okna zostaną zignorowane.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16679">Any user input (pen events, etc.) outside of the window client area will be ignored.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16680">Należy pamiętać, że ta funkcja wchodzi w pętlę ciągłego blokowania wykonywania i nie wraca do obiektu wywołującego, dopóki wykonywanie modelu nie zostanie zakończone.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16680">Note that this function enters a continuous blocking execution loop, and does not return to the caller until the model execution is terminated.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-16681">Wykonywanie modalne kończy się, gdy przetwarzanie zdarzeń dla dowolnego odebranego zdarzenia zwraca niezerową wartość stanu lub gdy wywoływana jest gx_window_close interfejsu API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16681">Modal execution terminates when the event processing for any received event returns a non-zero status value, or when the gx_window_close API function is invoked.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16682">Kod powrotny przetwarzania zdarzeń innych niż zero jest zwracany do wywołującego za pośrednictwem return_ptr przekazanego do tego interfejsu API</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16682">The non-zero event processing return code is returned to the caller through the return_ptr passed into this API</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16683">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16683">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16684">**okno** Wskaźnik do bloku sterowania okna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16684">**window** Pointer to window control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16685">**return_ptr** Lokalizacja zapisu stanu zakończenia wykonywania modalnego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16685">**return_ptr** Location to save modal execution exit status.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16686">Może być GX_NULL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16686">May be GX_NULL.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16687">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16687">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16688">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślne wykonanie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16688">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful execution</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16689">**GX_SYSTEM_EVENT_RECEIVE_ERROR(0x05)** Zdarzenie odbioru z kolejki zdarzeń nie powiodło się</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16689">**GX_SYSTEM_EVENT_RECEIVE_ERROR(0x05)** Pickup event from event queue failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16690">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16690">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16691">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16691">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16692">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widżet jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16692">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16693">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16693">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-16694">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16694">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16695">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16695">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Execute a modal window. */
status = gx_window_execute(&my_window, &return_code);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the window was executed, and return_code holds the execution return code. */
```

### <a name="process-event-for-the-root-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16763">Zdarzenie procesu dla okna głównego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16763">Process event for the root window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16764">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16764">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_root_create(
    GX_WINDOW_ROOT *root_window,
    GX_EVENT *event)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16765">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16765">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-16766">Ta usługa przetwarza zdarzenia dla określonego okna głównego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16766">This service processes events for the specified root window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16767">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16767">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16768">**root_window** Wskaźnik do bloku sterowania okna głównego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16768">**root_window** Pointer to root window control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16769">**zdarzenie** Wskaźnik do zdarzenia do przetworzenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16769">**event** Pointer to the event to be processed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16770">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16770">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16771">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pomyślnie przetworzone zdarzenie okna głównego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16771">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully processed root window event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16772">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16772">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16773">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16773">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16774">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16774">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-16775">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16775">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16776">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16776">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic root window event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_root_window_event_process(GX_ROOT_WINDOW *root,
                                      GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default root window
            event processing */
        status = gx_window_root_event_process(root, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16825">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16825">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_scroll_info_get(
    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    ULONG style,
    GX_SCROLL_INFO *return_scroll_info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16826">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16826">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-16827">Ta usługa pobiera informacje o przewijaniu okna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16827">This service gets the window scroll information.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16828">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16828">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16829">**okno** Wskaźnik do okna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16829">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16830">**style (styl)** GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL lub GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16830">**style** GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL or GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16831">**return_scroll_info** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla informacji o przewijaniu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16831">**return_scroll_info** Pointer to destination for scroll info.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16832">Okno nadrzędne inicjuje tę strukturę, aby poinformować pasek przewijania o łącznym rozmiarze okna nadrzędnego, obszarze do wyświetlania oraz o inkrementacjach i limitach przewijania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16832">The parent window initializes this structure to inform the scrollbar of the parent window total size, viewable area, and scrolling increment and limits.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16833">Domyślna implementacja używa obszaru klienta systemu Windows jako obszaru wyświetlania i przewijania w pikselach, ale niestandardowa implementacja okna może korzystać z parametrów przewijania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16833">The default implementation uses the windows client area as the viewable area and scrolls by pixels, but customized window implementation can utilize the scroll parameters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16834">**Dodatek I** zawiera definicję struktury GX_SCROLL_INFO danych</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16834">**Appendix I** contains the definition of the GX_SCROLL_INFO structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16835">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16835">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16836">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Informacje o przewijaniu okna po pomyślnym przewinięciu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16836">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window scroll info get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16837">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16837">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16838">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16838">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16839">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B) Nieprawidłowy typ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16839">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B) Invalid type</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16842">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16842">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SCROLL_INFO scroll_info;

/* Get scroll information for window “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_scroll_info_get(&my_window,
                    GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL, &scroll_info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the “scroll_info” contains the scroll information for window “my_window”. */
```

```C
    USHORT type,
    GX_SCROLLBAR **return_scrollbar);
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16869">**GX_NOT_FOUND** (0x09) Nie znaleziono paska przewijania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16869">**GX_NOT_FOUND** (0x09) Scrollbar not found</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16923">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16923">Prototype</span></span>

```C

    GX_WINDOW *window,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID wallpaper_id,
    GX_BOOL tile);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16924">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16924">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-16925">Ta usługa ustawia tapetę dla określonego okna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16925">This service sets the wallpaper for the specified window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16926">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16926">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16927">**okno** Wskaźnik do okna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16927">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16928">**wallpaper_id** Identyfikator zasobu tapety do użycia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16928">**wallpaper_id** Resource ID of wallpaper to use</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16929">**kafelek** Tapeta jest kafelkowana, jeśli GX_TRUE, w przeciwnym razie tapeta nie jest kafelkowana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16929">**tile** Wallpaper is tiled if GX_TRUE, otherwise wallpaper is not tiled</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16930">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16930">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16931">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Zestaw tapety okna Powodzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16931">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window wallpaper set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16932">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Nieprawidłowy wywołujący tę funkcję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16932">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16933">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16933">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e9990-16934">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16934">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16935">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16935">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e9990-16936">Inicjowanie i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16936">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="e9990-16937">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e9990-16937">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set wallpaper for window “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_wallpaper_set(&my_window,
                                 MY_WALLPAPER_RESOURCE_ID,
                                 GX_TRUE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the wallpaper for window “my_window” is set. */
```
